original: de ni yul med pa can nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de ni yul med pa can nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because it is devoid of an object.

original: gal te yul zhig yod na ni tha dad pa 'am tha mi dad par 'gyur ba zhig na de ni yod pa ma yin te /
analyzed: gal te yul zhig yod na ni tha dad pa 'am tha mi dad par 'gyur ba zhig na de ni yod pa ma yin te /
translated: If there were an object, it would be either different or non-different from it, but it does not exist.

original: rnam par rtog pa rnams ni ni yul med pa can nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rnam par rtog pa rnams ni ni yul med pa can nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because conceptual thoughts are devoid of an object.

original: ci ltar yul med pa can nyid yin zhe na /
analyzed: ci ltar yul med pa can nyid yin zhe na /
translated: How are they devoid of an object?

original: bshad pa / rnam par rtogs pa de'i snang ba gang yin pa de ni gang zhig rang gi yul du 'dod pa de'i rjes su 'gro ba dang ldog pa'i rjes su mi byed pa'i rgyu'i phyir ro //
analyzed: bshad pa / rnam par rtogs pa de'i snang ba gang yin pa de ni gang zhig rang gi yul du 'dod pa de'i rjes su 'gro ba dang ldog pa'i rjes su mi byed pa'i rgyu'i phyir ro //
translated: It is said: because the appearance of that conceptual thought does not follow the occurrence and cessation of that which is asserted to be its own object.

original: bdag nyid du gyur ba ma yin pa me la sogs pa rjes su dpag pa pas nges pa gang yin pa de de'i yul du 'gyur ba yin zhing de yang phyir rol du 'dod pa yin no //
analyzed: bdag nyid du gyur ba ma yin pa me la sogs pa rjes su dpag pa pas nges pa gang yin pa de de'i yul du 'gyur ba yin zhing de yang phyir rol du 'dod pa yin no //
translated: That which is ascertained by inference, such as fire, which is not itself, becomes its object, and that is asserted to be external.

original: rjes su dpag pa'i snang ba ni phyi rol yod pa dang med pa'i rjes su byed pa ma yin te /
analyzed: rjes su dpag pa'i snang ba ni phyi rol yod pa dang med pa'i rjes su byed pa ma yin te /
translated: The appearance of inference does not follow the existence or non-existence of the external object.

original: de'i phyir dngos po nges pa ma yin pas dngos po med pa'i yul can yin pa'i phyir rnam par rtogs pa'i shes pa ni yul med pa can yin no //
analyzed: de'i phyir dngos po nges pa ma yin pas dngos po med pa'i yul can yin pa'i phyir rnam par rtogs pa'i shes pa ni yul med pa can yin no //
translated: Therefore, since the object is not ascertained, the object of conceptual cognition is nonexistent, and thus conceptual cognition is devoid of an object.

original: gang zhig gzung ba'i yul dngos po yod pa yin pa de'i snang ba ni mngon par 'dod pa'i yul gyi rjes su 'gro ba dang ldog pa'i rjes su byed par 'gyur ba yin te /
analyzed: gang zhig gzung ba'i yul dngos po yod pa yin pa de'i snang ba ni mngon par 'dod pa'i yul gyi rjes su 'gro ba dang ldog pa'i rjes su byed par 'gyur ba yin te /
translated: The appearance of that which has an existent object of apprehension conforms to the presence and absence of the object that is desired to be apprehended,

original: dper na mngon sum bzhin no //
analyzed: dper na mngon sum bzhin no //
translated: just as in the case of direct perception.

original: 'di ni de lta ma yin pa des na yul med pa can nyid do //
analyzed: 'di ni de lta ma yin pa des na yul med pa can nyid do //
translated: But this is not so in the case of conceptual cognition, and therefore it is devoid of an object.

original: 'di snyam du rnam par rtog pa'i snang ba gsal ba'i rjes su 'gro ba dang ldog pa'i rjes su mi byed pa yin gyi /
analyzed: 'di snyam du rnam par rtog pa'i snang ba gsal ba'i rjes su 'gro ba dang ldog pa'i rjes su mi byed pa yin gyi /
translated: One might think that the appearance of conceptual cognition does not conform to the presence and absence of the clear object,

original: rtag pa yin pa'i phyir gsal ba la brten pa'i spyi la ni 'khrul pa yod pa ma yin no //
analyzed: rtag pa yin pa'i phyir gsal ba la brten pa'i spyi la ni 'khrul pa yod pa ma yin no //
translated: but that there is no error in the case of the universal that is based on the clear object, because it is permanent.

original: de yang gsal ba dang 'dra ba yin pa'i phyir gsal ba'i rang bzhin lta bur nges par gzung bar 'gyur ba yin pa des na de yul du 'gyur ro zhen bshad pa spyi yang dngos po las gzhan du tha dad par brjod par mi nus pa'i phyir yul🔽med pa can nyid do //
analyzed: de yang gsal ba dang 'dra ba yin pa'i phyir gsal ba'i rang bzhin lta bur nges par gzung bar 'gyur ba yin pa des na de yul du 'gyur ro zhen bshad pa spyi yang dngos po las gzhan du tha dad par brjod par mi nus pa'i phyir yul med pa can nyid do //
translated: But since it is not possible to say that the universal is different from the thing, it is not an object.

original: gal te spyi gsal ba las tha dad pa bsgrub par nus na ni gsal ba yul ma yin na spyi yul du 'gyur ba @180a * //
analyzed: gal te spyi gsal ba las tha dad pa bsgrub par nus na ni gsal ba yul ma yin na spyi yul du 'gyur ba @180a * //
translated: If it were possible to establish that the universal is different from the manifest, then, if the manifest were not the object, the universal would be the object.

original: zhig yin na mi nus pa de'i phyir spyi'i yul can ni yul med pa can du grub pa yin no //
analyzed: zhig yin na mi nus pa de'i phyir spyi'i yul can ni yul med pa can du grub pa yin no //
translated: But since it is not possible, it is established that the subject that has a universal does not have an object.

original: gang yang rjes su dpag pa'i snang ba'i spyi ni yod kyang don ma yin te /
analyzed: gang yang rjes su dpag pa'i snang ba'i spyi ni yod kyang don ma yin te /
translated: Moreover, although the universal that appears to inference exists, it is not the object.

original: me ma yin no zhes bshad pa de tsam gyis ni rjes su dpag pa'i yul med par brjod pa ma yin te /
analyzed: me ma yin no zhes bshad pa de tsam gyis ni rjes su dpag pa'i yul med par brjod pa ma yin te /
translated: It is not fire. By merely saying that, it is not said that the object of inference does not exist.

original: snang ba'i phyi ni yod kyang me'i rang bzhin gyi don ma yin no //
analyzed: snang ba'i phyi ni yod kyang me'i rang bzhin gyi don ma yin no //
translated: Although the external appearance of fire exists, it is not the object that has the nature of fire.

original: rang gi ngo bos ni don yin la gzung bar bya ba yang de nyid yin gyi gzhan ni ma yin pa des na rjes su dpag pa'i yul yod par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: rang gi ngo bos ni don yin la gzung bar bya ba yang de nyid yin gyi gzhan ni ma yin pa des na rjes su dpag pa'i yul yod par 'gyur ro //
translated: It is an object by virtue of its own nature, and it is also apprehended by virtue of that, not by something else. Therefore, the object of inference exists.

original: de'i phyir 'di brjod pa yin te rang gi snang ba ni don ma yin te /
analyzed: de'i phyir 'di brjod pa yin te rang gi snang ba ni don ma yin te /
translated: Therefore, this is what is being said: The appearance of that is not an object,

original: phyi rol don rtogs pa don yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: phyi rol don rtogs pa don yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because the realization of an external object is an object.

original: phyi rol yang ma yin te /
analyzed: phyi rol yang ma yin te /
translated: Nor is it external,

original: de'i rjes su 'gro ldog gi rjes su mi byed pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de'i rjes su 'gro ldog gi rjes su mi byed pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because it does not conform with the presence or absence of that.

original: spyi ni ma yin te /
analyzed: spyi ni ma yin te /
translated: Nor is it a universal,

original: de med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because that does not exist.

original: des na rjes su dpag pa ni yul med pa can nyid do //
analyzed: des na rjes su dpag pa ni yul med pa can nyid do //
translated: Therefore, inference does not have an object.

original: gnyi ga'i zhes bya ba ni mngon sum dang rjes su dpag pa dag gi tshad ma gang yin pa de'i yul dngos po'i rang gi mtshan nyid yin pa de'i rjes su dpag pa'i bdag nyid kyi rtags las ni spyi rtogs la /
analyzed: gnyi ga'i zhes bya ba ni mngon sum dang rjes su dpag pa dag gi tshad ma gang yin pa de'i yul dngos po'i rang gi mtshan nyid yin pa de'i rjes su dpag pa'i bdag nyid kyi rtags las ni spyi rtogs la /
translated: The object of both direct perception and inference is the particular of an entity, the object of a valid cognition. The object of inference is a universal that is realized from a reason that has the nature of inference.

original: gzhan mngon sum las ni rang gi mtshan nyid yin zhes ci ste brjod 'di ltar gnyi gas kyang zhen par bya ba dang thob par bya ba ni rang gi mtshan nyid kho na yin la /
analyzed: gzhan mngon sum las ni rang gi mtshan nyid yin zhes ci ste brjod 'di ltar gnyi gas kyang zhen par bya ba dang thob par bya ba ni rang gi mtshan nyid kho na yin la /
translated: Why is it said that the other, perception, has intrinsic identity? In this way, both of them have intrinsic identity as their object of apprehension and attainment.

original: 'di dag gi tshad ma yang zhen par byas pa thob par bya ba la ltos pa yin no zhe na /
analyzed: 'di dag gi tshad ma yang zhen par byas pa thob par bya ba la ltos pa yin no zhe na /
translated: And their valid cognition is dependent on the attainment of the object of apprehension.

original: 'dir ci ltar rang gi mtshan nyid kho na phyir brjod pa de ltar bstan pa'i don du bshad pa /
analyzed: 'dir ci ltar rang gi mtshan nyid kho na phyir brjod pa de ltar bstan pa'i don du bshad pa /
translated: Here, it is explained that the intrinsic identity is taught in order to show how it is that intrinsic identity alone is expressed.

original: mngon par 'dod pa'i dgos pa bsgrub pa'i rang bzhin de gang la med pa de ni de min rang bzhin no //
analyzed: mngon par 'dod pa'i dgos pa bsgrub pa'i rang bzhin de gang la med pa de ni de min rang bzhin no //
translated: That which does not have the nature of accomplishing the desired purpose is not that, but has a different nature.

original: de las ldog pa ni tha dad pa'o //
analyzed: de las ldog pa ni tha dad pa'o //
translated: The opposite of that is different.

original: de nyid ni dngos po tsam mo //
analyzed: de nyid ni dngos po tsam mo //
translated: That itself is mere entity.

original: de rab tu grub pa ni nye bar 'jog pa ste /
analyzed: de rab tu grub pa ni nye bar 'jog pa ste /
translated: Its establishment is positing.

original: rgyu de'i phyir rtags gang la spyi'i yul yod pa de ni de skad du bshad do //
analyzed: rgyu de'i phyir rtags gang la spyi'i yul yod pa de ni de skad du bshad do //
translated: For that reason, the reason that has a universal as its object is explained in that way.

original: gal te rtags kyis de ma yin pa'i rang bzhin las log pa'i dngos po nye bar 'jog par byed pa de lta na yang /
analyzed: gal te rtags kyis de ma yin pa'i rang bzhin las log pa'i dngos po nye bar 'jog par byed pa de lta na yang /
translated: But even if a reason establishes an entity that is the opposite of a non-entity,

original: de ma yin pa'i rang bzhin las log pa de nyid dngos po'i rang gi mtshan nyid nye bar 'jog par khyad par nyid yin pa de'i phyir ci ltar spyi'i yul can du brjod ce na /
analyzed: de ma yin pa'i rang bzhin las log pa de nyid dngos po'i rang gi mtshan nyid nye bar 'jog par khyad par nyid yin pa de'i phyir ci ltar spyi'i yul can du brjod ce na /
translated: then because that which is the opposite of a non-entity is the specific characteristic of an entity, how could it be said to have a universal as its object?

original: bshad pa / khyad par tha dad pa gnas pa med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: bshad pa / khyad par tha dad pa gnas pa med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Nāgārjuna responds: Because specific differences do not endure.

original: de so sor nges par mi gnas pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de so sor nges par mi gnas pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because they do not endure as individually distinct.

original: 'di skad brjod pa yin te 'dir rang gi mtshan nyid nye bar 'jog par mi byed pa ni ma yin te /
analyzed: 'di skad brjod pa yin te 'dir rang gi mtshan nyid nye bar 'jog par mi byed pa ni ma yin te /
translated: This is what is being said: It is not that a specific characteristic is not posited here.

original: 'on kyang gang zhig de'i so sor nges pa'i rang gi mtshan nyid kyi rang bzhin gcig bu de nges pa khong du chud par mi nus pa yin te /
analyzed: 'on kyang gang zhig de'i so sor nges pa'i rang gi mtshan nyid kyi rang bzhin gcig bu de nges pa khong du chud par mi nus pa yin te /
translated: However, one is unable to ascertain that specific characteristic that is the unique nature of an entity.

original: 'di'i don byed par @180b 'gyur ba 'di kho na de'i rang bzhin yin gyi /
analyzed: 'di'i don byed par @180b 'gyur ba 'di kho na de'i rang bzhin yin gyi /
translated: This alone is the nature of an entity because it is the cause of its object.

original: gzhan ni ma yin no zhes rang bzhin gzhan yongs su spangs nas so sor nges pa'i rang bzhin ma nges pa'i phyir khyad par gnas pa med pa yin no //
analyzed: gzhan ni ma yin no zhes rang bzhin gzhan yongs su spangs nas so sor nges pa'i rang bzhin ma nges pa'i phyir khyad par gnas pa med pa yin no //
translated: But it is not the other, because it is not ascertained as having a nature that is restricted to itself, having abandoned the nature of the other.

original: gang yang de'i don byed par rung ba'i don gyi rang bzhin de ni khyad par thams cad la khyad par yod pa ma yin te /
analyzed: gang yang de'i don byed par rung ba'i don gyi rang bzhin de ni khyad par thams cad la khyad par yod pa ma yin te /
translated: And the nature of the object that is suitable to perform the function of that is not different in all the particulars.

original: des na rung ba'i rang bzhin 'dzin pa'i phyir rjes su dpag pa'i yul rang gi mtshan nyid yin no //
analyzed: des na rung ba'i rang bzhin 'dzin pa'i phyir rjes su dpag pa'i yul rang gi mtshan nyid yin no //
translated: Therefore, because it holds the nature of the suitable, the object of inference is a specifically characterized thing.

original: gang yang de ni 'di 'dra ba kho na yin gyi gzhan du ni ma yin no zhes gcig gi rung ba'i rang bzhin de nges par nus pa ma yin no //
analyzed: gang yang de ni 'di 'dra ba kho na yin gyi gzhan du ni ma yin no zhes gcig gi rung ba'i rang bzhin de nges par nus pa ma yin no //
translated: And it is not possible to ascertain the nature of the suitable of one as just this and not another.

original: khyad par ma nges pa'i rung ba 'dzin pa de'i rang gi mtshan nyid ga yin pa de spyi lta bu dang thun mong pa lta bu rjes su dpag pas rnam par 'jog par byed pa'i phyir rjes su dpag pa spyi'i yul can yin gyi thun mong ba'i rang
analyzed: khyad par ma nges pa'i rung ba 'dzin pa de'i rang gi mtshan nyid ga yin pa de spyi lta bu dang thun mong pa lta bu rjes su dpag pas rnam par 'jog par byed pa'i phyir rjes su dpag pa spyi'i yul can yin gyi thun mong ba'i rang
translated: In particular, the intrinsic character of that which holds a universal, which is not ascertained as distinct, is posited by inference to be like a universal and like a common property.

original: bzhin gcig rtogs pa'i phyir ni ma yin no //
analyzed: bzhin gcig rtogs pa'i phyir ni ma yin no //
translated: Therefore inference has a universal for its object, but not because it realizes a single common nature.

original: de nyid kyi phyir dang bo kho nar de ma yin pa'i rang bzhin las ldog pa'i dngos po tsam rtogs po tsam rtogs pa yin no zhes bshad pa yin no //
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir dang bo kho nar de ma yin pa'i rang bzhin las ldog pa'i dngos po tsam rtogs po tsam rtogs pa yin no zhes bshad pa yin no //
translated: For that very reason, it is explained that at first it realizes the mere thing that is the opposite of a nonthing.

original: 'di ltar 'di'i rang bzhin zhes bsgrub pa'i tshul du bstan na ni khyad par can gyi rang bzhin yang nye bar 'jog par byed pa yin no zhes bya bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'di ltar 'di'i rang bzhin zhes bsgrub pa'i tshul du bstan na ni khyad par can gyi rang bzhin yang nye bar 'jog par byed pa yin no zhes bya bar 'gyur ro //
translated: If it were taught in the manner of proving that this is its nature, then it would be said that it also posits a specific nature.

original: de'i rang bzhin ma yin pa las ldog pa'i ngo bo ni thams cad la khyad par med pa yin pa'i phyir de'i sgo nas spyi'i yul can du bshad do //
analyzed: de'i rang bzhin ma yin pa las ldog pa'i ngo bo ni thams cad la khyad par med pa yin pa'i phyir de'i sgo nas spyi'i yul can du bshad do //
translated: The nature of that which is not its nature is the same for all, and therefore it is explained that it has a universal for its object.

original: de nyid rnam par 'grel par bshad pa ni ;🔽gang gi phyir btso ba dang bsreg pa la sogs pa'i dgos pa gang dang ldan pa'i don de dag shes par 'dod pa'i don byed pa don du gnyer ba la de las bzlog pa phyir ci log tu gyur ba'i don de las tha dad pa dang ldan pa'i
analyzed: de nyid rnam par 'grel par bshad pa ni ; gang gi phyir btso ba dang bsreg pa la sogs pa'i dgos pa gang dang ldan pa'i don de dag shes par 'dod pa'i don byed pa don du gnyer ba la de las bzlog pa phyir ci log tu gyur ba'i don de las tha dad pa dang ldan pa'i
translated: The same is explained in the commentary:

original: don tsam zhig rtags kyi nye bar 'jog par byed de /
analyzed: don tsam zhig rtags kyi nye bar 'jog par byed de /
translated: Because the purpose of cooking, burning, etc. is to make something edible, and those who desire the object that is to be made edible seek that purpose, the mere object that is the opposite of that, which is different from that, is established as the reason

original: ston par byed pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: ston par byed pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because it is taught.

original: de'i phyir 'di'i yul ni spyi yin no //
analyzed: de'i phyir 'di'i yul ni spyi yin no //
translated: Therefore, its object is a universal.

original: 'di skad bshad pa yin te /
analyzed: 'di skad bshad pa yin te /
translated: This is what is explained.

original: mang po rnams kyi rang bzhin thun mong ba gang yin pa de des nye par 'jog pa ni ma yin gyi /
analyzed: mang po rnams kyi rang bzhin thun mong ba gang yin pa de des nye par 'jog pa ni ma yin gyi /
translated: The universal that is common to many is not established by that.

original: 'on kyang rtags kyi thun mong ma yin pa'i rang bzhin gcig nyid nges par 'jog mi nus pa des na spyi'i yul yin no //🔽spyi'i don ni khyad par med ba'i don yin gyi ;
analyzed: 'on kyang rtags kyi thun mong ma yin pa'i rang bzhin gcig nyid nges par 'jog mi nus pa des na spyi'i yul yin no // spyi'i don ni khyad par med ba'i don yin gyi ;
translated: However, the nature of the reason cannot be ascertained as being the same, and therefore it is a general object.🔽The meaning of “general” is “without distinction.”

original: thun mong gi ni don ma yin no zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: thun mong gi ni don ma yin no zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
translated: The meaning is that it is not a common object.

original: 'di nyid ston par byed pa ni don rtogs pa de las tha dad pa khyad par gnas pa med pa'i phyir te /
analyzed: 'di nyid ston par byed pa ni don rtogs pa de las tha dad pa khyad par gnas pa med pa'i phyir te /
translated: In order to demonstrate just this, he says: because the distinction does not exist apart from the realization of the object.

original: mi rtogs pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: mi rtogs pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because it is not realized.

original: dngos po rang gi mtshan nyid yod pa ni rang gi ngo bos te /
analyzed: dngos po rang gi mtshan nyid yod pa ni rang gi ngo bos te /
translated: The existence of an entity’s own characteristic is by virtue of its own nature.

original: de bskal pa ni nye bar mi 'jog ba'o //
analyzed: de bskal pa ni nye bar mi 'jog ba'o //
translated: It is not posited as being different from that.

original: 'di skad du /
analyzed: 'di skad du /
translated: This is what is being said:

original: @181a * // dngos po yod pa ston pa yin yang ma nges par ston pa'i phyir na rjes su dpag pa spyi'i yul can yin no zhes brjod pa yin no //
analyzed: @181a * // dngos po yod pa ston pa yin yang ma nges par ston pa'i phyir na rjes su dpag pa spyi'i yul can yin no zhes brjod pa yin no //
translated: even though the existence of an entity is demonstrated, because it is demonstrated as being indeterminate, inference is said to have a general object.

original: yang ci'i phyir rtags las khyad par nges par gnas pa med ce na /
analyzed: yang ci'i phyir rtags las khyad par nges par gnas pa med ce na /
translated: Why is it that the distinction does not exist apart from the reason?

original: bshad pa / 'bras bu la sogs pa'i rang bzhin gyi rtags rtogs pa nges pa yang de lta bu'i rang bzhin yin pa'i phyir te /
analyzed: bshad pa / 'bras bu la sogs pa'i rang bzhin gyi rtags rtogs pa nges pa yang de lta bu'i rang bzhin yin pa'i phyir te /
translated: Nāgārjuna responds: Because the inferential cognition of the nature of the reason, such as the effect, is ascertained in that way, it is the nature of a generality.

original: spyi'i rang bzhin yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: spyi'i rang bzhin yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because it is the nature of a generality.

original: bsam pa ni 'di yin te /
analyzed: bsam pa ni 'di yin te /
translated: The thought is this:

original: gang gi tshe bsgrub bya dang 'brel bar nges pa de'i tshe rtags kyang spyi'i rang bzhin dang spyi'i yul can du nges pa yin no //
analyzed: gang gi tshe bsgrub bya dang 'brel bar nges pa de'i tshe rtags kyang spyi'i rang bzhin dang spyi'i yul can du nges pa yin no //
translated: When the object to be established is ascertained as related, then the reason is ascertained as the nature of a generality and as having a general object.

original: 'di ltar me'i yul can rnam pa can gyi shes pa'i rgyu nyid kyis me du ba'i rgyu nyid nges pa yin la de'i shes pa'i yul nyid du ni me thams cad khyad par med pa'i phyir du ba'i rgyu spyir nges pa yin no //
analyzed: 'di ltar me'i yul can rnam pa can gyi shes pa'i rgyu nyid kyis me du ba'i rgyu nyid nges pa yin la de'i shes pa'i yul nyid du ni me thams cad khyad par med pa'i phyir du ba'i rgyu spyir nges pa yin no //
translated: In this way, the cause of the cognition that has the aspect of fire is ascertained as the cause of fire, and the cause of smoke is ascertained as the general cause of fire, because all fire is ascertained as the object of that cognition without distinction.

original: du ba yang mgrin pa dang mig rnam par 'gyur ba'i rgyu nyid kyis rnam pa gcig tu 'dzin pa'i rgyur gyur ba nyid de'i 'bras bur nges pa yin no //
analyzed: du ba yang mgrin pa dang mig rnam par 'gyur ba'i rgyu nyid kyis rnam pa gcig tu 'dzin pa'i rgyur gyur ba nyid de'i 'bras bur nges pa yin no //
translated: Smoke is ascertained as the effect of that fire because it is the cause of the cognition that apprehends it as having a single aspect, by the cause of the transformation of the throat and eyes.

original: de'i phyir gang gis na rjes su dpag par 'gyur ba tshang bang du mthong ba las phyogs gzhan na yod pa'i du ba me'i 'bras bur nges par 'gyur ba yin no //
analyzed: de'i phyir gang gis na rjes su dpag par 'gyur ba tshang bang du mthong ba las phyogs gzhan na yod pa'i du ba me'i 'bras bur nges par 'gyur ba yin no //
translated: Therefore, it is ascertained that smoke is the effect of fire, because of seeing smoke in a kitchen and not seeing it elsewhere.

original: de bzhin du rtag pa'i dngos po las bzlog pas rnam par gnas pa'i mi rtag pa nyid gang yin pa de dang byas pa nyid 'brel par nges shing /
analyzed: de bzhin du rtag pa'i dngos po las bzlog pas rnam par gnas pa'i mi rtag pa nyid gang yin pa de dang byas pa nyid 'brel par nges shing /
translated: In the same way, impermanence, which is the opposite of permanent things, is ascertained to be related to being produced.

original: byas pa nyid kyang ma byas pa las bzlog pas rnam par gnas pa mtha' dag la spyi'i rang bzhin du nges pa yin te /
analyzed: byas pa nyid kyang ma byas pa las bzlog pas rnam par gnas pa mtha' dag la spyi'i rang bzhin du nges pa yin te /
translated: And being produced is ascertained to be the universal nature of everything that is not unproduced, because of being the opposite of unproduced.

original: de'i bdag nyid ni gnod pa'i tshad mas nges pa yin la /
analyzed: de'i bdag nyid ni gnod pa'i tshad mas nges pa yin la /
translated: And that nature is ascertained by a valid cognition that refutes the opposite.

original: de yang phyogs gcig la 'jug pa ni ma yin gyi /
analyzed: de yang phyogs gcig la 'jug pa ni ma yin gyi /
translated: Moreover, it does not operate in one part,

original: 'on kyang don thams cad bsdus pa'i yul can yin te /
analyzed: 'on kyang don thams cad bsdus pa'i yul can yin te /
translated: but rather it has as its object all objects.

original: mnyan par bya ba nyid thun mong ma yin par bsgrub pa na 'chad par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: mnyan par bya ba nyid thun mong ma yin par bsgrub pa na 'chad par 'gyur ro //
translated: That it is not shared in common will be explained when establishing the uncommon subject.

original: rtags de yang spyi'i rang bzhin dang thun mong gi rnam pa'i rtags can dang 'brel pa nges pa yin pa'i phyir rtags de las rtogs pa yang de lta bu nyid du rigs so //
analyzed: rtags de yang spyi'i rang bzhin dang thun mong gi rnam pa'i rtags can dang 'brel pa nges pa yin pa'i phyir rtags de las rtogs pa yang de lta bu nyid du rigs so //
translated: And since that reason is related to a reason that has a universal nature and a common aspect, it is reasonable that the understanding derived from that reason is of that very same kind.

original: rjes su 'gro ba la ltos pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rjes su 'gro ba la ltos pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because it depends on the pervasion.

original: nye ba'i rang gi mtshan nyid la yang 'brel pa thun mong ba'i yul can yin pa 'ba' zhig tu ma zad kyi bsgrub bya rtogs pa'i dus su yang yin no //
analyzed: nye ba'i rang gi mtshan nyid la yang 'brel pa thun mong ba'i yul can yin pa 'ba' zhig tu ma zad kyi bsgrub bya rtogs pa'i dus su yang yin no //
translated: Moreover, the reason is not only related to a common object that has a proximate particular characteristic, but also at the time of understanding the probandum.

original: rtags de ni rjes su 'gro ba'i bsgrub par bya ba gang yin pa de nyid kyi sgrub par byed pa yin no //
analyzed: rtags de ni rjes su 'gro ba'i bsgrub par bya ba gang yin pa de nyid kyi sgrub par byed pa yin no //
translated: That reason is the proof of just that probandum to which it is pervaded.

original: so sor nges pa'i khyad par ni dpe dang bsgrub par bya ba'i chos can khyad par byed pa ma yin gyi /
analyzed: so sor nges pa'i khyad par ni dpe dang bsgrub par bya ba'i chos can khyad par byed pa ma yin gyi /
translated: The particularity of determination is not what distinguishes the example and the subject of the probandum,

original: 'on kyang 'bras bu de byed pa la nus pa thun mong ba nyid yin no //
analyzed: 'on kyang 'bras bu de byed pa la nus pa thun mong ba nyid yin no //
translated: but rather it is the common capacity to produce that effect.

original: gang zhig dpe'i chos can la yang mthong ba de rjes su 'gro ba'i bsgrub par bya ba'i chos can nyid la gnas pa so sor nges pa'i @181b rang bzhin gang yin pa des ni rjes su 'gro ba ma yin no //
analyzed: gang zhig dpe'i chos can la yang mthong ba de rjes su 'gro ba'i bsgrub par bya ba'i chos can nyid la gnas pa so sor nges pa'i @181b rang bzhin gang yin pa des ni rjes su 'gro ba ma yin no //
translated: Whatever is seen in the example-possessor is the nature of the probandum-possessor, which is ascertained by the presence of that which is concomitant with it.

original: dpe'i chos can la mthong ba'i rjes su 'gro ba la ltos pa'i phyir na rtags ni spyi'i yul can yin no //
analyzed: dpe'i chos can la mthong ba'i rjes su 'gro ba la ltos pa'i phyir na rtags ni spyi'i yul can yin no //
translated: The reason is a general object because it depends on the concomitance that is seen in the example-possessor.

original: de'i bsdus pa'i don ni 'di yin te /
analyzed: de'i bsdus pa'i don ni 'di yin te /
translated: The meaning of this is summarized in the following.

original: rtags kyang spyi'i rang bzhin ni spyi dang 'brel par nges pa yin la /
analyzed: rtags kyang spyi'i rang bzhin ni spyi dang 'brel par nges pa yin la /
translated: The reason is ascertained as being related to a general nature.

original: rjes su dpag par bya ba rtogs pa'i yul na yang dpe'i chos can la mthong ba'i rang bzhin rjes su 'gro ba thun mong ba dang ldan pa'i rtags la brten nas bsgrub par bya ba rtogs par 'gyur ba yin no //
analyzed: rjes su dpag par bya ba rtogs pa'i yul na yang dpe'i chos can la mthong ba'i rang bzhin rjes su 'gro ba thun mong ba dang ldan pa'i rtags la brten nas bsgrub par bya ba rtogs par 'gyur ba yin no //
translated: And the object of the inference is also a general object because it is the probandum that is ascertained by the reason, which is related to the general nature of the example-possessor.

original: de nyid kyi phyir rnam 'grel las /
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir rnam 'grel las /
translated: For that very reason, the Pramii(laviirttikam) says:

original: 'brel pa dran pas bar du chod pa'i rtags las lkog tu gyur pa'i don rtogs par bshad pa yin no //
analyzed: 'brel pa dran pas bar du chod pa'i rtags las lkog tu gyur pa'i don rtogs par bshad pa yin no //
translated: The relation is remembered, and the hidden object is understood from the sign that is interrupted.

original: des na bsgrub par bya ba rtogs pa'i dus su rtags gang gis khyab par rjes su 'gro ba rtogs pa de'i sgrub par byed pa yin la /
analyzed: des na bsgrub par bya ba rtogs pa'i dus su rtags gang gis khyab par rjes su 'gro ba rtogs pa de'i sgrub par byed pa yin la /
translated: Therefore, at the time of understanding the object to be established, the sign is the proof of that which is understood to pervade.

original: 'brel pa 'dzin pa'i dus su yang thun mong gi rang bzhin gyi rtags rnam pa ci lta bu'i bsgrub bya'i chos dang 'brel pa mthong ba de nyid kyi sgrub par byed pa yin par rig pa yin no //
analyzed: 'brel pa 'dzin pa'i dus su yang thun mong gi rang bzhin gyi rtags rnam pa ci lta bu'i bsgrub bya'i chos dang 'brel pa mthong ba de nyid kyi sgrub par byed pa yin par rig pa yin no //
translated: And at the time of apprehending the relation, the sign of a common nature is also the proof of that very object to be established, which is seen to be related in a certain way.

original: de yang khyad par med pa yin pa'i phyir gtan tshigs gnyi gas rtags spyi'i yul can du brjod pa yin no //
analyzed: de yang khyad par med pa yin pa'i phyir gtan tshigs gnyi gas rtags spyi'i yul can du brjod pa yin no //
translated: And because that is without distinction, both reasons are stated to have a general object.

original: da ni rjes su dpag pa spyi'i yul can nyid gsal bar bya ba'i phyir mngon sum rang gi mtshan nyid kyi yul can du ston par byed do //
analyzed: da ni rjes su dpag pa spyi'i yul can nyid gsal bar bya ba'i phyir mngon sum rang gi mtshan nyid kyi yul can du ston par byed do //
translated: Now, in order to clarify that inference has a general object, it is shown that perception has a particular object.

original: cig shos mngon sum ni mthong ba'i khyad par de las gzhan du gyur ba'i khyad par ni khyad par gzhan te /
analyzed: cig shos mngon sum ni mthong ba'i khyad par de las gzhan du gyur ba'i khyad par ni khyad par gzhan te /
translated: The other is perception. The difference is the distinction. The distinction that is different from that is a different distinction.

original: rgyun gzhan no //
analyzed: rgyun gzhan no //
translated: It is a different continuum.

original: de 'dzin pa ni rtogs pa'o //
analyzed: de 'dzin pa ni rtogs pa'o //
translated: The apprehension of that is the realization.

original: de dben pa ni bral ba ste /
analyzed: de dben pa ni bral ba ste /
translated: The separation from that is the freedom.

original: de dang bral ba'i rgyus na so sor gnas pa so sor nges pa gang yin pa de'i rang bzhin gyis rnam pa dang ldan par byed pa rang bzhin dang ldan par byed pas na rnam pa can yin no //
analyzed: de dang bral ba'i rgyus na so sor gnas pa so sor nges pa gang yin pa de'i rang bzhin gyis rnam pa dang ldan par byed pa rang bzhin dang ldan par byed pas na rnam pa can yin no //
translated: The cause of being free from that is the individual placement, the individual determination. The one who has that nature is the one who has the nature. The one who has the nature is the one who has the aspect.

original: 'di ltar rtsva las byung ba dang seng ldeng las byung ba la sogs pa mdun na gnas pa'i don khyad par gyi khongs su gtogs pa'i don don gzhan du rtogs pa dang 'brel pa rtogs pa yin no //
analyzed: 'di ltar rtsva las byung ba dang seng ldeng las byung ba la sogs pa mdun na gnas pa'i don khyad par gyi khongs su gtogs pa'i don don gzhan du rtogs pa dang 'brel pa rtogs pa yin no //
translated: Thus, the object that arises from grass, arises from khadira wood, and so on, is the object that is included in the distinction. The object that is connected to the realization of a different object is the realization.

original: des na rang gi mtshan nyid de mngon sum gang la rang gi ngo bo'i yul yod pa de la de skad ces brjod do //
analyzed: des na rang gi mtshan nyid de mngon sum gang la rang gi ngo bo'i yul yod pa de la de skad ces brjod do //
translated: Therefore, that intrinsic identity is the direct perception. The one who has the object of its own nature is called that.

original: 'dir skad cig gi khyad bar gyis tha dad par ni mi rtag ste /
analyzed: 'dir skad cig gi khyad bar gyis tha dad par ni mi rtag ste /
translated: Here, it is not impermanent by virtue of a difference in moment.

original: gang gi phyir khyad par gang la mngon sum gyis stobs kyis nges pa'i shes pa skyes pa'i khyad par de nyid kyis mngon sum don dang ldan par brjod pa yin na /
analyzed: gang gi phyir khyad par gang la mngon sum gyis stobs kyis nges pa'i shes pa skyes pa'i khyad par de nyid kyis mngon sum don dang ldan par brjod pa yin na /
translated: Because, when a cognition of ascertainment arises by the power of perception with regard to a difference, that very difference is said to be the object of perception.

original: skad cig ma nyid la ni zhen pa'i shes pa yod pa ma yin te /
analyzed: skad cig ma nyid la ni zhen pa'i shes pa yod pa ma yin te /
translated: But there is no cognition of ascertainment with regard to momentariness.

original: de'i des ni mngon sum don dang ldan pa ma yin no //
analyzed: de'i des ni mngon sum don dang ldan pa ma yin no //
translated: Therefore, it is not the object of perception.

original: skad cig gi dngos po ni mngon sum gyis thob par yang mi nus te /
analyzed: skad cig gi dngos po ni mngon sum gyis thob par yang mi nus te /
translated: And a momentary thing cannot be apprehended by perception.

original: des na mngon sum @182a * //
analyzed: des na mngon sum @182a * //
translated: Therefore, perception

original: gyi tshad ma ni de'i yul can ma yin gyi /
analyzed: gyi tshad ma ni de'i yul can ma yin gyi /
translated: is not a valid cognition with regard to that.

original: 'on kyang de'i rgyun gyi khongs su gtogs pa'i skad cig gzhan yul yin no //
analyzed: 'on kyang de'i rgyun gyi khongs su gtogs pa'i skad cig gzhan yul yin no //
translated: However, another moment belonging to its continuum is the object.

original: de nyid kyi phyir tshad ma rnams kyi 'jug pa'i yul ni nges pa'i don yin no //
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir tshad ma rnams kyi 'jug pa'i yul ni nges pa'i don yin no //
translated: For that very reason, the object of engagement of the valid cognitions is a definite object.

original: de'i phyir mngon sum gyis so sor nges pa'i rgyun rgyun gzhan gyis dben pa'i rang bzhin du gzung bas mngon sum rang gi mtshan nyid kyi yul can no //
analyzed: de'i phyir mngon sum gyis so sor nges pa'i rgyun rgyun gzhan gyis dben pa'i rang bzhin du gzung bas mngon sum rang gi mtshan nyid kyi yul can no //
translated: Therefore, since the continuum is apprehended by direct perception as having a nature that is isolated from other continua, direct perception has a particular characteristic as its object.

original: rang las de bdag nyid las don rtogs pa yin pa'i rgyu'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rang las de bdag nyid las don rtogs pa yin pa'i rgyu'i phyir ro //
translated: Because the object is understood from itself, from its own nature, it is the cause.

original: gang gi phyir rang nyid las don de rtogs pa yin gyi /
analyzed: gang gi phyir rang nyid las don de rtogs pa yin gyi /
translated: Because the object is understood from itself,

original: gzhan rtags las ni ma yin pa de'i phyir khyad par nges pa rtogs pa yin no zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: gzhan rtags las ni ma yin pa de'i phyir khyad par nges pa rtogs pa yin no zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
translated: not from another, from a reason, therefore it is the understanding of a particular, that is the meaning.

original: rtogs pa gang la rgyu'i yan lag gzhan yod pa gzhan dang 'brel pa las rtogs pa de ni khyad par nges pa'i yul can ma yin te /
analyzed: rtogs pa gang la rgyu'i yan lag gzhan yod pa gzhan dang 'brel pa las rtogs pa de ni khyad par nges pa'i yul can ma yin te /
translated: That understanding which has another causal factor, which is related to another, is not the understanding of a particular.

original: sgrub par byed pa gzhan de nyid la nus pa med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: sgrub par byed pa gzhan de nyid la nus pa med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because another proof has no power in that.

original: ji ltar nus pa med ce na /
analyzed: ji ltar nus pa med ce na /
translated: How does it have no power?

original: gang gi phyir thun mong gi rang bzhin gyis rtags thun mong gi rang bzhin dang 'brel pa shes shing dpe'i chos can dang thun mong pa'i rang bzhin du khyab pa yang shes nas bsgrub par bya ba rtogs par bya ba yin no /
analyzed: gang gi phyir thun mong gi rang bzhin gyis rtags thun mong gi rang bzhin dang 'brel pa shes shing dpe'i chos can dang thun mong pa'i rang bzhin du khyab pa yang shes nas bsgrub par bya ba rtogs par bya ba yin no /
translated: Because the reason, which is related to a common nature, is known to be related to a common nature, and because the pervasion of the subject of the example by the common nature is known, the probandum is understood.

original: bsgrub par bya ba'i chos can la rtags bsgrub bya med na mi 'byung ba nyid du rtogs pa gang yin pa de nyid ni bsgrub bya rtogs pa yin no //
analyzed: bsgrub par bya ba'i chos can la rtags bsgrub bya med na mi 'byung ba nyid du rtogs pa gang yin pa de nyid ni bsgrub bya rtogs pa yin no //
translated: That very understanding of the reason as invariably concomitant with the probandum on the subject of the probandum is the understanding of the probandum.

original: rtags ni sgron ma bzhin du lkog tu gyur ba'i don gsal bar byed pa ni ma yin no ;
analyzed: rtags ni sgron ma bzhin du lkog tu gyur ba'i don gsal bar byed pa ni ma yin no ;
translated: The reason does not illuminate a hidden object as if it were a lamp.

original: / de'i phyir rtags gzhan de nyid ni khyad par nye bar 'jog par nus pa ma yin no //
analyzed: / de'i phyir rtags gzhan de nyid ni khyad par nye bar 'jog par nus pa ma yin no //
translated: Therefore, that very other reason is not able to posit a distinction.

original: 'o na de ci ltar rang gi mtshan nyid kyi yul can yin zhe na /
analyzed: 'o na de ci ltar rang gi mtshan nyid kyi yul can yin zhe na /
translated: Well then, how is it that it has a particular object?

original: bshad pa / rang gi mtshan nyid kyi don la mi slu ba ni nges pa sngon du 'gro ba can gyi thob par byed pa ste /
analyzed: bshad pa / rang gi mtshan nyid kyi don la mi slu ba ni nges pa sngon du 'gro ba can gyi thob par byed pa ste /
translated: It is said: Non-deception regarding the object of its own characteristic is the attainment preceded by ascertainment.

original: mi slu ba ni mngon sum dang rjes su dpag pa gnyi ga yang mtshungs pa'i phyir gnyi ga'i tshad ma ni dngos po'i yul can nyid do //
analyzed: mi slu ba ni mngon sum dang rjes su dpag pa gnyi ga yang mtshungs pa'i phyir gnyi ga'i tshad ma ni dngos po'i yul can nyid do //
translated: Because nondeception is the same for both perception and inference, both are valid cognitions that have real objects.

original: de'i phyir de ltar mngon sum gyi gzung ba ni rang gi mtshan nyid yin la rjes su dpag pa'i ni spyi yin no //
analyzed: de'i phyir de ltar mngon sum gyi gzung ba ni rang gi mtshan nyid yin la rjes su dpag pa'i ni spyi yin no //
translated: Thus, the object of perception is a particular, and the object of inference is a universal.

original: ji ltar gzung ba dang dngos po ma yin pa'i phyir de la ltos nas tshad ma ma yin pa de bzhin du /
analyzed: ji ltar gzung ba dang dngos po ma yin pa'i phyir de la ltos nas tshad ma ma yin pa de bzhin du /
translated: Just as it is not a valid cognition in relation to that because it does not apprehend the object as it is,

original: mngon sum yang gzung ba'i yul skad cig ma cig la tshad ma ma yin te /
analyzed: mngon sum yang gzung ba'i yul skad cig ma cig la tshad ma ma yin te /
translated: so too perception is not a valid cognition in relation to the object that is apprehended, a single moment.

original: de thob par mi nus pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de thob par mi nus pa'i phyir ro //
translated: This is because it is not able to obtain it.

original: de'i phyir tshad ma gnyi ga yang nges par byas pa'i rgyun la ltos na rang gi mtshan nyid kyis yul can du mtshungs so //
analyzed: de'i phyir tshad ma gnyi ga yang nges par byas pa'i rgyun la ltos na rang gi mtshan nyid kyis yul can du mtshungs so //
translated: Therefore, both valid cognitions are the same in having a particular as their object in relation to a continuum that is ascertained.

original: 'on kyang so sor nges pa'i rgyud bdag nyid kyi rang bzhin gyis don byed pa rgyud gzhan gyis dben par nye bar 'jog par byed pa'i phyir mngon sum @182b rang gi mtshan nyid kyi yul can yin la /
analyzed: 'on kyang so sor nges pa'i rgyud bdag nyid kyi rang bzhin gyis don byed pa rgyud gzhan gyis dben par nye bar 'jog par byed pa'i phyir mngon sum @182b rang gi mtshan nyid kyi yul can yin la /
translated: However, direct perception is the valid knowledge that has a particular object that is the nature of itself, because it is posited as the object that is isolated from other continuums that perform a function by its own nature.

original: rjes su dpag pas ni rgyun gzhan las rnam par bcad pa'i so sor nges pa'i khyad par gcig nyid 'jog par mi nus pa'i phyir spyi'i yul can yin no //
analyzed: rjes su dpag pas ni rgyun gzhan las rnam par bcad pa'i so sor nges pa'i khyad par gcig nyid 'jog par mi nus pa'i phyir spyi'i yul can yin no //
translated: Inference is the valid knowledge that has a general object because it is not able to posit the particular that is isolated from other continuums.

original: yul la log par rtogs pa'i lhag ma bsal nas /
analyzed: yul la log par rtogs pa'i lhag ma bsal nas /
translated: Having cleared away the remainder of mistaken objects,

original: tshul gsum rtags las zhes gang bshad pa'i tshul gsum pa de nyid bstan pa'i phyir bshad pa /
analyzed: tshul gsum rtags las zhes gang bshad pa'i tshul gsum pa de nyid bstan pa'i phyir bshad pa /
translated: in order to teach the three modes that were explained in the passage, “from a reason,” it is said:

original: 'chad par 'gyur ba'i rjes su dpag par bya ba'i rang bzhin la yod pa dang / de dang mtshungs pa mthun pa'i phyogs la yod par nges pa dang / med pa mi mthun pa'i phyogs la med par nges pa'o //
analyzed: 'chad par 'gyur ba'i rjes su dpag par bya ba'i rang bzhin la yod pa dang / de dang mtshungs pa mthun pa'i phyogs la yod par nges pa dang / med pa mi mthun pa'i phyogs la med par nges pa'o //
translated: The existence in the object of inference, the ascertainment of existence in similar instances that are concordant with that, and the ascertainment of nonexistence in dissimilar instances that are not concordant with that.

original: rjes su dpag par bya ba yang gang zhe na /
analyzed: rjes su dpag par bya ba yang gang zhe na /
translated: What is the object of inference?

original: bshad pa / shes par 'dod pa ste /
analyzed: bshad pa / shes par 'dod pa ste /
translated: The treatise states:🔽That which is to be known is the object of inference.🔽That which is to be known is the object of inference.

original: shes par bya ba'i don du 'dod pa'i bye brag gang la yod pa /🔽de la de skad ces bya ste /
analyzed: shes par bya ba'i don du 'dod pa'i bye brag gang la yod pa / de la de skad ces bya ste /
translated: That which is to be known is the object of inference.

original: rjes su dpag par bya ba ni chos can yin no //🔽rjes su dpag par bya ba'i tha snyad ni rnam pa gsum la yin te /
analyzed: rjes su dpag par bya ba ni chos can yin no // rjes su dpag par bya ba'i tha snyad ni rnam pa gsum la yin te /
translated: That which is to be known is the object of inference.🔽That which is to be known is the object of inference.🔽That which is to be known is the object of inference.

original: sgrub par byed pa las rtogs pa chos dang chos can gyi spyi gang yin pa de ni dngos su rjes su dpag par bya ba yin zhing /
analyzed: sgrub par byed pa las rtogs pa chos dang chos can gyi spyi gang yin pa de ni dngos su rjes su dpag par bya ba yin zhing /
translated: That which is to be known is the object of inference.🔽That which is to be known is the object of inference.🔽That which is to be known is the object of inference.🔽That which is to be known is the object of inference.🔽That which is to be known is the object of inference.

original: khyab pa'i yul bsgrub par bya ba'i chos dang gtan tshigs kyi mtshan nyid kyi yul chos can ni btags nas rjes su dpag pa yin no //
analyzed: khyab pa'i yul bsgrub par bya ba'i chos dang gtan tshigs kyi mtshan nyid kyi yul chos can ni btags nas rjes su dpag pa yin no //
translated: That which is to be known is the object of inference.🔽That which is to be known is the object of inference.🔽That which is to be known is the object of inference.🔽That which is to be known is the object of inference.🔽That which is to be known is the object of inference.🔽That which is to be known is the object of inference.🔽That which is to be known is the object of inference.🔽That which is to be known is the object of inference.🔽That which is to be known is the object of inference.🔽That which is to be known is the object of inference.🔽That which is to be known is the object of inference.

original: 'di'i yul la spyi'i ni rjes su dpag par bya ba ma yin te /🔽de lta bu'i spyi la rtags ma grub pa'i phyir ro //🔽de la grub na yang rtags nyid ma yin te /
analyzed: 'di'i yul la spyi'i ni rjes su dpag par bya ba ma yin te / de lta bu'i spyi la rtags ma grub pa'i phyir ro // de la grub na yang rtags nyid ma yin te /
translated: That which is to be known is the object of inference.🔽That which is to be known is the object of inference.

original: bsgrub par bya ba med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: bsgrub par bya ba med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: That which is to be known is the object of inference.🔽That which is to be known is the object of inference.🔽That which is to be known is the object of inference.🔽That which is to be known is the object of inference.🔽That which is to be known is the object of inference.🔽That which is to be known is the object of inference.🔽That which is to be known is the object of inference.🔽That which is to be known is the object of inference.🔽That which is to be known is the object of inference.🔽That which is to be known is the object of inference.🔽That which is to be known is the object of inference.🔽That which is to be known is the object of inference.🔽That which is to be known is the object of inference.🔽That which is to be known is the object of inference.🔽That which is to be known is the object of inference.

original: chos tsam yang 'dir rjes su dpag par bya ba ma yin te /
analyzed: chos tsam yang 'dir rjes su dpag par bya ba ma yin te /
translated: The mere property is not to be inferred here,

original: rjes su 'gro ba dang ldog pa'i sgo nas de lta bu'i chos tsam la yod par 'chad par 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rjes su 'gro ba dang ldog pa'i sgo nas de lta bu'i chos tsam la yod par 'chad par 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
translated: because it is explained that the mere property exists through the process of positive and negative concomitance.

original: de'i phyir chos can nyid rjes su dpag par bya zhes khyad par du byas pa yin no //
analyzed: de'i phyir chos can nyid rjes su dpag par bya zhes khyad par du byas pa yin no //
translated: Therefore, the property-possessor itself is qualified as being the object to be inferred.

original: 'dir zhes bya ba ni gtan tshigs kyi mtshan nyid kyi skabs 'dir ro //
analyzed: 'dir zhes bya ba ni gtan tshigs kyi mtshan nyid kyi skabs 'dir ro //
translated: Here means in this context of the definition of the reason.

original: rjes su dpag par bya ba de la mthong ba ni nges pa ste /
analyzed: rjes su dpag par bya ba de la mthong ba ni nges pa ste /
translated: The seeing of that object to be inferred is ascertainment.

original: sa phyogs su du ba ni mngon sum gyis yin la /
analyzed: sa phyogs su du ba ni mngon sum gyis yin la /
translated: Smoke is seen in a particular place by direct perception.

original: sgra la byas pa nyid ni rjes su dpag pas yin no //
analyzed: sgra la byas pa nyid ni rjes su dpag pas yin no //
translated: Sound is seen to be produced by inference.

original: de la yod pa tshad ma las yin pa 'ba' zhig tu ma zad kyi /
analyzed: de la yod pa tshad ma las yin pa 'ba' zhig tu ma zad kyi /
translated: Not only is existence established by a valid cognition,

original: de bzhin du de dang mtshungs pa nyid de mthun pa'i phyogs la yang ngo //
analyzed: de bzhin du de dang mtshungs pa nyid de mthun pa'i phyogs la yang ngo //
translated: but also that it is similar to that, that is, it exists in the similar class.

original: nyid kyi sgras ni mi mthun pa'i phyogs las ldog pa ston pa yin la /
analyzed: nyid kyi sgras ni mi mthun pa'i phyogs las ldog pa ston pa yin la /
translated: The word itself indicates that it is the opposite of the dissimilar class.

original: yang gi sgra ni sdud pa'o //
analyzed: yang gi sgra ni sdud pa'o //
translated: The word also is a conjunction.

original: rjes su dpag par bya ba'i chos can gyi khyad par du byas pa ni rnam par bcad par gzhan dpe'i chos can la yod pa srid pa ni 'gal lo //🔽de ste yang chos can gyis khyad par du mi byed na ni de'i tshe rjes @183a * //
analyzed: rjes su dpag par bya ba'i chos can gyi khyad par du byas pa ni rnam par bcad par gzhan dpe'i chos can la yod pa srid pa ni 'gal lo // de ste yang chos can gyis khyad par du mi byed na ni de'i tshe rjes @183a * //
translated: It is contradictory that the subject of the object to be inferred is specified, and that it is possible for the example subject to have the opposite.🔽If the subject is not specified, then at that time the property of the object to be inferred is the reason.

original: su dpag par bya ba'i chos gtan tshigs yin no zhes gtan tshigs rjes su dpag par bya ba'i chos ma yin par 'gyur na 'dod pa ni yin no //
analyzed: su dpag par bya ba'i chos gtan tshigs yin no zhes gtan tshigs rjes su dpag par bya ba'i chos ma yin par 'gyur na 'dod pa ni yin no //
translated: The reason would not be the property of the object to be inferred, but that is accepted.

original: don ni 'di yin te /
analyzed: don ni 'di yin te /
translated: The meaning is this:🔽Just as the king's man is distinguished from others, in the same way, the property of the object to be inferred distinguishes the subject from others.

original: dper na rgyal po'i skyes bu gzhan las rnam par gcad pa de bzhin du rjes su dpag par bya bas kyang chos chos can gzhan la rnam par gcod pa yin no zhes gzhan dogs pa la ma yin te zhes smos te /
analyzed: dper na rgyal po'i skyes bu gzhan las rnam par gcad pa de bzhin du rjes su dpag par bya bas kyang chos chos can gzhan la rnam par gcod pa yin no zhes gzhan dogs pa la ma yin te zhes smos te /
translated: If you suspect that, it is said no.

original: gzhan la yod pa 'gal ba ma yin no //
analyzed: gzhan la yod pa 'gal ba ma yin no //
translated: It is not contradictory for it to exist elsewhere.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: mi ldan pa ma 'brel pa rnam par gcod pa bzlog pa'i rgyus ni chos khyad par byas pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: mi ldan pa ma 'brel pa rnam par gcod pa bzlog pa'i rgyus ni chos khyad par byas pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because the cause of the exclusion of non-possession, which is non-connection, is the qualifier of the property.

original: 'di skad bshad pa yin te /
analyzed: 'di skad bshad pa yin te /
translated: This is explained as follows.

original: mi ldan pa rnam par gcad pa nyid byas nas chos can gyi chos rnam par gcad kyi /
analyzed: mi ldan pa rnam par gcad pa nyid byas nas chos can gyi chos rnam par gcad kyi /
translated: Having made the exclusion of non-possession, the property of the subject is excluded.

original: gzhan dang ldan pa rnam par gcod pa ni ma yin no //
analyzed: gzhan dang ldan pa rnam par gcod pa ni ma yin no //
translated: But not the exclusion of possession by another.

original: ci gang gis ma 'brel pa rnam par gcod pa zhes khyad par du brjod pa rnam par gcod pa rnam pa du ma yod dam zhe na /
analyzed: ci gang gis ma 'brel pa rnam par gcod pa zhes khyad par du brjod pa rnam par gcod pa rnam pa du ma yod dam zhe na /
translated: Is there a variety of exclusions that are specified by the phrase the exclusion of non-connection?

original: yod do zhes brjod do //
analyzed: yod do zhes brjod do //
translated: It is said that there is.

original: chos can gyi gzhan gyi dbang brten pa chos kyi tshig phrad nyid ces bya pa'i sgra tha dad par byed pa yin pas mi ldan pa ma 'brel pa dang / gzhan dang ldan pa gzhan dang 'brel pa dang / gtan mi ldan pa shin tu mi srid pa rnam par gcod byed zlog par byed do //
analyzed: chos can gyi gzhan gyi dbang brten pa chos kyi tshig phrad nyid ces bya pa'i sgra tha dad par byed pa yin pas mi ldan pa ma 'brel pa dang / gzhan dang ldan pa gzhan dang 'brel pa dang / gtan mi ldan pa shin tu mi srid pa rnam par gcod byed zlog par byed do //
translated: The word only is the differentiator of the dependent, which is the subject, and the words based on the connection with the property are the differentiators of the exclusion of non-possession, non-connection, and the exclusion of possession by another, connection with another, and the exclusion of the utterly impossible, complete impossibility.

original: nyid kyi sgra ni rnam par gcod pa ni 'di tsam mo zhes rnam par gcod pa nges par ston to //
analyzed: nyid kyi sgra ni rnam par gcod pa ni 'di tsam mo zhes rnam par gcod pa nges par ston to //
translated: The word “only” indicates the exclusion, i.e., the determination, that this much is the definition.

original: dang gi sgras ni yod pa'i dngos po sdud pa'o //
analyzed: dang gi sgras ni yod pa'i dngos po sdud pa'o //
translated: The word “and” includes existent entities.

original: yang ji ltar na tshig phrad gcig gis brjod par bya ba'i don phan tshun 'gal ba gsum 'jog par nus she na /
analyzed: yang ji ltar na tshig phrad gcig gis brjod par bya ba'i don phan tshun 'gal ba gsum 'jog par nus she na /
translated: How can one express by a single compound word three mutually contradictory meanings?

original: rgyu mtshan bstan pa'i phyir smras pa ni khyad par dang khyad par can te /
analyzed: rgyu mtshan bstan pa'i phyir smras pa ni khyad par dang khyad par can te /
translated: In order to show the reason, he says: “the qualifier and the qualified, etc.”

original: de dag gi rjod par byed pa dag dang lhan cig brjod pa dang / bya ba zhes bya ba'i tshig dang lhan cig brjod pa'o //
analyzed: de dag gi rjod par byed pa dag dang lhan cig brjod pa dang / bya ba zhes bya ba'i tshig dang lhan cig brjod pa'o //
translated: The expression “together with” refers to the expression of those, i.e., the qualifier and the qualified, and the expression “together with” refers to the expression of the action.

original: 'di la bsam pa ni 'di yin te /
analyzed: 'di la bsam pa ni 'di yin te /
translated: The idea is as follows:

original: tshig phrad ni gsal bar byed pa yin la /
analyzed: tshig phrad ni gsal bar byed pa yin la /
translated: The compound word is the illuminator.

original: gsal bar byed pa las ni tshig gzhan gyis brjod par bya ba'i don phyis 'byung ba'i khyad par gang yin pa de gsal bar byed pa yin gyi /
analyzed: gsal bar byed pa las ni tshig gzhan gyis brjod par bya ba'i don phyis 'byung ba'i khyad par gang yin pa de gsal bar byed pa yin gyi /
translated: From the illuminator, that which is the qualifier that occurs later, the meaning to be expressed by another word, is the illuminator.

original: rang dbang du ni brjod par bya ba'i don dang ldan pa ma yin no //
analyzed: rang dbang du ni brjod par bya ba'i don dang ldan pa ma yin no //
translated: But it does not independently have the meaning to be expressed.

original: des na gsal bar byed pa'i tshig gang dang 'brel bar brjod pa des ni tshigs der gtogs pa'i khyad par gsal bar bya ba ma yin gyi /
analyzed: des na gsal bar byed pa'i tshig gang dang 'brel bar brjod pa des ni tshigs der gtogs pa'i khyad par gsal bar bya ba ma yin gyi /
translated: Therefore, the word that clarifies the connection with that is not the clarification of the particular that belongs to that term,

original: gzhan ni 'ga' yang ma yin no //
analyzed: gzhan ni 'ga' yang ma yin no //
translated: but it is not any other.

original: de'i phyir 'di'i don ni tshig gzhan dang 'brel bas rnam par 'jog par byed do //
analyzed: de'i phyir 'di'i don ni tshig gzhan dang 'brel bas rnam par 'jog par byed do //
translated: Therefore, the meaning of this is that it is established by the connection with another word.

original: khyad par ni 'dir brten pa ste chos la bya'o //
analyzed: khyad par ni 'dir brten pa ste chos la bya'o //
translated: The particular is the dependent in this case, and it is called the property.

original: khyad par can ni chos can la brjod do //
analyzed: khyad par can ni chos can la brjod do //
translated: The possessor of the particular is called the property possessor.

original: des na rjes su dpag @183b par bya ba la zhes bdun pa'i mtha' can yin yang khyad par can nyid do //
analyzed: des na rjes su dpag @183b par bya ba la zhes bdun pa'i mtha' can yin yang khyad par can nyid do //
translated: Therefore, the object of inference, although having an ending in the seventh case, is the possessor of the particular.

original: rten yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rten yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because it is the basis.

original: chos ni dang po'i mtha' can yin yang khyad par nyid de brten pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: chos ni dang po'i mtha' can yin yang khyad par nyid de brten pa'i phyir ro //
translated: The property, although having an ending in the first case, is the particular because it is dependent.

original: 'o na ni gang gi tshe tshig phrad ma sbyar ba de'i tshe ji ltar rnam par bcad pa rtogs par bya zhe na /
analyzed: 'o na ni gang gi tshe tshig phrad ma sbyar ba de'i tshe ji ltar rnam par bcad pa rtogs par bya zhe na /
translated: But when the words are not compounded, how is the exclusion understood at that time?

original: smras pa / de sbyar med kyang brjod 'dod de brjod par 'dod pa las tshig phrad de'i don gang yin pa rtogs par 'gyur te /
analyzed: smras pa / de sbyar med kyang brjod 'dod de brjod par 'dod pa las tshig phrad de'i don gang yin pa rtogs par 'gyur te /
translated: Objection: Even if they are not connected, the meaning of the words that are uttered is understood from the desire to speak.

original: gang gis gang sbyar ba de las don de rtogs par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gang gis gang sbyar ba de las don de rtogs par 'gyur ro //
translated: The meaning of that is understood from that which is connected to that.

original: gang gi phyir gal te don de ston par mi 'dod na ni ngag sbyar ba don med par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gang gi phyir gal te don de ston par mi 'dod na ni ngag sbyar ba don med par 'gyur ro //
translated: Because if one does not desire to speak that meaning, then the connection of the words would be meaningless.

original: ci ltar don med ce na /
analyzed: ci ltar don med ce na /
translated: How is it meaningless?

original: bshad pa / gang phyir te gang gi phyir dag gang la 'bras bu rnam par gcod pa yod pa ste de'i phyir ro //
analyzed: bshad pa / gang phyir te gang gi phyir dag gang la 'bras bu rnam par gcod pa yod pa ste de'i phyir ro //
translated: It is said: Because, if the result of the words is to be excluded, then it is meaningless.

original: dper na chu 'on cig ces smras pa na /
analyzed: dper na chu 'on cig ces smras pa na /
translated: For example, if one says “Bring water,”

original: gal te chu'am gzhan yang rung ba zhig khyer te 'ong bar 'dod na ni chu smos pa don med par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gal te chu'am gzhan yang rung ba zhig khyer te 'ong bar 'dod na ni chu smos pa don med par 'gyur ro //
translated: if one desires to bring water or something else, then the mention of water is meaningless.

original: ci ste yang khyer te 'ong bar mi 'dod na ni /
analyzed: ci ste yang khyer te 'ong bar mi 'dod na ni /
translated: But if one does not desire to bring it,

original: 'on cig ces smos pa don med par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'on cig ces smos pa don med par 'gyur ro //
translated: then the mention of “bring” is meaningless.

original: de bzhin du tshig gi don du ma bsdus pa'i bdag nyid ngag gi don kyang skabs kyi dbang gis rnam pa ci zhig ltar rnam par gcad pa smra ba po dag gi 'bras bur 'dod pa yin no //
analyzed: de bzhin du tshig gi don du ma bsdus pa'i bdag nyid ngag gi don kyang skabs kyi dbang gis rnam pa ci zhig ltar rnam par gcad pa smra ba po dag gi 'bras bur 'dod pa yin no //
translated: In the same way, the meaning of the word “self,” which is not included in the meaning of the words, is also the result of the speaker’s intention, depending on the context.

original: 'di ltar gal te nag pa 'phong mi skyen na /
analyzed: 'di ltar gal te nag pa 'phong mi skyen na /
translated: For example, if a man named Black is not a skilled archer,

original: 'phong skyen zhes mi brjod cing /
analyzed: 'phong skyen zhes mi brjod cing /
translated: he is not called a skilled archer.

original: de bzhin du 'phong skyen pa phul du byung ba gzhan yang yod na srid sgrub 'phong skyen par brjod par mi bya ste /
analyzed: de bzhin du 'phong skyen pa phul du byung ba gzhan yang yod na srid sgrub 'phong skyen par brjod par mi bya ste /
translated: In the same way, if there are other skilled archers, then Arjuna is not called a skilled archer,

original: de 'phong skyen pa ni grub pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de 'phong skyen pa ni grub pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because his skill is already established.

original: gal te sngon po padma mi srid na ni sngon po zhes brjod par mi bya'o //
analyzed: gal te sngon po padma mi srid na ni sngon po zhes brjod par mi bya'o //
translated: If blue is not possible in a lotus, then it is not called blue.

original: des na gang gi don bstan par 'dod pa'i brjod par 'dod pa gang yin pa de las nges par gzung ba'i don rtogs pa nyid do //
analyzed: des na gang gi don bstan par 'dod pa'i brjod par 'dod pa gang yin pa de las nges par gzung ba'i don rtogs pa nyid do //
translated: Therefore, the meaning of the words is understood from the words that express the intended meaning.

original: rnam par gcod pa rnam pa gsum ka la yang dpe ston pa ni dper na nag pa 'phong skyen pa'am zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o ;
analyzed: rnam par gcod pa rnam pa gsum ka la yang dpe ston pa ni dper na nag pa 'phong skyen pa'am zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o ;
translated: The example of the three kinds of exclusion is such as “like Nīlaka, the archer.

original: /'di la gzhan rtogs pa'i don du ngag sbyor ba na pha rol pos rmongs pa gang dogs par byas pa de nyid rnam par gcad par bya ba yin no //
analyzed: /'di la gzhan rtogs pa'i don du ngag sbyor ba na pha rol pos rmongs pa gang dogs par byas pa de nyid rnam par gcad par bya ba yin no //
translated: ” When one employs speech for the sake of making others understand, the exclusion of just that which is suspected to be confused by the opponent is the object of exclusion.

original: nag pa ni 'phong skyen par 'jig rten na grags pa med do //
analyzed: nag pa ni 'phong skyen par 'jig rten na grags pa med do //
translated: Nīlaka is not known in the world to be an archer.

original: des na nag pa 'phong mi skyen par dogs pa rnam par gcad par bya ba'i don du 'phong skyen pa bsgrub pa'i phyir ngag sbyor ba yin no //
analyzed: des na nag pa 'phong mi skyen par dogs pa rnam par gcad par bya ba'i don du 'phong skyen pa bsgrub pa'i phyir ngag sbyor ba yin no //
translated: Therefore, in order to exclude the suspicion that Nīlaka is not an archer, one employs speech in order to establish that he is an archer.

original: des na ngag gi rnam par gcad pa'i 'bras bu 'di 'dra ba yin no //
analyzed: des na ngag gi rnam par gcad pa'i 'bras bu 'di 'dra ba yin no //
translated: Thus the result of the exclusion of speech is like this.

original: srid sgrub ni 'phong skyen par grags pa'i phyir 'gal ba yang dogs pa med do //
analyzed: srid sgrub ni 'phong skyen par grags pa'i phyir 'gal ba yang dogs pa med do //
translated: Since Arjuna is known to be an archer, there is no suspicion of contradiction.

original: de'i phyir 'phong skyen pa nyid phul du byung ba gang yin pa de skyes bu gzhan dang thun mong du rtogs pa'i phyir de rnam par gcad pa'i @184a * //
analyzed: de'i phyir 'phong skyen pa nyid phul du byung ba gang yin pa de skyes bu gzhan dang thun mong du rtogs pa'i phyir de rnam par gcad pa'i @184a * //
translated: Therefore, because the excellence of skill in archery is understood to be common to other persons, it is excluded.🔽

original: don du srid sgrub nyid 'phong skyen no zhes rnam par gcod pa dag gi 'bras bu yin no //
analyzed: don du srid sgrub nyid 'phong skyen no zhes rnam par gcod pa dag gi 'bras bu yin no //
translated: Therefore, since the excellence of his skill in archery is understood to be common to other men, the statement “Arjuna is skilled in archery” is the result of an exclusion.

original: sngon po'i kha dog gi dbyin pa'i padma ni rab tu grub la /
analyzed: sngon po'i kha dog gi dbyin pa'i padma ni rab tu grub la /
translated: The statement “The lotus is blue” is established as a positive object.

original: ci 'di'i rang bzhin can la sngon po nyid srid dam mi srid ces dogs pa de'i tshe /
analyzed: ci 'di'i rang bzhin can la sngon po nyid srid dam mi srid ces dogs pa de'i tshe /
translated: But when there is doubt as to whether or not its nature is blue,

original: de rnam par gcad pa'i don du sngon po mtsho skyes srid pa nyid do zhes bya ba'i ngag yin no //
analyzed: de rnam par gcad pa'i don du sngon po mtsho skyes srid pa nyid do zhes bya ba'i ngag yin no //
translated: the statement “The blue lotus exists” is an exclusion.

original: gal te nag pa'i don 'phong skyen pa nyid do zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i ngag la 'phang skyen pa la sogs pa'i sgra'i brjod par bya bar ma gyur ba de dag kyang 'phong skyen pa nyid la sogs par sgra'i brjod par bya ba dag las gzhan yin
analyzed: gal te nag pa'i don 'phong skyen pa nyid do zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i ngag la 'phang skyen pa la sogs pa'i sgra'i brjod par bya bar ma gyur ba de dag kyang 'phong skyen pa nyid la sogs par sgra'i brjod par bya ba dag las gzhan yin
translated: If the meaning of “black” is “skilled in archery,” etc., and if that which is not the referent of the word “skilled in archery,” etc., is also other than that which is the referent of the word “skilled in archery,” etc.,

original: pas tha dad par byed pa'i tshig gi phrad las ldog par rtogs na /
analyzed: pas tha dad par byed pa'i tshig gi phrad las ldog par rtogs na /
translated: If one understands the negation of a word that differentiates,

original: 'o na ni gzhan yod par khyad par med pa'i phyir gtong phod la sogs pa'i chos gzhan dag kyang ldog par rtogs par 'gyur ro zhes dogs pa la /
analyzed: 'o na ni gzhan yod par khyad par med pa'i phyir gtong phod la sogs pa'i chos gzhan dag kyang ldog par rtogs par 'gyur ro zhes dogs pa la /
translated: then one would also understand the negation of other phenomena such as generosity.🔽Reply: The negation of the third type of negation is the negation of the object that is the opposite of the object of negation.

original: bshad pa / rnam par gcod par byed pa gsum po der yang zla bo 'gal zla rnam par gcod pa ldog pa don de dag gi don rnams la ni rtogs par 'gyur te /
analyzed: bshad pa / rnam par gcod par byed pa gsum po der yang zla bo 'gal zla rnam par gcod pa ldog pa don de dag gi don rnams la ni rtogs par 'gyur te /
translated: The meaning of those objects is understood.

original: chos 'ga' zhig nges pa gang yin pa de las bzlog pa nyid rtogs par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: chos 'ga' zhig nges pa gang yin pa de las bzlog pa nyid rtogs par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning of the statement “One understands the opposite of any phenomenon that is ascertained” is that one understands the opposite of any phenomenon that is ascertained.

original: 'phong skyen pa bsgrubs na 'gal zla 'phong mi skyen pa rnam par gcod kyi /
analyzed: 'phong skyen pa bsgrubs na 'gal zla 'phong mi skyen pa rnam par gcod kyi /
translated: For example, when one establishes a skilled archer, one negates the opposite of a skilled archer,

original: gzhan tsam ni ma yin la /
analyzed: gzhan tsam ni ma yin la /
translated: but one does not negate mere other.

original: srid sgrub kyi thun mong ma yin pa'i 'phong skyen pa bsgrubs pas na 'gal zla 'gro ba thams cad dang thun mong du gyur pa'i 'phong skyen pa rnam par gcod kyi gtong phod la sogs pa ni ma yin no //
analyzed: srid sgrub kyi thun mong ma yin pa'i 'phong skyen pa bsgrubs pas na 'gal zla 'gro ba thams cad dang thun mong du gyur pa'i 'phong skyen pa rnam par gcod kyi gtong phod la sogs pa ni ma yin no //
translated: The skill in archery of Arjuna is established as a unique quality, and so it excludes all other archers who are not like him, but it does not exclude generosity and so on.

original: de bzhin du sngon po nyid srid par bsgrubs na mi srid par rnam par gcod kyi gzhan ni ma yin no //
analyzed: de bzhin du sngon po nyid srid par bsgrubs na mi srid par rnam par gcod kyi gzhan ni ma yin no //
translated: In the same way, when the existence of blue is established, it excludes the non-existence of blue, but not other things.

original: phyogs 'dis ngag thams cad la 'bras bu rnam par gcod pa gsum blta bar bya ste /
analyzed: phyogs 'dis ngag thams cad la 'bras bu rnam par gcod pa gsum blta bar bya ste /
translated: By this method, the exclusion of the effect should be seen in all statements.

original: srog nar 'gro ba'i lam ni 'di'o zhes smras pa ni ;
analyzed: srog nar 'gro ba'i lam ni 'di'o zhes smras pa ni ;
translated: When it is said, “This is the path for the life-force to go out,”

original: rmongs pa'i dogs pa'i khyad par gyi rnam par gcod pa rnam pa gsum ka yang srid pa yin no //
analyzed: rmongs pa'i dogs pa'i khyad par gyi rnam par gcod pa rnam pa gsum ka yang srid pa yin no //
translated: all three types of exclusion of the particular suspected by delusion are possible.

original: lam gnyis las 'di nyid yin gyi cig shos ni ma yin no zhes bya ba gzhan dang ldan pa rnam par gcod pa'o //
analyzed: lam gnyis las 'di nyid yin gyi cig shos ni ma yin no zhes bya ba gzhan dang ldan pa rnam par gcod pa'o //
translated: When it is said, “This is the path, not the other one,” it is the exclusion of possession of another.

original: ci 'di srog nar 'gro ba yin nam 'on te grong gzhan du 'gro ba yin zhes the tshom za na srog nar 'gro ba nyid do zhes ma 'brel pa rnam par gcod pa yin no //
analyzed: ci 'di srog nar 'gro ba yin nam 'on te grong gzhan du 'gro ba yin zhes the tshom za na srog nar 'gro ba nyid do zhes ma 'brel pa rnam par gcod pa yin no //
translated: If one doubts whether this is the end of life or whether one is going to another village, then it is the end of life.

original: ci 'gro 'am 'on te mi 'gro zhes the tshom za la 'gro ba nyid do zhes gtan mi ldan pa rnam par gcod pa yin no //
analyzed: ci 'gro 'am 'on te mi 'gro zhes the tshom za la 'gro ba nyid do zhes gtan mi ldan pa rnam par gcod pa yin no //
translated: If one doubts whether one is going or not going, then it is going.

original: de bzhin du gzhan du yang sbyar ro //
analyzed: de bzhin du gzhan du yang sbyar ro //
translated: The same should be applied to other cases.

original: yang ci'i phyir 'gal zla nyid bzlog pa'i gzhan tsam ma yin zhe na /
analyzed: yang ci'i phyir 'gal zla nyid bzlog pa'i gzhan tsam ma yin zhe na /
translated: Why is it not merely the opposite of the contradictory?

original: de ltar grags dang zhas smos te /
analyzed: de ltar grags dang zhas smos te /
translated: It is said that it is well known.

original: 'jig @184b rten tha dad par byed pa'i tshig phrad kyi 'gal ba nyid zlog gi gzhan tsam ni ma yin no zhes grags pa yin te /
analyzed: 'jig @184b rten tha dad par byed pa'i tshig phrad kyi 'gal ba nyid zlog gi gzhan tsam ni ma yin no zhes grags pa yin te /
translated: The contradictory of the contradictory of a word that distinguishes different worlds is well known to be merely the opposite of that, not just any other.

original: des na de ltar grags phyir te /
analyzed: des na de ltar grags phyir te /
translated: Therefore, it is like that, because it is well known.

original: de nyid zlog pa yin no zhes rtogs par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de nyid zlog pa yin no zhes rtogs par 'gyur ro //
translated: It is understood that it is the opposite of that.

original: dper na sgra'i don rtogs pa 'jig rten gyi grags pa'i rjes su 'brang ba las rgyu mtshan gzhan med pa de bzhin du /
analyzed: dper na sgra'i don rtogs pa 'jig rten gyi grags pa'i rjes su 'brang ba las rgyu mtshan gzhan med pa de bzhin du /
translated: For example, the understanding of the meaning of a word is due to nothing other than the conformity with worldly renown.

original: sgra'i don las gzhan bzlog pa yang grags pa las yin no zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: sgra'i don las gzhan bzlog pa yang grags pa las yin no zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
translated: In the same way, the exclusion of what is other than the meaning of a word is due to renown.

original: gal te sgra'i brjod bya ma yin par khyad par med pa las ci'i phyir 'ga' zhig nyid bzlog par grags kyi thams cad ni ma yin no zhes bya ba 'di nyid khyod la dris pa ma yin nam zhe na /
analyzed: gal te sgra'i brjod bya ma yin par khyad par med pa las ci'i phyir 'ga' zhig nyid bzlog par grags kyi thams cad ni ma yin no zhes bya ba 'di nyid khyod la dris pa ma yin nam zhe na /
translated: If you ask, “Why is it that, when there is no difference in not being the referent of a word, only some are renowned as exclusions and not all?”

original: nus pa dang zhes smos te /
analyzed: nus pa dang zhes smos te /
translated: we reply, “It is due to the power of the word.”

original: sgra'i don ma yin pa yang /
analyzed: sgra'i don ma yin pa yang /
translated: Even though something is not the referent of a word,

original: bzlog par grags ba rgyu mtshan med pa ma yin gyi /
analyzed: bzlog par grags ba rgyu mtshan med pa ma yin gyi /
translated: it is not the case that its renown as an exclusion is groundless.

original: 'on kyang sgra'i nus pa las so //
analyzed: 'on kyang sgra'i nus pa las so //
translated: Rather, it is due to the power of the word.

original: gal te 'phong mi skyen pa nyid rnam par mi gcod na ni 'phong skyen pa'i tshig don med par 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gal te 'phong mi skyen pa nyid rnam par mi gcod na ni 'phong skyen pa'i tshig don med par 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
translated: If the non-skill in archery were not excluded, then the word “skill in archery” would be meaningless.

original: shugs kyis 'phong skyen pa nyid kyis 'phong skyen pa rnam par gcod pa yin gyi /
analyzed: shugs kyis 'phong skyen pa nyid kyis 'phong skyen pa rnam par gcod pa yin gyi /
translated: The word “skillful” excludes the unskilled by implication.

original: de ltar gtong phod pa nyid rnam par mi gcod na 'phong skyen pa'i tshig don med par 'gyur ba ni ma yin no //
analyzed: de ltar gtong phod pa nyid rnam par mi gcod na 'phong skyen pa'i tshig don med par 'gyur ba ni ma yin no //
translated: But if it did not exclude the generous, the word “skillful” would be meaningless.

original: des na gzhan tsam rnam par gcad pa la ni sgra'i nus pa yod pa ma yin pas gzhan tsam rnam par gcod par ma grags pa yin no //
analyzed: des na gzhan tsam rnam par gcad pa la ni sgra'i nus pa yod pa ma yin pas gzhan tsam rnam par gcod par ma grags pa yin no //
translated: Therefore, since the word has no power to exclude mere otherness, it is not known to exclude mere otherness.

original: sgra'i nus pa'i phyir ro zhes spyi'i phyir brjod de /
analyzed: sgra'i nus pa'i phyir ro zhes spyi'i phyir brjod de /
translated: The word is used because of its power to express the general sense.

original: sgra sbyar ba ci snyed pa ni rang gi don rtogs par bya ba'i phyir yin na 'dir zla bo'i chos ni brjod bya ba ma yin no zhe na /
analyzed: sgra sbyar ba ci snyed pa ni rang gi don rtogs par bya ba'i phyir yin na 'dir zla bo'i chos ni brjod bya ba ma yin no zhe na /
translated: But as many words as are used are used to make known their own meanings. Here the property of the counterpart is not the object to be expressed.

original: sgra ni brjod 'dod rjes 'brang zhing //🔽zhes smos te /
analyzed: sgra ni brjod 'dod rjes 'brang zhing // zhes smos te /
translated: The word follows the desire to express.

original: sgra ni ngag gi don bstan par 'dod pa'i bsam pa brjod par 'dod pa de'i rjes su 'brang ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: sgra ni ngag gi don bstan par 'dod pa'i bsam pa brjod par 'dod pa de'i rjes su 'brang ba'i phyir ro //
translated: The word follows the desire to express the thought of one who wishes to indicate the meaning of the sentence.

original: de skad brjod pa yin te /
analyzed: de skad brjod pa yin te /
translated: This is what is said.

original: brjod par 'dod pa la snang ba nyid sgras brjod kyi mi snang ba ni ma yin la /
analyzed: brjod par 'dod pa la snang ba nyid sgras brjod kyi mi snang ba ni ma yin la /
translated: What is desired to be expressed appears in the expression, but what is not desired to be expressed does not appear.

original: brjod par 'dod pa la yang zla bo rnam par bcad pa la 'jug pa yin no //
analyzed: brjod par 'dod pa la yang zla bo rnam par bcad pa la 'jug pa yin no //
translated: And what is desired to be expressed is the engagement in the elimination of the opposite.

original: 'di ltar blo gros rmongs pa'i dogs pa'i gnas gcod par byed pas /
analyzed: 'di ltar blo gros rmongs pa'i dogs pa'i gnas gcod par byed pas /
translated: Thus, the place of doubt is eliminated by the confused intellect.

original: don 'ga' zhig brjod par 'dod pa yin te /
analyzed: don 'ga' zhig brjod par 'dod pa yin te /
translated: Therefore, some object is desired to be expressed.
