original: des na smra ba po'i brjod par 'dod pa la snang ba'i don brjod pa'i sgra brjod par 'dod pa'i brjod bya don 'ga' zhig bzlog par 'dod pa yin la /
analyzed: des na smra ba po'i brjod par 'dod pa la snang ba'i don brjod pa'i sgra brjod par 'dod pa'i brjod bya don 'ga' zhig bzlog par 'dod pa yin la /
translated: Thus, the word that expresses the object that appears in the speaker’s desire to express expresses some object that is the meaning of what is desired to be expressed.

original: de yang 'gal zla yin no //
analyzed: de yang 'gal zla yin no //
translated: And that is the opposite.

original: 'di ltar 'gal zla cig shos mi zlogs na ni brjod bya brjod par 'dod pa'i don med par 'gyur gyi /
analyzed: 'di ltar 'gal zla cig shos mi zlogs na ni brjod bya brjod par 'dod pa'i don med par 'gyur gyi /
translated: Thus, if the other opposite is not eliminated, the object to be expressed would not be the meaning of what is desired to be expressed.

original: gzhan tsam mi zlogs pas ni ma yin no //
analyzed: gzhan tsam mi zlogs pas ni ma yin no //
translated: But it is not that just the other is not eliminated.

original: de'i phyir sgra rnams kyi don ni brjod par 'dod pa'i rjes su 'brang ba @185a * //
analyzed: de'i phyir sgra rnams kyi don ni brjod par 'dod pa'i rjes su 'brang ba @185a * //
translated: Therefore, the meaning of words follows the desire to express.

original: yin la / brjod par 'dod pa yang 'gal zla zlog par byed par mi 'thad pas sgra rnams ni rjod par byed pa yin pa'i shugs kyis brjod bya ma yin yang 'gal zla'i chos nyid tha dad par byed pa'i tshig phrad kyis bzlog par bya ba yin par grags kyi gzhan
analyzed: yin la / brjod par 'dod pa yang 'gal zla zlog par byed par mi 'thad pas sgra rnams ni rjod par byed pa yin pa'i shugs kyis brjod bya ma yin yang 'gal zla'i chos nyid tha dad par byed pa'i tshig phrad kyis bzlog par bya ba yin par grags kyi gzhan
translated: Therefore, although words do not express the object to be expressed by implication, they are known to express the opposite of the contrary by the force of expressing the object to be expressed.

original: tsam ni ma yin no //
analyzed: tsam ni ma yin no //
translated: They are not merely other.

original: gal te rnam 'grel las de ltar grags pa'i phyir dang / nus pa'i phyir dang / sgra ni brjod par 'dod pa'i rjes su 'brang ba yin pa'i phyir ro zhes gtan tshigs gsum la bsdu ba byas pa ma yin nam zhe na /
analyzed: gal te rnam 'grel las de ltar grags pa'i phyir dang / nus pa'i phyir dang / sgra ni brjod par 'dod pa'i rjes su 'brang ba yin pa'i phyir ro zhes gtan tshigs gsum la bsdu ba byas pa ma yin nam zhe na /
translated: If you ask, “Aren’t the three reasons that words express the opposite of the contrary included in the statement in the Pramānﬁ avārtika that it is so renowned, that it is possible, and that words follow what is desired to be expressed?”

original: bden te / bsdu ba ni yi ge du ma chud pa dang / mi 'tsham pa yin no //
analyzed: bden te / bsdu ba ni yi ge du ma chud pa dang / mi 'tsham pa yin no //
translated: It is true that the inclusion is not correct, because it includes too much and too little.

original: des na slob dpon gyis bzhed pa ni ma yin no ;
analyzed: des na slob dpon gyis bzhed pa ni ma yin no ;
translated: Therefore, this is not the opinion of the master.

original: / dper na /
analyzed: / dper na /
translated: For example,

original: 'tshe ba med dang yang dag don //
analyzed: 'tshe ba med dang yang dag don //
translated: Nonviolence and the true meaning

original: ngo bo nyid la zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: ngo bo nyid la zhes bya ba la /
translated: In the nature of things.

original: bdag med pa la mthong ba ni 'tshe ba med pa dang / yang dag pa'i don shes pa'i ngo bo nyid yin no zhes bya ba slob dpon gyi bshad pa bor nas 'grel pa byed pas 'tshe ba med pa'i ngo bo nyid dang / yang dag pa'i don gyi ngo bo nyid ces bshad pa de bzhin du gzhan du yang 'dod pa ma yin pa srid do zhes rtogs so //
analyzed: bdag med pa la mthong ba ni 'tshe ba med pa dang / yang dag pa'i don shes pa'i ngo bo nyid yin no zhes bya ba slob dpon gyi bshad pa bor nas 'grel pa byed pas 'tshe ba med pa'i ngo bo nyid dang / yang dag pa'i don gyi ngo bo nyid ces bshad pa de bzhin du gzhan du yang 'dod pa ma yin pa srid do zhes rtogs so //
translated: It is possible that the Subcommentary’s explanation is not accepted by others.

original: gang gi phyir gzhan las rnam par gcod par 'gyur ba ji ltar srid sgrub 'phong skyen pa grags pa gzhan las rnam par gcad par bya ba de ltar ni gtan tshigs rjes su dpag par bya ba'i chos su ma grags te /
analyzed: gang gi phyir gzhan las rnam par gcod par 'gyur ba ji ltar srid sgrub 'phong skyen pa grags pa gzhan las rnam par gcad par bya ba de ltar ni gtan tshigs rjes su dpag par bya ba'i chos su ma grags te /
translated: Why is it possible that it is not accepted? It is possible that it is not accepted because the reason is not renowned as the property of the subject, just as it is not renowned that Arjuna is skilled in archery.

original: bstan bcos kyi mtshan nyid kyi tshig gzhan med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: bstan bcos kyi mtshan nyid kyi tshig gzhan med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: This is because there is no other statement in the treatise that defines it.

original: des na rjes su dpag par bya ba'i chos su sgrub pa yin pa'i phyir 'dir mi ldan pa nyid rnam par gcod pa yin no zhes 'chad pa ni /
analyzed: des na rjes su dpag par bya ba'i chos su sgrub pa yin pa'i phyir 'dir mi ldan pa nyid rnam par gcod pa yin no zhes 'chad pa ni /
translated: Therefore, since it is the property to be inferred, here the absence of the property is excluded.

original: des na mi ldan pa rnams gcod pa'i rgyu des na chos can chos kyi khyad par yin te /
analyzed: des na mi ldan pa rnams gcod pa'i rgyu des na chos can chos kyi khyad par yin te /
translated: Therefore, because of the reason that excludes the absence, the subject is a particular of the property.

original: rnam par gcod par byed pa blta bar bya'o //
analyzed: rnam par gcod par byed pa blta bar bya'o //
translated: The exclusion should be seen.

original: des na chos can gyi khyad par can gyi chos dpe la rjes su 'gro ba med pa'i skyon brten pa ma yin no //
analyzed: des na chos can gyi khyad par can gyi chos dpe la rjes su 'gro ba med pa'i skyon brten pa ma yin no //
translated: Therefore, the fault of the absence of concomitance in the example of the subject's particular property is not applicable.

original: gzhan dang ldan pa rnam par gcad pas khyad par yin par khas len na skyon bstan pa'i phyir bshad pa /
analyzed: gzhan dang ldan pa rnam par gcad pas khyad par yin par khas len na skyon bstan pa'i phyir bshad pa /
translated: If one accepts that the particular is the exclusion of the other, to show the fault, it is explained:

original: sgra la sogs pa dang 'brel pa'i bya ba gcig gtan tshigs nyid der 'gyur na chos can gzhan dang 'brel pa'i byas ba gzhan de nyid ma yin pa zhes bya ba gtan tshigs nyid ma yin par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: sgra la sogs pa dang 'brel pa'i bya ba gcig gtan tshigs nyid der 'gyur na chos can gzhan dang 'brel pa'i byas ba gzhan de nyid ma yin pa zhes bya ba gtan tshigs nyid ma yin par 'gyur ro //
translated: If the single action related to sound, etc. were the reason, then the other produced action related to another subject would not be the reason, as it is not the same.

original: 'di ltar rjes su dpag par bya ba nyid kyi chos gtan tshigs yin gyi gzhan gyi ni ma yin no zhes bya ba'i ngag 'dir 'gyur na /🔽de ltar na mi 'thad de rang bzhin mtshungs pa dag las gcig gtan tshigs nyid yin na /
analyzed: 'di ltar rjes su dpag par bya ba nyid kyi chos gtan tshigs yin gyi gzhan gyi ni ma yin no zhes bya ba'i ngag 'dir 'gyur na / de ltar na mi 'thad de rang bzhin mtshungs pa dag las gcig gtan tshigs nyid yin na /
translated: Thus, the property of being an object of inference is the reason, but not anything else.

original: @185b gzhan gtan tshigs ma yin par ji ltar 'gyur /
analyzed: @185b gzhan gtan tshigs ma yin par ji ltar 'gyur /
translated: But that is not tenable, because if two things are similar in nature, how could one be the reason and the other not be the reason?

original: sgra gcig byas pa nyid yin na gzhan bum pa ma byas pa nyid du thal lo zhes bya ba'i don 'di ni ma yin te /
analyzed: sgra gcig byas pa nyid yin na gzhan bum pa ma byas pa nyid du thal lo zhes bya ba'i don 'di ni ma yin te /
translated: The meaning of the statement “If sound is produced, it follows that another, a pot, is not produced” is not that.

original: 'di ltar gang zhig rjes su dpag par bya ba nyid du yod pa de ni gtan tshigs yin no zhes bya ba 'di dag gi don yin gyi /
analyzed: 'di ltar gang zhig rjes su dpag par bya ba nyid du yod pa de ni gtan tshigs yin no zhes bya ba 'di dag gi don yin gyi /
translated: The meaning of the statement “That which exists as an object of inference is the reason” is that.

original: gang gis gzhan ma byas pa nyid du 'gyur ba gang rjes su dpag par bya ba nyid la yod pa de ni byas pa yin no zhes bya ba'i don 'di ni ma yin no //
analyzed: gang gis gzhan ma byas pa nyid du 'gyur ba gang rjes su dpag par bya ba nyid la yod pa de ni byas pa yin no zhes bya ba'i don 'di ni ma yin no //
translated: The meaning of the statement “That which exists as an object of inference is produced” is not that.

original: gtan tshigs ma yin pa nyid du ni thal bar 'gyur te /
analyzed: gtan tshigs ma yin pa nyid du ni thal bar 'gyur te /
translated: It follows that it is not a reason.

original: 'di ltar gang gi tshe rtag pa'i dngos po las ldog pas mi rtag pa nyid du gzung ba de'i tshe spyir gcig tu 'gyur ba yin la /
analyzed: 'di ltar gang gi tshe rtag pa'i dngos po las ldog pas mi rtag pa nyid du gzung ba de'i tshe spyir gcig tu 'gyur ba yin la /
translated: Thus, when impermanence is apprehended as the opposite of permanent things, at that time it becomes a general, single entity.

original: gang gi tshe ldog pa gzhan gyi khyad par du byas pa de'i tshe ni gzhi so so la tha dad pas du mar 'gyur ba yin no //
analyzed: gang gi tshe ldog pa gzhan gyi khyad par du byas pa de'i tshe ni gzhi so so la tha dad pas du mar 'gyur ba yin no //
translated: But when it is qualified by other opposites, at that time it becomes multiple, because it is different in each basis.

original: de bzhin du byas pa nyid kyang du ma yin no //
analyzed: de bzhin du byas pa nyid kyang du ma yin no //
translated: In the same way, being produced is also multiple.

original: des na gcig gtan tshigs nyid la gzhan ni gtan tshigs ma yin par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: des na gcig gtan tshigs nyid la gzhan ni gtan tshigs ma yin par 'gyur ro //
translated: Therefore, one would be the reason itself, and the other would not be the reason.

original: skyon 'dir ma zad de /
analyzed: skyon 'dir ma zad de /
translated: Not only is there this fault,

original: 'on kyang khyad par dang khyad par can dang 'brel pa'i tshig phrad kyang ste ;
analyzed: 'on kyang khyad par dang khyad par can dang 'brel pa'i tshig phrad kyang ste ;
translated: but also the compound word, which is the connection between the qualifier and the qualified,

original: de dag gi tshig phrad khyad par med par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: de dag gi tshig phrad khyad par med par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: would be without difference in those words. This is the meaning.

original: ma 'brel par rnam par bcad pa'i sgo nas gtan tshigs kyi chos can gyis khyad par du byas par bshad pa 'dis ni bsgrub par bya ba'i chos la yang ma 'brel pa rnam par gcod pa'i rgyu mtshan gyis khyad par dang khyad par can gyi dngos por nges
analyzed: ma 'brel par rnam par bcad pa'i sgo nas gtan tshigs kyi chos can gyis khyad par du byas par bshad pa 'dis ni bsgrub par bya ba'i chos la yang ma 'brel pa rnam par gcod pa'i rgyu mtshan gyis khyad par dang khyad par can gyi dngos por nges
translated: This explanation of the logical subject as qualified by the exclusion of non-connection indicates that the probandum is also ascertained as the qualified and the qualifier by the reason of the exclusion of non-connection.

original: par bya'o // des na de la yang rjes su 'gro ba med pa'i skyon spang bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: par bya'o // des na de la yang rjes su 'gro ba med pa'i skyon spang bar 'gyur ro //
translated: Therefore, the fault of non-pervasion is avoided.

original: 'di nyid ston pa ni des na rjes su 'gro ba med pa ma yin no zhes bya ba yin no //
analyzed: 'di nyid ston pa ni des na rjes su 'gro ba med pa ma yin no zhes bya ba yin no //
translated: This is shown by the words “Therefore, there is no non-pervasion.”

original: 'di ni bca' ba sbyor ba yin na brjod par bya ba ma yin gyi /
analyzed: 'di ni bca' ba sbyor ba yin na brjod par bya ba ma yin gyi /
translated: This is not to be stated in the application of the thesis,

original: dam bca' ba sbyor ba med na rjes su 'gro ba'i dus su chos can nyid med pa'i phyir rjes su 'gro ba med pa'i skyon gyi rtogs pa yod pa ma yin no //
analyzed: dam bca' ba sbyor ba med na rjes su 'gro ba'i dus su chos can nyid med pa'i phyir rjes su 'gro ba med pa'i skyon gyi rtogs pa yod pa ma yin no //
translated: but when there is no application of the thesis, there is no understanding of the fault of non-pervasion at the time of pervasion, because there is no logical subject.

original: ma 'brel par rnam par gcod pa la yon tan gzhan yang ston pa ni de bzhin du zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: ma 'brel par rnam par gcod pa la yon tan gzhan yang ston pa ni de bzhin du zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
translated: Another good quality of the exclusion of the unrelated is taught:

original: mi rtag pa nyid kyi rang bzhin nam /
analyzed: mi rtag pa nyid kyi rang bzhin nam /
translated: In the same way, when the nature of fire or impermanence is established,

original: me'i rang bzhin gyi spyi bsgrub par bya ba yin yang 'di skad ces me tsam dang mi rtag pa tsam bsgrub pa na grub pa la sgrub pa nyid kyi skyon du 'gyur ro zhes ni brjod par nus pa ma yin na /
analyzed: me'i rang bzhin gyi spyi bsgrub par bya ba yin yang 'di skad ces me tsam dang mi rtag pa tsam bsgrub pa na grub pa la sgrub pa nyid kyi skyon du 'gyur ro zhes ni brjod par nus pa ma yin na /
translated: it is not possible to say that the mere establishment of fire or the mere establishment of impermanence is the fault of establishing what is already established.

original: gang gi phyir spyi'i rang bzhin me tsam dang mi rtag pa tsam rab tu grub na /
analyzed: gang gi phyir spyi'i rang bzhin me tsam dang mi rtag pa tsam rab tu grub na /
translated: Because when the mere nature of fire and the mere nature of impermanence are established in general,

original: ma 'brel pa rnam par gcod pa'i mtshan nyid khyad par can gyi phyogs sam /
analyzed: ma 'brel pa rnam par gcod pa'i mtshan nyid khyad par can gyi phyogs sam /
translated: the specific characteristic of the exclusion of the unrelated is established as the property

original: sgra dang 'brel par 'grub par 'gyur /🔽ma 'brel pa rnam par gcod pa de ni ma grub pa sgrub par @186a * //
analyzed: sgra dang 'brel par 'grub par 'gyur / ma 'brel pa rnam par gcod pa de ni ma grub pa sgrub par @186a * //
translated: or the connection with the word.

original: 'gyur ba yin no //
analyzed: 'gyur ba yin no //
translated: That exclusion of the unrelated is the establishment of what is not established.

original: de'i phyir khyab pa'i tshul spyis yin yang med na mi 'byung ba'i khyad par rtog par 'gyur ba yin pa'i phyir grub pa la sgrub pa ma yin no //
analyzed: de'i phyir khyab pa'i tshul spyis yin yang med na mi 'byung ba'i khyad par rtog par 'gyur ba yin pa'i phyir grub pa la sgrub pa ma yin no //
translated: Therefore, although the mode of pervasion is a general one, the distinction of “if it does not exist, it does not occur” is conceptual. Thus, it is not the case that the proof is established.

original: de nyid ston par byed pa ni /
analyzed: de nyid ston par byed pa ni /
translated: To demonstrate just that, he says,

original: sgra de dang ma 'brel pa rnam par bcad pa ma grub pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: sgra de dang ma 'brel pa rnam par bcad pa ma grub pa'i phyir ro //
translated: “Because the exclusion of what is not related to that sound is not established.”

original: mi ldan pa rnam par bcad pa ni ldan pa ste /
analyzed: mi ldan pa rnam par bcad pa ni ldan pa ste /
translated: The exclusion of what is not related is related.

original: 'brel pa la bya'o //
analyzed: 'brel pa la bya'o //
translated: It is to be taken as a connection.

original: 'brel pa yang 'brel ba can las tha dad pa med de /
analyzed: 'brel pa yang 'brel ba can las tha dad pa med de /
translated: Moreover, a connection is not different from that which is connected.

original: des na ma 'brel pa rnam par bcad pa ni chos dang chos can bsdus pa nyid yin no //
analyzed: des na ma 'brel pa rnam par bcad pa ni chos dang chos can bsdus pa nyid yin no //
translated: Therefore, the exclusion of what is not related is just the inclusion of the property and the subject.

original: de'i phyir ji ltar chos can chos kyi spyi'i phyogs gcig chos la khyab pa'i dus na nye bar brtags nas bsgrub byar brjod pa de bzhin du /
analyzed: de'i phyir ji ltar chos can chos kyi spyi'i phyogs gcig chos la khyab pa'i dus na nye bar brtags nas bsgrub byar brjod pa de bzhin du /
translated: Thus, just as the subject is the one part of the universal of the property that pervades the property, at the time of the examination, it is stated as the probandum.

original: ma 'brel par rnam par bcad pa'i chos bsgrub par bya ba yin no //
analyzed: ma 'brel par rnam par bcad pa'i chos bsgrub par bya ba yin no //
translated: In the same way, the property that is the exclusion of what is not related is the probandum.

original: de ltar yin dang ci'i phyogs gcig chos tsam khyad par med pa la /
analyzed: de ltar yin dang ci'i phyogs gcig chos tsam khyad par med pa la /
translated: If that is so, then why is the mere property, which is just one part of the subject, stated as the probandum without any distinction?

original: bsgrub byar brjod pa yin no zhes gang smras pa de bsal ba yin te /
analyzed: bsgrub byar brjod pa yin no zhes gang smras pa de bsal ba yin te /
translated: This is the refutation of the statement that the predicate is the probandum.

original: chos dang chos can bsdus pa las mi ldan pa rnam par gcod pa gzhan med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: chos dang chos can bsdus pa las mi ldan pa rnam par gcod pa gzhan med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because there is no other exclusion of non-possession apart from the inclusion of the property and the subject.

original: spyi'i phyogs gcig ni mi ldan pa rnam par bcad pa'i khyad par can nyid ma yin gyi /
analyzed: spyi'i phyogs gcig ni mi ldan pa rnam par bcad pa'i khyad par can nyid ma yin gyi /
translated: One part of the universal is not the qualifier that excludes non-possession,

original: 'on kyang khyad par dang 'brel pa nyid du gyur pa yin pa'i dus su bsgrub byar nye bar brtags nas brjod pa yin la /
analyzed: 'on kyang khyad par dang 'brel pa nyid du gyur pa yin pa'i dus su bsgrub byar nye bar brtags nas brjod pa yin la /
translated: but rather it is the connection with the qualifier itself that is designated as the probandum and stated at the time of the universal.

original: spyi yang de nyid yin no //
analyzed: spyi yang de nyid yin no //
translated: And that is the universal itself.

original: mthun pa'i phyogs nyid la yod pa zhes nges par gzung ba de'i phyir bsgrub bya'i chos can la med par te mi ldog par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: mthun pa'i phyogs nyid la yod pa zhes nges par gzung ba de'i phyir bsgrub bya'i chos can la med par te mi ldog par 'gyur ro //
translated: Because it is ascertained that it exists only in the similar class, it is not in the subject of the probandum, i.e., it is not absent there.

original: 'di ltar nges par gzung bas ni gtan tshigs gzhan las ldog par brjod pa yin la mi mthun pa'i phyogs dang rjes su dpag pa dag kyang mthun pa'i phyogs las gzhan par khyad par med do //
analyzed: 'di ltar nges par gzung bas ni gtan tshigs gzhan las ldog par brjod pa yin la mi mthun pa'i phyogs dang rjes su dpag pa dag kyang mthun pa'i phyogs las gzhan par khyad par med do //
translated: Because of this ascertainment, the reason is stated as excluding other possibilities, and the dissimilar class and the inference are not different from the similar class.

original: des na gnyis las kyang ldog par brjod pa yin no zhes pha rol dag dogs pa la bshad pa de ltar ni ma yin te /🔽chos can la med par thal ba ma yin no //
analyzed: des na gnyis las kyang ldog par brjod pa yin no zhes pha rol dag dogs pa la bshad pa de ltar ni ma yin te / chos can la med par thal ba ma yin no //
translated: But it is not as you suspect, because it is not the case that the subject is nonexistent.

original: gzhan dgag pa'i khyad par don gyi phyir ro zhes bya ba ni gzhan mi mthun pa'i phyogs la dgag pa'i don dgos pa nges par gzung ba gang la yod pa ste /
analyzed: gzhan dgag pa'i khyad par don gyi phyir ro zhes bya ba ni gzhan mi mthun pa'i phyogs la dgag pa'i don dgos pa nges par gzung ba gang la yod pa ste /
translated: The phrase “for the sake of the special purpose of negation” means that the purpose of negation is to determine the meaning of the negation of something else, the opposite of the subject.

original: mi mthun pa'i phyogs las bzlog pa'i don du nges par byas pa yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: mi mthun pa'i phyogs las bzlog pa'i don du nges par byas pa yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning is that the purpose of negation is to determine the meaning of the opposite of the opposite of the subject.

original: gal te 'di snyam du don 'di 'dod pa de lta na yang nges pa khyad par med pa yin pa'i phyir rnam par dbye ba 'di ga las yin zhe na /
analyzed: gal te 'di snyam du don 'di 'dod pa de lta na yang nges pa khyad par med pa yin pa'i phyir rnam par dbye ba 'di ga las yin zhe na /
translated: If you think that even if you accept this meaning, the determination is not special, and therefore, this analysis is pointless,

original: bshad pa / bsgrub par bya ba'i chos can de la sngar yod par grub pa'i nges par gzung ba nges par brjod pa'i sgras ni 'jug pa'i yul gzhan de ma yin pa rnam par gcod pa yin no//
analyzed: bshad pa / bsgrub par bya ba'i chos can de la sngar yod par grub pa'i nges par gzung ba nges par brjod pa'i sgras ni 'jug pa'i yul gzhan de ma yin pa rnam par gcod pa yin no//
translated: we reply: The words that express the determination of the previously established existence of the subject of the probandum eliminate the other, the object of engagement that is not that.

original: @186b 'di snyam du yod par grub na yang phyis nges par byas pas sngar gyi yod pa dang gzhan khyad par med par bzlog par 'gyur ro snyam na sdud pa'i zhes smos so //
analyzed: @186b 'di snyam du yod par grub na yang phyis nges par byas pas sngar gyi yod pa dang gzhan khyad par med par bzlog par 'gyur ro snyam na sdud pa'i zhes smos so //
translated: If you think that even if it is established that it exists, since it is ascertained later, the existence earlier and the later are not different, then the word “only” is stated.

original: bsam pa ni 'di yin te /
analyzed: bsam pa ni 'di yin te /
translated: The idea is this:

original: 'dir gzhan bsgrub bya'i chos can la yod ba nyid du sdud pa'i mthun pa'i phyogs la yod par nges pa yin no //
analyzed: 'dir gzhan bsgrub bya'i chos can la yod ba nyid du sdud pa'i mthun pa'i phyogs la yod par nges pa yin no //
translated: Here, the existence in the similar class of the subject of the probandum is ascertained as existing.

original: gal te nges pa'i bsgrub bya'i chos can la yod pa nyid bzlog na ni de'i tshe bsdu ba nyams par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gal te nges pa'i bsgrub bya'i chos can la yod pa nyid bzlog na ni de'i tshe bsdu ba nyams par 'gyur ro //
translated: If the existence in the subject of the probandum is negated, then at that time the inclusion is damaged.

original: sgra'i don gang gi khyad par gsal bar byed pa'i sgra smos pa de nyid kyis gsal bar bya ba'i khyad par gyi don gyi rang bzhin bzlog pa ni ma yin te /
analyzed: sgra'i don gang gi khyad par gsal bar byed pa'i sgra smos pa de nyid kyis gsal bar bya ba'i khyad par gyi don gyi rang bzhin bzlog pa ni ma yin te /
translated: The word that expresses the meaning of the word that clarifies the distinction does not negate the nature of the meaning of the distinction that is being clarified.

original: de lta ma yin na gsal bar byed pa nyid du mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de lta ma yin na gsal bar byed pa nyid du mi 'gyur ro //
translated: If it were otherwise, it would not be a clarifier.

original: de'i phyir don gyi khyad par ci 'dra ba zhig gi gsal byed du nye bar blang pa'i tshig phrad de ni de'i rang bzhin la mi gnod par khyad par gsal bar byed pa yin no //
analyzed: de'i phyir don gyi khyad par ci 'dra ba zhig gi gsal byed du nye bar blang pa'i tshig phrad de ni de'i rang bzhin la mi gnod par khyad par gsal bar byed pa yin no //
translated: Therefore, the word that is used to clarify a particular meaning does not contradict its nature, but clarifies the particular meaning.

original: khyad par gsal bar byed pa smos pa 'di ni sdud pa yin te /
analyzed: khyad par gsal bar byed pa smos pa 'di ni sdud pa yin te /
translated: This mention of the clarification of the particular is a summary.

original: des na bsdu ba nyid rjes su brjod nas khyad par gsal bar byed par 'os pa yin zhing /
analyzed: des na bsdu ba nyid rjes su brjod nas khyad par gsal bar byed par 'os pa yin zhing /
translated: Therefore, it is appropriate to state the summary and then clarify the particular.

original: de las kyang bsgrub par bya ba'i chos can la yod pa nyid ma bkag par nges pa yin te /
analyzed: de las kyang bsgrub par bya ba'i chos can la yod pa nyid ma bkag par nges pa yin te /
translated: Moreover, it is certain that the existence of the subject to be established is not refuted,

original: sdud pa'i rang bzhin rjes su brjod pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: sdud pa'i rang bzhin rjes su brjod pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because the nature of the summary is stated.

original: de'i phyir sdud pa'i nges par gzung ba zhes brjod pa yin no //
analyzed: de'i phyir sdud pa'i nges par gzung ba zhes brjod pa yin no //
translated: Therefore, it is called the ascertainment of the summary.

original: sgra'i don ni 'jig rten par rtogs par bya ba yin no zhes de lta bu'i rang bzhin can 'jig rten pa nyid kyi dpe bstan pa ni /
analyzed: sgra'i don ni 'jig rten par rtogs par bya ba yin no zhes de lta bu'i rang bzhin can 'jig rten pa nyid kyi dpe bstan pa ni /
translated: The meaning of the word is to be understood in the world. Such a worldly nature is taught as an example,

original: dper na zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: dper na zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
translated: beginning with for example.

original: 'dir don yin te ;
analyzed: 'dir don yin te ;
translated: Here, the meaning is this.

original: na ra dang lhan cig tu bsdus pa'i sred med kyi bu'i nges par gzung ba gang yin pa des ni bu gzhan nyid rnam par gcod kyi na ra nyid ni rnam par gcod pa ma yin te /
analyzed: na ra dang lhan cig tu bsdus pa'i sred med kyi bu'i nges par gzung ba gang yin pa des ni bu gzhan nyid rnam par gcod kyi na ra nyid ni rnam par gcod pa ma yin te /
translated: The specification of Narayana in the compound with him excludes another son, but does not exclude Narayana himself,

original: de dang lhan cig tu bsdus pa'i ngo bo bkag par thal ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de dang lhan cig tu bsdus pa'i ngo bo bkag par thal ba'i phyir ro //
translated: because it would follow, absurdly, that the nature of the compound would be negated.

original: tshigs su bcad pa 'di 'ba' zhig gi don 'di ltar yin par ni ma zad de /
analyzed: tshigs su bcad pa 'di 'ba' zhig gi don 'di ltar yin par ni ma zad de /
translated: Not only does the meaning of this verse come to this,

original: 'di 'dra ba'i rigs can 'jig rten pa'i ngag kyang yod pa yin no //
analyzed: 'di 'dra ba'i rigs can 'jig rten pa'i ngag kyang yod pa yin no //
translated: but there are also such worldly expressions as this:

original: dper na lha sbyin dang mchod sbyin kho na la zan byin cig ces bya ba lta bu'o //
analyzed: dper na lha sbyin dang mchod sbyin kho na la zan byin cig ces bya ba lta bu'o //
translated: “Give food to Devadatta and Yajnadatta.”

original: zan sbyin par bya ba nyid bsdus pa'i mchod sbyin gyi nges par gzung ba gang yin pa des ni zan sbyin par bya ba gzhan rnam par gcod kyi /
analyzed: zan sbyin par bya ba nyid bsdus pa'i mchod sbyin gyi nges par gzung ba gang yin pa des ni zan sbyin par bya ba gzhan rnam par gcod kyi /
translated: The specification of Yajnadatta in the compound with him excludes another recipient of food,

original: gang la ltos nas de'i bsdu bar 'gyur ba de nyid ni ma yin no //
analyzed: gang la ltos nas de'i bsdu bar 'gyur ba de nyid ni ma yin no //
translated: but not the one in relation to whom he is included in the compound.

original: des na tshigs su bcad pa 'dis ni gang du yang brjod par med do zhes gang smras pa de spangs pa yin no //
analyzed: des na tshigs su bcad pa 'dis ni gang du yang brjod par med do zhes gang smras pa de spangs pa yin no //
translated: Therefore, this verse rejects the statement, “It is not expressed anywhere.”

original: bsgrub par bya ba dang de dang rigs mthun pa la yod pa tshul gnyis dang ldan pa'i gtan tshigs gang yin pa de'i med pa mthun pa'i phyogs dngos po med pa la med pa nyid kyi ngo bo ni @187a * //
analyzed: bsgrub par bya ba dang de dang rigs mthun pa la yod pa tshul gnyis dang ldan pa'i gtan tshigs gang yin pa de'i med pa mthun pa'i phyogs dngos po med pa la med pa nyid kyi ngo bo ni @187a * //
translated: The reason that has the two modes of existing in the similar class and the probandum has the third mode, the absence of the reason in the dissimilar class, which is the absence of the reason in the nonentity that is the dissimilar class.

original: tshul gsum pa ste /
analyzed: tshul gsum pa ste /
translated: This is the third mode.

original: de yang tshang mas nges par gzung bar bya ba yin no zhes de ltar bstan pa'i don du nges pa smos so //
analyzed: de yang tshang mas nges par gzung bar bya ba yin no zhes de ltar bstan pa'i don du nges pa smos so //
translated: In order to show that this is complete, the word “ascertained” is stated.

original: tha mar te tshul gsum par smos pa'i nges pa nges pa'i mtshan nyid kyi chos brjod pa gang yin pa de ni gsum ka dang sbrel bar bya'o //
analyzed: tha mar te tshul gsum par smos pa'i nges pa nges pa'i mtshan nyid kyi chos brjod pa gang yin pa de ni gsum ka dang sbrel bar bya'o //
translated: The expression of the definition of the ascertained, which is stated as the third mode, is to be connected with all three.

original: 'di ltar tshul tha ma la sgrub par byed pa'i yan lag tu nges pa nyid 'dod pa de ni tshul snga ma gnyis la yang sgrub par byed pa'i yan lag tu khyad par yod pa ma yin no //
analyzed: 'di ltar tshul tha ma la sgrub par byed pa'i yan lag tu nges pa nyid 'dod pa de ni tshul snga ma gnyis la yang sgrub par byed pa'i yan lag tu khyad par yod pa ma yin no //
translated: Thus, the one who asserts that the final mode is the means of establishing the probandum does not have a special means of establishing the first two modes.

original: yang ci ltar med pa la med pa nyid nges par nus she na /
analyzed: yang ci ltar med pa la med pa nyid nges par nus she na /
translated: How can one ascertain the nonexistence of what does not exist?

original: bshad pa / bsgrub par bya ba las don gzhan dang rang bzhin dag go //
analyzed: bshad pa / bsgrub par bya ba las don gzhan dang rang bzhin dag go //
translated: Reply: The probandum is different from the object and the nature.

original: de'i rab tu skye ba ni 'bras bu grub pa dang / de zhes bya ba bsgrub par bya ba tsam rjes su 'brel pa ste /
analyzed: de'i rab tu skye ba ni 'bras bu grub pa dang / de zhes bya ba bsgrub par bya ba tsam rjes su 'brel pa ste /
translated: Its arising is the establishment of the effect and the connection with the mere probandum called that.

original: bsgrub par bya bas byas pa dang rang bzhin du mngon sum dang / mi dmigs pa dag gam /
analyzed: bsgrub par bya bas byas pa dang rang bzhin du mngon sum dang / mi dmigs pa dag gam /
translated: The probandum is established by perception and nonapprehension of the nature and the effect,

original: gnod par byed pa'i tshad ma 'jug pas grub na ste /
analyzed: gnod par byed pa'i tshad ma 'jug pas grub na ste /
translated: or by the engagement of a countering valid cognition.

original: des na bsgrub par bya ba rgyu dang khyab bar byed pa shing nyid la sogs pa'i dngos po mi dmigs pas med pa nyid 'grub par 'gyur bar blta'o //
analyzed: des na bsgrub par bya ba rgyu dang khyab bar byed pa shing nyid la sogs pa'i dngos po mi dmigs pas med pa nyid 'grub par 'gyur bar blta'o //
translated: Therefore, the nonexistence of the probandum, the cause, and the pervader, such as being a tree, and so on, is established by the nonapprehension of the thing.

original: 'di snyam du ji ltar 'bras bu dang / rang bzhin dag mi dmigs pa tsam tshad ma ma yin pa de bzhin du rgyu dang khyab par byed pa dag kyang ngo zhe na /
analyzed: 'di snyam du ji ltar 'bras bu dang / rang bzhin dag mi dmigs pa tsam tshad ma ma yin pa de bzhin du rgyu dang khyab par byed pa dag kyang ngo zhe na /
translated: But if you think that just as the mere non-observation of effects and nature is not a valid cognition, so too the cause and the pervader are not,

original: bshad pa / bltar rung ba'i yul can te mi dmigs pa gang la yul ltar rung ba yod pa'o //
analyzed: bshad pa / bltar rung ba'i yul can te mi dmigs pa gang la yul ltar rung ba yod pa'o //
translated: then we reply: The object of observation is the object that is suitable to appear, and non-observation is the non-appearance of that object.

original: 'di skad bshad pa yin te /
analyzed: 'di skad bshad pa yin te /
translated: This is what is being said:

original: snang ba'i rgyu 'am khyad par byed pa dag ma dmigs na yod pa nyid med par nges pa yin zhing /
analyzed: snang ba'i rgyu 'am khyad par byed pa dag ma dmigs na yod pa nyid med par nges pa yin zhing /
translated: If the cause of appearance or the distinctive feature is not observed, then it is ascertained that it does not exist.

original: de nges na ni 'bras bu dang rang bzhin dag kyang med par nges par 'gyur gyi /
analyzed: de nges na ni 'bras bu dang rang bzhin dag kyang med par nges par 'gyur gyi /
translated: And if that is ascertained, then it is ascertained that the effect and nature do not exist.

original: mi snang bar gyur pa'i mi dmigs pa gzhan gyis ni ma yin no //
analyzed: mi snang bar gyur pa'i mi dmigs pa gzhan gyis ni ma yin no //
translated: But it is not ascertained by another non-observation that is not an appearance.

original: 'o na mi dmigs pa la ci ltar ldog pa nges par byed ce na /
analyzed: 'o na mi dmigs pa la ci ltar ldog pa nges par byed ce na /
translated: But how is the opposite ascertained by non-observation?

original: bshad pa / bzlog pa dngos po yod pa la mngon sum 'jug pa ldog pa nges pa'i rgyu yin pa'i phyir /
analyzed: bshad pa / bzlog pa dngos po yod pa la mngon sum 'jug pa ldog pa nges pa'i rgyu yin pa'i phyir /
translated: We reply: The opposite is ascertained by the cause of the reversal of the engagement of direct perception in an existent object.

original: tha dad pa med par ldog par nges pa yin no zhes bshad do //🔽'di ltar dmigs pa'i rgyu gzhan yod cing snang ba'i dngos po yang nye ba la /
analyzed: tha dad pa med par ldog par nges pa yin no zhes bshad do // 'di ltar dmigs pa'i rgyu gzhan yod cing snang ba'i dngos po yang nye ba la /
translated: Thus, it is certain that the absence of the object is ascertained by the absence of perception.

original: gal te mngon sum mi 'jug na ni 'gar yang 'jug par mi 'gyur te /
analyzed: gal te mngon sum mi 'jug na ni 'gar yang 'jug par mi 'gyur te /
translated: If, when the cause of perception is present and the object appears, perception does not occur, it will never occur,

original: de ni de tsam gyi rgyu mtshan can nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de ni de tsam gyi rgyu mtshan can nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because it occurs only when those conditions are present.

original: de'i phyir la lar rgyu mtshan de tsam gyis mngon sum 'jug na ni /
analyzed: de'i phyir la lar rgyu mtshan de tsam gyis mngon sum 'jug na ni /
translated: Therefore, if perception occurs in some cases because of those conditions,

original: 'dir yang dngos po de yod na 'jug par 'gyur ro zhes ldog par nges so //
analyzed: 'dir yang dngos po de yod na 'jug par 'gyur ro zhes ldog par nges so //
translated: then it is certain that it will occur when the object is present, and that it will not occur when it is not present.

original: des na rgyu gzhan yod cing snang ba'i dngos po yod na nges par dmigs pa'i phyir /
analyzed: des na rgyu gzhan yod cing snang ba'i dngos po yod na nges par dmigs pa'i phyir /
translated: Thus, because the absence of the object is ascertained by the absence of perception when the cause of perception is present and the object appears,

original: dmigs pa med pa las med pa nyid du gdon mi @187b za bar nges pa yin no //
analyzed: dmigs pa med pa las med pa nyid du gdon mi @187b za bar nges pa yin no //
translated: it is certain that the absence of perception is the reason for the absence of the object.

original: de dang mthun pa nyid la yod pa zhes bya ba de tsam gyis mi mthun pa'i phyogs las ldog pa gang yin pa de gtan tshigs yin no zhes nges pa na med pa la med pa nyid brjod pa don med pa las de byas pa ni nges par
analyzed: de dang mthun pa nyid la yod pa zhes bya ba de tsam gyis mi mthun pa'i phyogs las ldog pa gang yin pa de gtan tshigs yin no zhes nges pa na med pa la med pa nyid brjod pa don med pa las de byas pa ni nges par
translated: When one ascertains that, the expression of nonexistence in regard to nonexistence is purposeless.

original: bya ba'i phyir yin no //
analyzed: bya ba'i phyir yin no //
translated: It is done in order to ascertain that.

original: grub zin pa la rtsom pa ni nges par bya ba'i phyir ro zhes bya bas 'di ni rigs pa yin no //
analyzed: grub zin pa la rtsom pa ni nges par bya ba'i phyir ro zhes bya bas 'di ni rigs pa yin no //
translated: Since one undertakes that which has already been accomplished in order to ascertain it, this is reasonable.🔽As for the kind of ascertainment that is shown, some understand that the effect of ascertainment is this:🔽The triply characterized is only nonexistence in regard to nonexistence, not in regard to anything else, nor in regard to the contradictory.🔽Some understand that the effect of ascertainment is this:🔽The triply characterized is only nonexistence in regard to nonexistence, not in regard to anything else, nor in regard to the contradictory.🔽Some understand that the effect of ascertainment is this:

original: nges pa ci 'dra ba zhig yin pa ston pa ni med pa kho na las med pa nyid ni tshul gsum pa yin gyi gzhan pa la yang ma yin pa 'gal ba la yang ma yin no zhes bya ba 'di ni nges pa'i 'bras bu yin no zhes
analyzed: nges pa ci 'dra ba zhig yin pa ston pa ni med pa kho na las med pa nyid ni tshul gsum pa yin gyi gzhan pa la yang ma yin pa 'gal ba la yang ma yin no zhes bya ba 'di ni nges pa'i 'bras bu yin no zhes
translated: The triply characterized is only nonexistence in regard to nonexistence, not in regard to anything else, nor in regard to the contradictory.

original: kha cig gis rtogs so //
analyzed: kha cig gis rtogs so //
translated: Some understand that the effect of ascertainment is this:

original: 'di ltar lus can nyid la sogs pa ni mi rtag pa nyid las chos gzhan yin zhing /
analyzed: 'di ltar lus can nyid la sogs pa ni mi rtag pa nyid las chos gzhan yin zhing /
translated: The triply characterized is only nonexistence in regard to nonexistence, not in regard to anything else, nor in regard to the contradictory.

original: gzhan yang mi mthun pa'i phyogs nyid yin pas gtan tshigs 'ga' yang med par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gzhan yang mi mthun pa'i phyogs nyid yin pas gtan tshigs 'ga' yang med par 'gyur ro //
translated: Moreover, since it is the very opposite, there would be no reason at all.

original: gang zhig mi rtag pa nyid la sogs pa gcig kho na la yod kyi gzhan la med pa'i chos 'ga' yang med de /
analyzed: gang zhig mi rtag pa nyid la sogs pa gcig kho na la yod kyi gzhan la med pa'i chos 'ga' yang med de /
translated: There is no property whatsoever that exists only in impermanence, etc., and does not exist elsewhere.

original: des na 'ga' zhig kyang gtan tshigs su mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: des na 'ga' zhig kyang gtan tshigs su mi 'gyur ro //
translated: Therefore, nothing would be a reason.

original: 'gal ba tsam mi mthun pa'i phyogs yin na yang de nyid las rnam par bcad pa'i phyir mes dro ba rtogs par mi 'gyur te /🔽grang ba yang ma yin /
analyzed: 'gal ba tsam mi mthun pa'i phyogs yin na yang de nyid las rnam par bcad pa'i phyir mes dro ba rtogs par mi 'gyur te / grang ba yang ma yin /
translated: Even if mere contradiction were the opposite, then because of the exclusion of that, heat would not be understood by fire,

original: dro ba yang ma yin pa ma bzlog ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: dro ba yang ma yin pa ma bzlog ba'i phyir ro //
translated: because neither cold nor heat would be excluded.

original: ji skad du 'gal ba las rnam par bcad par thal ba'i phyir dang / gtan tshigs med par 'gyur ba'i phyir ro zhes brjod pa yin no //
analyzed: ji skad du 'gal ba las rnam par bcad par thal ba'i phyir dang / gtan tshigs med par 'gyur ba'i phyir ro zhes brjod pa yin no //
translated: As it was said, “Because of the absurd consequence of exclusion from contradiction and because there would be no reason.”

original: de la de dang mthun pa nyid la yod pa zhes brjod pa na gzhan pa dang 'gal ba med pa de dang mthun pa ma yin pa thams cad la med pa nyid mtshan nyid gzhan du thal bas na /
analyzed: de la de dang mthun pa nyid la yod pa zhes brjod pa na gzhan pa dang 'gal ba med pa de dang mthun pa ma yin pa thams cad la med pa nyid mtshan nyid gzhan du thal bas na /
translated: In that regard, when it is said that something exists in that which is similar to it, there is no contradiction with something else. But it would follow that nonexistence would be a different characteristic from that which is similar to it, since it would not exist in all that is not similar to it.

original: med pa nyid la med pa tshul gsum pa yin gyi /
analyzed: med pa nyid la med pa tshul gsum pa yin gyi /
translated: Therefore, nonexistence is the third mode of nonexistence,🔽but it is not something else or a contradiction.

original: gzhan pa 'am 'gal ba ni ma yin no zhes bstan pa'i phyir nges par bya ba'i don du med pa nyid la zhes bshad do zhes so //
analyzed: gzhan pa 'am 'gal ba ni ma yin no zhes bstan pa'i phyir nges par bya ba'i don du med pa nyid la zhes bshad do zhes so //
translated: In order to demonstrate this, it is explained that the meaning of “in nonexistence” is to be ascertained.

original: slob dpon gyis 'di dgag pa'i phyir bshad pa /
analyzed: slob dpon gyis 'di dgag pa'i phyir bshad pa /
translated: In order to refute this, the master Buddhapālita explains:

original: 'di med pa la med par brjod pa'i don de ltar rtogs pa de la'o //
analyzed: 'di med pa la med par brjod pa'i don de ltar rtogs pa de la'o //
translated: “In nonexistence” refers to the object that is expressed as “nonexistent.”

original: 'di skad du brjod pa yin te /
analyzed: 'di skad du brjod pa yin te /
translated: This is what is being said.

original: chos gzhan la yod pa srid pa de 'gog pa de ltar dogs pa ni med do //
analyzed: chos gzhan la yod pa srid pa de 'gog pa de ltar dogs pa ni med do //
translated: There is no doubt that the existence of something else is refuted in this way.

original: ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: mi srid pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: mi srid pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: Because it is impossible.

original: 'di skad brjod par 'gyur te /
analyzed: 'di skad brjod par 'gyur te /
translated: This is what is being said.

original: mi rtag pa nyid las tha dad pa'i chos las yod pa 'gag pa ni dogs pa ma yin te /
analyzed: mi rtag pa nyid las tha dad pa'i chos las yod pa 'gag pa ni dogs pa ma yin te /
translated: It is not doubted that cessation exists as a dharma that is different from impermanence,

original: chos gcig kho na la yod pa ni mi srid pa'i phyir ro //🔽gal te de ltar gyur pa srid na ni de'i tshe dngos po med pa ma brjod na de rtogs pa'i don du chos gzhan la 'jug pa dgag par dogs @188a * //
analyzed: chos gcig kho na la yod pa ni mi srid pa'i phyir ro // gal te de ltar gyur pa srid na ni de'i tshe dngos po med pa ma brjod na de rtogs pa'i don du chos gzhan la 'jug pa dgag par dogs @188a * //
translated: because it is impossible for existence to belong to just one dharma.

original: par 'gyur ba zhig na rnam pa de lta bu ni mi srid do //
analyzed: par 'gyur ba zhig na rnam pa de lta bu ni mi srid do //
translated: If such a possibility existed, then at that time, if nonexistence were not mentioned, it would be doubted that another dharma would be engaged in order to understand that, but such a possibility does not exist.

original: de nyid kyi phyir rnam pa gzhan 'gog par rtogs par 'gyur te /
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir rnam pa gzhan 'gog par rtogs par 'gyur te /
translated: Therefore, it is understood that another aspect is refuted,

original: de nyid srid pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de nyid srid pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because that possibility exists.

original: des na mthun pa nyid la yod pa zhes brjod na 'ga' yang chos gzhan las bzlog par dogs pa med do //
analyzed: des na mthun pa nyid la yod pa zhes brjod na 'ga' yang chos gzhan las bzlog par dogs pa med do //
translated: Therefore, if existence is mentioned in terms of a concordant aspect, then there is no doubt that anything is refuted by another dharma.

original: des na bzlog pa'i phyir med pa la med pa nyid smos pa don med do //
analyzed: des na bzlog pa'i phyir med pa la med pa nyid smos pa don med do //
translated: Therefore, it is pointless to mention nonexistence in order to refute nonexistence.

original: 'gal ba rnam par gcod par thal lo zhes gang brjod pa de mi rigs te /
analyzed: 'gal ba rnam par gcod par thal lo zhes gang brjod pa de mi rigs te /
translated: It follows that it is a negation of a contradiction, but that is illogical.

original: 'di ltar 'gal ba la gtan tshigs 'gog par rtogs pa de yang gal te de kho na la bye brag tu nges par 'gog par rtogs par bya ba yin na ni de'i tshe skyon du 'gyur ro /
analyzed: 'di ltar 'gal ba la gtan tshigs 'gog par rtogs pa de yang gal te de kho na la bye brag tu nges par 'gog par rtogs par bya ba yin na ni de'i tshe skyon du 'gyur ro /
translated: Thus, if you understand that the reason refutes the contradictory, and if you understand that it refutes only the contradictory, then there is a fault.

original: gang gi phyir de kho na las bzlog pa ni ma yin te /
analyzed: gang gi phyir de kho na las bzlog pa ni ma yin te /
translated: Because it is not the opposite of that.

original: 'on kyang grang ba yang ma yin dro ba yang ma yin gzhan las kyang yin no //
analyzed: 'on kyang grang ba yang ma yin dro ba yang ma yin gzhan las kyang yin no //
translated: But it is not cold and it is not warm, and it is also not from another.

original: 'di snyam du 'gal ba kho na mi mthun pa'i phyogs yin pa des na de kho na la ldog par 'gyur gyi /
analyzed: 'di snyam du 'gal ba kho na mi mthun pa'i phyogs yin pa des na de kho na la ldog par 'gyur gyi /
translated: If you think that only the contradictory is the counter-pervasion, then it would follow that it is the opposite of that.

original: de grang ba yang ma yin dro ba yang ma yin pa las kyang ldog pa ga las she na /
analyzed: de grang ba yang ma yin dro ba yang ma yin pa las kyang ldog pa ga las she na /
translated: But how could it be the opposite of not cold and not warm?

original: de dang mthun pa kho na la zhes smos so //
analyzed: de dang mthun pa kho na la zhes smos so //
translated: The phrase “only in what is similar to it” is stated.

original: de dang mthun pa'i phyogs kho na la gtan tshigs yod pa zhes bya ba'i tshig 'di tsam gyis ni 'gal ba kho na de dang mthun pa ma yin no zhes pa de ltar rtogs par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de dang mthun pa'i phyogs kho na la gtan tshigs yod pa zhes bya ba'i tshig 'di tsam gyis ni 'gal ba kho na de dang mthun pa ma yin no zhes pa de ltar rtogs par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: By this phrase alone, “the reason exists only in what is similar to it,” it is not understood that only the contradictory is not similar to it.

original: 'di ltar de dang mthun pa nyid la zhes brjod pas ni de dang mthun pa la yod par nges par 'gyur gyi /
analyzed: 'di ltar de dang mthun pa nyid la zhes brjod pas ni de dang mthun pa la yod par nges par 'gyur gyi /
translated: Thus, by saying “it is only in accordance with that,” it is ascertained that it exists in accordance with that.

original: de dang mthun pa ma yin pa ni 'ga' yang nges par mi 'gyur na /🔽gang gi yin khyad par med pa nyid du mi 'gyur bar 'gal ba kho na mi mthun par 'gyur /
analyzed: de dang mthun pa ma yin pa ni 'ga' yang nges par mi 'gyur na / gang gi yin khyad par med pa nyid du mi 'gyur bar 'gal ba kho na mi mthun par 'gyur /
translated: But if it is not in accordance with that, then it is not ascertained at all.🔽If it is not ascertained, then it is not possible to say that it is not different from that.🔽If it is not different from that, then it is not possible to say that it is not the same as that.

original: gal te 'gal ba kho na mi mthun pa'i phyogs yin na skyon cir 'gyur zhe na /🔽bshad pa / 'gal ba kho na mi mthun pa'i phyogs yin pa gang gis mi mthun pa'i phyogs kho na las ldog pa'i phyir /🔽gtan tshigs med pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid kyis bsgrub bya dro ba rtogs par mi 'gyur ba'o //
analyzed: gal te 'gal ba kho na mi mthun pa'i phyogs yin na skyon cir 'gyur zhe na / bshad pa / 'gal ba kho na mi mthun pa'i phyogs yin pa gang gis mi mthun pa'i phyogs kho na las ldog pa'i phyir / gtan tshigs med pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid kyis bsgrub bya dro ba rtogs par mi 'gyur ba'o //
translated: If it is not the same as that, then it is not possible to say that it is not nonexistent.🔽If it is not nonexistent, then it is not possible to say that it is not existent.🔽If it is not existent, then it is not possible to say that it is not nonexistent.🔽If it is not nonexistent, then it is not possible to say that it is not existent.

original: 'di skad brjod pa yin te /
analyzed: 'di skad brjod pa yin te /
translated: If it is not existent, then it is not possible to say that it is not nonexistent.🔽If it is not nonexistent, then it is not possible to say that it is not existent.🔽If it is not existent, then it is not possible to say that it is not nonexistent.🔽If it is not nonexistent, then it is not possible to say that it is not existent.🔽If it is not existent, then it is not possible to say that it is not nonexistent.🔽If it is not nonexistent, then it is not possible to say that it is not existent.🔽If it is not existent, then it is not possible to say that it is not nonexistent.🔽If it is not nonexistent, then it is not possible to say that it is not existent.🔽If it is not existent, then it is not possible to say that it is not nonexistent.🔽If it is not nonexistent, then it is not possible to say that it is not existent.🔽If it is not existent, then it is not possible to say that it is not nonexistent.🔽If it is not nonexistent, then it is not possible to say that it is not existent.🔽If it is not existent, then it is not possible to say that it is not nonexistent.🔽If it is not nonexistent, then it is not possible to say that it is not existent.🔽If it is not existent, then it is not possible to say that it is not nonexistent.🔽If it is not nonexistent, then it is not possible to say that it is not existent.

original: mi mthun pa'i phyogs las ldog pa'i gtan tshigs ni da nyid ldog pa ston par byed pa na ldog pa'i sgo nas bsgrub bya sgrub par byed pa yin no //
analyzed: mi mthun pa'i phyogs las ldog pa'i gtan tshigs ni da nyid ldog pa ston par byed pa na ldog pa'i sgo nas bsgrub bya sgrub par byed pa yin no //
translated: If it is not existent, then it is not possible to say that it is not nonexistent

original: mi mthun pa'i phyogs kyang gal te 'gal ba nyid yin na ni 'gal ba de nyid las ldog pa'i gtan tshigs kyis de nyid zlog par byed bar 'gyur te //
analyzed: mi mthun pa'i phyogs kyang gal te 'gal ba nyid yin na ni 'gal ba de nyid las ldog pa'i gtan tshigs kyis de nyid zlog par byed bar 'gyur te //
translated: If the discordant side were contradiction, then a reason that is the opposite of that contradiction would reverse it.

original: 'gal ba ni bzlog par byas kyang dro ba rtogs par mi 'gyur te /
analyzed: 'gal ba ni bzlog par byas kyang dro ba rtogs par mi 'gyur te /
translated: But even if contradiction is reversed, heat is not understood.

original: mi mthun pa'i phyogs ma yin pa grang dro gnyi ga ma yin pa ma bzlog pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: mi mthun pa'i phyogs ma yin pa grang dro gnyi ga ma yin pa ma bzlog pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because neither heat nor cold, which are not discordant, are reversed.

original: de'i phyir 'gal ba 'ba' zhig mi @188b mthun pa'i phyogs yin na ni skyon 'dir 'gyur ba zhig na de dang mthun pa nyid la zhes brjod pa ni 'gal ba nyid gcig tu nges par mi mthun pa'i phyogs su khong du chud pa ma yin te /
analyzed: de'i phyir 'gal ba 'ba' zhig mi @188b mthun pa'i phyogs yin na ni skyon 'dir 'gyur ba zhig na de dang mthun pa nyid la zhes brjod pa ni 'gal ba nyid gcig tu nges par mi mthun pa'i phyogs su khong du chud pa ma yin te /
translated: Therefore, if only contradiction were the discordant side, this error would occur. But it is said to be “consistent with that,” because it is not understood that contradiction is definitely the discordant side in all cases.

original: 'on kyang de dang mthun pa las ldog pa dngos po med pa yang yin te /
analyzed: 'on kyang de dang mthun pa las ldog pa dngos po med pa yang yin te /
translated: However, it is also the non-existence of the opposite of that.

original: yang gi sgras ni da dang mthun pa las gzhan ba yang mi mthun pa'i phyogs yin no //
analyzed: yang gi sgras ni da dang mthun pa las gzhan ba yang mi mthun pa'i phyogs yin no //
translated: The word “also” indicates that the discordant side is also different from that.

original: 'di ltar de dang mthun pa las ldog pa de las gzhan pa dang de dang 'gal ba yang thams cad de dang mthun pa ma yin la /
analyzed: 'di ltar de dang mthun pa las ldog pa de las gzhan pa dang de dang 'gal ba yang thams cad de dang mthun pa ma yin la /
translated: Thus, the opposite of that which is in accordance with it is not all that is other than that, nor is that which is incompatible with it.

original: de dang mthun pa ma yin pa gang yin pa de thams cad de dang mi mthun pa'i phyogs yin no //
analyzed: de dang mthun pa ma yin pa gang yin pa de thams cad de dang mi mthun pa'i phyogs yin no //
translated: And whatever is not in accordance with it is all that is not in accordance with it.

original: des na de la 'gal ba nyid las rnam par gcod par thal ba'i phyir ro zhes khyed kyis gang brjod pa'i skyon med pa de'i phyir khyed kyis bstan pa'i skyon spang ba'i phyir tshul gsum pa ni ma brjod pa nyid du 'gyur ro //
analyzed: des na de la 'gal ba nyid las rnam par gcod par thal ba'i phyir ro zhes khyed kyis gang brjod pa'i skyon med pa de'i phyir khyed kyis bstan pa'i skyon spang ba'i phyir tshul gsum pa ni ma brjod pa nyid du 'gyur ro //
translated: Therefore, since the fault of the over-extension of the contradictory would ensue, the third possibility is not stated in order to eliminate that fault which you have mentioned, since it is not nonexistent.

original: slob dpon gyi dgongs pa ni 'di yin te /
analyzed: slob dpon gyi dgongs pa ni 'di yin te /
translated: This is what the Acarya means.

original: med pa la med pa nyid rjod pa'i don ni gang zhig med pa tsam la med pa de ni gtan tshigs yin no zhes bya ba 'di yin no //
analyzed: med pa la med pa nyid rjod pa'i don ni gang zhig med pa tsam la med pa de ni gtan tshigs yin no zhes bya ba 'di yin no //
translated: The meaning of the expression “nonexistent in the nonexistent” is that the reason is that which is nonexistent in the mere nonexistence.

original: 'gal ba gzhan la ldog pa dag kyang med pa tsam du ni khyad par med do //
analyzed: 'gal ba gzhan la ldog pa dag kyang med pa tsam du ni khyad par med do //
translated: And the mere nonexistence of the other and the opposite is also not distinguished.

original: de'i phyir na gtan tshigs kyi bsgrub bya'i chos med pa tsam la med pa ni tshul gsum par bshad pa yin no //
analyzed: de'i phyir na gtan tshigs kyi bsgrub bya'i chos med pa tsam la med pa ni tshul gsum par bshad pa yin no //
translated: Therefore, the mere non-existence of the probandum of the reason is explained as the third mode.

original: gzhan pa tsam dang 'gal ba tsam la med pa nyid ni ma yin te /
analyzed: gzhan pa tsam dang 'gal ba tsam la med pa nyid ni ma yin te /
translated: It is not mere difference or mere contradiction that is non-existence.

original: 'gal ba 'ba' zhig mi mthun pa'i phyogs yin na de nyid las rnam par gcod par thal lo //
analyzed: 'gal ba 'ba' zhig mi mthun pa'i phyogs yin na de nyid las rnam par gcod par thal lo //
translated: If mere contradiction were the counter-position, it would follow that it is excluded from that itself.

original: gzhan pa tsam yang mi mthun pa'i phyogs ma yin te /
analyzed: gzhan pa tsam yang mi mthun pa'i phyogs ma yin te /
translated: Mere difference is also not the counter-position.

original: bsgrub bya mi rtag pa nyid la byas pa zhes bya ba gtan tshigs nyid ma yin par thal ba'i phyir te /
analyzed: bsgrub bya mi rtag pa nyid la byas pa zhes bya ba gtan tshigs nyid ma yin par thal ba'i phyir te /
translated: Because it would follow that the reason, called “produced,” would not be the reason for the probandum impermanence,

original: ldog pa'i yul mi rtag pa las gzhan du gyur pa med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: ldog pa'i yul mi rtag pa las gzhan du gyur pa med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because there is no difference from the impermanent object of the contrapositive.

original: chos gzhan ni bsgrub par bya ba'i chos la gzhan yin no zhes khyed kyis gzhan nyid du brtags pa gang yin pa de ni ma 'brel pa nyid de /
analyzed: chos gzhan ni bsgrub par bya ba'i chos la gzhan yin no zhes khyed kyis gzhan nyid du brtags pa gang yin pa de ni ma 'brel pa nyid de /
translated: The other property that you imagine to be different from the probandum is just unrelated.

original: 'di ltar ldog pa la ltos nas brtags pa'i chos gzhan la ni byas pa nyid ma yin gyi 'on kyang chos can dngos por gyur pa nyid la yin no //
analyzed: 'di ltar ldog pa la ltos nas brtags pa'i chos gzhan la ni byas pa nyid ma yin gyi 'on kyang chos can dngos por gyur pa nyid la yin no //
translated: Thus, it is not the case that the property of being produced is not a different property that is examined in reliance on a different isolate. However, it is a real property that is the basis of attributes.

original: 'di snyam du de yang chos de las gzhan ma yin no snyam na /
analyzed: 'di snyam du de yang chos de las gzhan ma yin no snyam na /
translated: If you think that it is not different from that property,

original: bden te / 'on kyang chos de dang ldan pas de nyid gzhan yin no zhes ni bsnyad par mi nus te /
analyzed: bden te / 'on kyang chos de dang ldan pas de nyid gzhan yin no zhes ni bsnyad par mi nus te /
translated: then it is true that it is not different, but it cannot be said that it is different because it possesses that property.

original: 'di ltar mi rtag pa dang ldan pa'i phyir ni de re zhig mthun pa'i phyogs yin la /
analyzed: 'di ltar mi rtag pa dang ldan pa'i phyir ni de re zhig mthun pa'i phyogs yin la /
translated: In this way, because it possesses impermanence, it is a concordant example.

original: chos gzhan dang ldan pas ni mi mthun pa'i phyogs yin no zhes bstan par mi nus pa ma yin no //🔽bram ze dang ldan pas bram ze yin pa nyid chos gzhan dang ldan pas bram ze ma yin pa ni @189a * //
analyzed: chos gzhan dang ldan pas ni mi mthun pa'i phyogs yin no zhes bstan par mi nus pa ma yin no // bram ze dang ldan pas bram ze yin pa nyid chos gzhan dang ldan pas bram ze ma yin pa ni @189a * //
translated: It cannot be said that because it possesses another property it is a discordant example.

original: ma yin gyi /
analyzed: ma yin gyi /
translated: Because it possesses a Brahmin, it is a Brahmin. It is not that because it possesses another property it is not a Brahmin.

original: 'on kyang skabs su bab ba'i chos kyi rten ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'on kyang skabs su bab ba'i chos kyi rten ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: However, because it is not the basis of the property that is the topic at hand, it is not a Brahmin.

original: des na mi rtag pa nyid kyi rten ma yin pa kho na gzhan yin gyi /
analyzed: des na mi rtag pa nyid kyi rten ma yin pa kho na gzhan yin gyi /
translated: Therefore, it is not the basis of impermanence, and it is different.

original: mi rtag pa dang ldan pa nyid ni ma yin no //
analyzed: mi rtag pa dang ldan pa nyid ni ma yin no //
translated: but not with impermanence.

original: de'i phyir gzhung 'di la slob dpon gyi dgongs pa ni gzhan du yin no //
analyzed: de'i phyir gzhung 'di la slob dpon gyi dgongs pa ni gzhan du yin no //
translated: Therefore, the Master’s intention in this treatise is different.

original: 'o na ji ltar med pa la med pa nyid brjod ce na /
analyzed: 'o na ji ltar med pa la med pa nyid brjod ce na /
translated: But how can non-existence be stated as non-existence?

original: smras pa / rjes su 'gro ba dang / ldog pa dag gi sbyor ba bstan pa'i don te /
analyzed: smras pa / rjes su 'gro ba dang / ldog pa dag gi sbyor ba bstan pa'i don te /
translated: We reply: The purpose is to show the application of concomitance and reverse concomitance.

original: dgos pa gang la yod pa ste /
analyzed: dgos pa gang la yod pa ste /
translated: It is the purpose of what?

original: mi mthun pa'i phyogs la med par brjod pa ni sbyor ba bstan pa'i phyir yin no //
analyzed: mi mthun pa'i phyogs la med par brjod pa ni sbyor ba bstan pa'i phyir yin no //
translated: The statement of non-existence in the discordant class is for the purpose of showing the application.

original: yang sbyor ba bstan pa ci lta bu zhig ce na /
analyzed: yang sbyor ba bstan pa ci lta bu zhig ce na /
translated: But what is the application that is shown?

original: bshad pa / rjes su 'gro ba dang ldog pa dag gi nang nas thams cad nye bar bsdus pa'i khyab pa nges pa dang ldan pa'i tshul gang yin pa de gcig sbyar ba'i shugs kyis so //
analyzed: bshad pa / rjes su 'gro ba dang ldog pa dag gi nang nas thams cad nye bar bsdus pa'i khyab pa nges pa dang ldan pa'i tshul gang yin pa de gcig sbyar ba'i shugs kyis so //
translated: We reply: The method of ascertaining the pervasion that includes everything within concomitance and reverse concomitance is by the force of applying one.

original: shugs las rtogs pa ni don gyis go ba ste /
analyzed: shugs las rtogs pa ni don gyis go ba ste /
translated: Realization by force is understanding by implication.

original: de gnyis pa rtogs par byed de go bar byed pa yin no //
analyzed: de gnyis pa rtogs par byed de go bar byed pa yin no //
translated: That is the second realization, which is the means of understanding.

original: de'i phyir zhes bya ba ni gang gi phyir khyab pa dang ldan pa gcig brjod pas gnyis la 'phen pa de'i phyir gcig nyid sbyor gyi gnyi ga ni ma yin no //
analyzed: de'i phyir zhes bya ba ni gang gi phyir khyab pa dang ldan pa gcig brjod pas gnyis la 'phen pa de'i phyir gcig nyid sbyor gyi gnyi ga ni ma yin no //
translated: “Therefore” means: because one is implied by the other when one of a pair of pervasives is stated, therefore only one is used, not both.

original: khyab pa yang nges par gzung bas go bar bya ba yin te /
analyzed: khyab pa yang nges par gzung bas go bar bya ba yin te /
translated: And the pervasion is understood by the specification.

original: des na nges par gzung ba dang ldan pa'i ngag gis nges pa ci 'dra ba dang ldan par brjod pa de 'dra ba nyid sbyar bar bya'o zhes bslab pa'i phyir /
analyzed: des na nges par gzung ba dang ldan pa'i ngag gis nges pa ci 'dra ba dang ldan par brjod pa de 'dra ba nyid sbyar bar bya'o zhes bslab pa'i phyir /
translated: Therefore, in order to learn that the statement with specification should be used with the same specification as the pervasion,

original: dag gnyi ga la nges par gzung ba dang bcas par bstan to //
analyzed: dag gnyi ga la nges par gzung ba dang bcas par bstan to //
translated: both are taught with specification.

original: ci ste gnyi ga dus gcig tu sbyar bar mi bya'o zhes gcig nges pa dang ldan pa'i ngag sbyar bar bya bar bstan tam zhe na /
analyzed: ci ste gnyi ga dus gcig tu sbyar bar mi bya'o zhes gcig nges pa dang ldan pa'i ngag sbyar bar bya bar bstan tam zhe na /
translated: But if it is taught that only one statement with specification should be used, not both,

original: ma yin no zhes smra'o //
analyzed: ma yin no zhes smra'o //
translated: we say no.

original: 'o na ci ltar zhe na /
analyzed: 'o na ci ltar zhe na /
translated: How then?

original: 'bras bu gzhan gyi phyir nges pa dang ldan par sbyar bar bya ba nyid yin la /
analyzed: 'bras bu gzhan gyi phyir nges pa dang ldan par sbyar bar bya ba nyid yin la /
translated: It is only the statement with specification that is used for the sake of another result.

original: de sbyar ba na yang gnyis pa ni brjod pa nyid ni zhar la 'ongs pa yin no //
analyzed: de sbyar ba na yang gnyis pa ni brjod pa nyid ni zhar la 'ongs pa yin no //
translated: When it is applied, the second is merely mentioned in passing.

original: 'di ltar yod pa dang med pa tsam rjes su 'gro ba dang ldog pa yin par brjod na ni sbyor ba gnyi ga yang go bar byed pa ma yin par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'di ltar yod pa dang med pa tsam rjes su 'gro ba dang ldog pa yin par brjod na ni sbyor ba gnyi ga yang go bar byed pa ma yin par 'gyur ro //
translated: If mere existence and nonexistence were said to be the forward and reverse pervasions, then neither syllogism would be an effective proof.

original: 'di ltar nges pa med na ni sbyor ba'i don 'di 'dra bar 'gyur te /
analyzed: 'di ltar nges pa med na ni sbyor ba'i don 'di 'dra bar 'gyur te /
translated: If there were no certainty, then the meaning of the syllogism would be as follows:

original: gang zhig mthun pa'i phyogs la yod pa dang mi mthun pa'i phyogs la med pa de gtan tshigs yin no zhes bya bar ro //
analyzed: gang zhig mthun pa'i phyogs la yod pa dang mi mthun pa'i phyogs la med pa de gtan tshigs yin no zhes bya bar ro //
translated: That which exists in the similar class and does not exist in the dissimilar class is a reason.

original: shing phung gcig las skyes pa la yang mthun pa'i phyogs la yod pa tsam dang / mi mthun pa'i phyogs la med pa tsam yod pa nyid do /
analyzed: shing phung gcig las skyes pa la yang mthun pa'i phyogs la yod pa tsam dang / mi mthun pa'i phyogs la med pa tsam yod pa nyid do /
translated: But even in the case of something that arises from a single tree stump, there is mere existence in the similar class and mere nonexistence in the dissimilar class.

original: des na de bzlog pa'i phyir yod pa dang med pa nges pa nyid du brjod par bya ba yin la /
analyzed: des na de bzlog pa'i phyir yod pa dang med pa nges pa nyid du brjod par bya ba yin la /
translated: Therefore, in order to avoid that fault, it is necessary to state the certainty of existence and nonexistence.

original: nges pa gcig nyid du yod pa 'am med @189b par brdzad pa na yang gnyis pa 'phen pa yin no //
analyzed: nges pa gcig nyid du yod pa 'am med @189b par brdzad pa na yang gnyis pa 'phen pa yin no //
translated: If one is certain that it is either existent or nonexistent, then the second is implied.

original: de la don dam pa ni 'di yin te /
analyzed: de la don dam pa ni 'di yin te /
translated: The ultimate point is this:

original: nges pa nyid du brjod pas na gtan tshigs go bar byed pa yin pa de'i phyir nges pa ni gdon mi za bar bya ba yin la /
analyzed: nges pa nyid du brjod pas na gtan tshigs go bar byed pa yin pa de'i phyir nges pa ni gdon mi za bar bya ba yin la /
translated: Since the reason is stated with certainty, it is understood. Therefore, certainty is indispensable.

original: nges pa yang gcig brjod na gnyis pa 'phen pa yin pa'i phyir gnyis pa sbyar bar mi bya'o //
analyzed: nges pa yang gcig brjod na gnyis pa 'phen pa yin pa'i phyir gnyis pa sbyar bar mi bya'o //
translated: And since the second is implied when one is stated with certainty, the second should not be stated.

original: gtan tshigs mthun pa'i phyogs nyid la nges pa ni 'brel pa las yin zhing /
analyzed: gtan tshigs mthun pa'i phyogs nyid la nges pa ni 'brel pa las yin zhing /
translated: Certainty with respect to the similar class is from the relation.

original: de nyid las mi mthun pa'i phyogs las ldog pa yin no //
analyzed: de nyid las mi mthun pa'i phyogs las ldog pa yin no //
translated: And from that alone, there is the exclusion from the dissimilar class.🔽The exclusion that possesses certainty with respect to the dissimilar class is from the relation itself.

original: mi mthun pa'i phyogs las nges pa dang ldan par ldog pa yang 'brel pa nyid las mthun pa'i phyogs las nges pa de nyid las yin la /
analyzed: mi mthun pa'i phyogs las nges pa dang ldan par ldog pa yang 'brel pa nyid las mthun pa'i phyogs las nges pa de nyid las yin la /
translated: And from that alone, there is certainty with respect to the similar class.

original: 'brel pa de yang rjes su 'gro ba'i mtshan nyid yin pa'i phyir ldog pa sbyar ba na yang rjes su 'gro ba rtogs pa yin no //
analyzed: 'brel pa de yang rjes su 'gro ba'i mtshan nyid yin pa'i phyir ldog pa sbyar ba na yang rjes su 'gro ba rtogs pa yin no //
translated: Moreover, that relation is characterized by positive concomitance, so when the contrapositive is applied, positive concomitance is understood.

original: de ni gcig rtogs pa na yang gnyis pa rtogs par nges pa 'khrul par bsgrub pa'i phyir /
analyzed: de ni gcig rtogs pa na yang gnyis pa rtogs par nges pa 'khrul par bsgrub pa'i phyir /
translated: In order to prove that when one is understood, the other is ascertained,

original: gal te zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos so //
analyzed: gal te zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos so //
translated: he says “If” and so on.

original: mnyan par bya ba nyid ldog pa yin yang go bar byed pa nyid ma yin pa de'i phyir ldog pa rtogs pas rjes su 'gro ba nges pa ldan par rtogs so zhes ji ltar brjod /
analyzed: mnyan par bya ba nyid ldog pa yin yang go bar byed pa nyid ma yin pa de'i phyir ldog pa rtogs pas rjes su 'gro ba nges pa ldan par rtogs so zhes ji ltar brjod /
translated: Even though the quality of being audible is contravened, it is not the reason, so how can it be said that understanding the contrapositive entails understanding positive concomitance?

original: gtan tshigs ni rab tu grub pa'i rjes su 'gro ba dang ldog pa dag gis go bar byed pa yin te /
analyzed: gtan tshigs ni rab tu grub pa'i rjes su 'gro ba dang ldog pa dag gis go bar byed pa yin te /
translated: The reason is understood through the established positive and negative concomitance.

original: des na ldog pa rtogs kyang rjes su 'gro ba mi rtogs pa de'i phyir mnyan par bya ba nyid go bar byed pa ma yin no zhe na /
analyzed: des na ldog pa rtogs kyang rjes su 'gro ba mi rtogs pa de'i phyir mnyan par bya ba nyid go bar byed pa ma yin no zhe na /
translated: Therefore, even though the contrapositive is understood, positive concomitance is not understood, so the quality of being audible is not the reason.

original: de bzlog pa'i phyir ma yin te zhes smos so ;
analyzed: de bzlog pa'i phyir ma yin te zhes smos so ;
translated: In order to refute that, he says “It is not the case that . . .”

original: / mnyan par bya ba nyid la ni ldog pa yod pa ma yin no //
analyzed: / mnyan par bya ba nyid la ni ldog pa yod pa ma yin no //
translated: But it is not the case that there is a reversal in the case of what is to be heard.

original: gal te ldog pa yod na ni nges par rjes su 'gro ba yang yod par 'gyur te /
analyzed: gal te ldog pa yod na ni nges par rjes su 'gro ba yang yod par 'gyur te /
translated: If there were a reversal, then there would also be a necessary concomitance,

original: med na mi 'byung ba yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: med na mi 'byung ba yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because of the absence of the effect in the absence of the cause.

original: 'ga' las kyang zhes bya ba ni rtag pa nyid dam mi rtag pa nyid la'o //
analyzed: 'ga' las kyang zhes bya ba ni rtag pa nyid dam mi rtag pa nyid la'o //
translated: From anything means from permanence or impermanence.

original: gal te 'ga' las ldog par nges na ni gang las ldog pa de la the tshom skye bar mi 'gyur gyi /
analyzed: gal te 'ga' las ldog par nges na ni gang las ldog pa de la the tshom skye bar mi 'gyur gyi /
translated: If there were a definite reversal from anything, then doubt would not arise with regard to that from which there is a reversal.

original: 'on kyang rang nyid yod pas de med par go bar byed pa nyid du 'gyur la /
analyzed: 'on kyang rang nyid yod pas de med par go bar byed pa nyid du 'gyur la /
translated: But rather, it would be the case that one would understand the absence of that by means of the presence of itself.

original: 'gal zla med par go na yang cig shos nges par yod par 'gyur ba'i phyir mnyan par bya ba nyid the tshom sgrub par byed par mi 'gyur ba zhig na /
analyzed: 'gal zla med par go na yang cig shos nges par yod par 'gyur ba'i phyir mnyan par bya ba nyid the tshom sgrub par byed par mi 'gyur ba zhig na /
translated: And if one understood the absence of the contradictory, then the other would be ascertained as present. Therefore, what is to be heard would not be a means of establishing doubt.

original: the tshom sgrub par byed pa'i rgyu'i phyir 'ga' las kyang log par nges par med pa yin no //
analyzed: the tshom sgrub par byed pa'i rgyu'i phyir 'ga' las kyang log par nges par med pa yin no //
translated: But because it is a means of establishing doubt, there is no definite reversal from anything.

original: 'di nyid gsal bar bya ba'i phyir ldog pa'i gtan tshigs nges pa'i rgyu nyid du bstan pa'i phyir ldog pa dang ldan pa la ni zhes smos so //
analyzed: 'di nyid gsal bar bya ba'i phyir ldog pa'i gtan tshigs nges pa'i rgyu nyid du bstan pa'i phyir ldog pa dang ldan pa la ni zhes smos so //
translated: In order to clarify this, he says, “When there is a reason for exclusion, there is no doubt,” in order to show that the reason for exclusion is the cause of certainty.

original: ldog pa dang ldan pa la ni the tshom yod pa ma yin te /
analyzed: ldog pa dang ldan pa la ni the tshom yod pa ma yin te /
translated: When there is a reason for exclusion, there is no doubt.

original: dper na byas pa nyid las mi rtag pa nyid bzhin no //
analyzed: dper na byas pa nyid las mi rtag pa nyid bzhin no //
translated: For example, impermanence is from being produced.

original: byas pa nyid de ni rtag pa las ldog pa na @190a * //
analyzed: byas pa nyid de ni rtag pa las ldog pa na @190a * //
translated: When that which is produced is excluded from permanence,

original: 'ga' zhig tu rang yod pa na zlog par byed pa nyid do //
analyzed: 'ga' zhig tu rang yod pa na zlog par byed pa nyid do //
translated: it is excluded from some other place, and it is excluded from itself.

original: byas pa nyid nges par rtag pa las ldog pa ni yin la byas pa nyid kyi yul rtag par the tshom yang za'o zhes ni brjod par mi nus so //
analyzed: byas pa nyid nges par rtag pa las ldog pa ni yin la byas pa nyid kyi yul rtag par the tshom yang za'o zhes ni brjod par mi nus so //
translated: One cannot say that the exclusion of permanence is certain, but that there is doubt about the object of production being permanent.

original: rtag pa nyid kyi yul la the tshom med na ni de yongs su spangs pas gnas pa'i mtshan nyid mi rtag pa nyid la yang the tshom med pa yin te /
analyzed: rtag pa nyid kyi yul la the tshom med na ni de yongs su spangs pas gnas pa'i mtshan nyid mi rtag pa nyid la yang the tshom med pa yin te /
translated: If there is no doubt about the object of permanence, then by eliminating that, there is also no doubt about impermanence, which is the characteristic of the remaining.

original: de'i phyir gang la ldog pa yod pa de ni the tshom gyi rgyu ma yin la /
analyzed: de'i phyir gang la ldog pa yod pa de ni the tshom gyi rgyu ma yin la /
translated: Therefore, that which has exclusion is not the cause of doubt.

original: gang zhig the tshom gyi rgyu yin ba de ni thams cad las ldog par the tshom du gyur ba yin no //
analyzed: gang zhig the tshom gyi rgyu yin ba de ni thams cad las ldog par the tshom du gyur ba yin no //
translated: That which is the cause of doubt is the opposite of all.

original: 'di snyam du mnyan par bya ba nyid 'ga' zhig las ldog bar de lta na yang ldog pa'i yul nyid ldog par nus pa yin gyi /
analyzed: 'di snyam du mnyan par bya ba nyid 'ga' zhig las ldog bar de lta na yang ldog pa'i yul nyid ldog par nus pa yin gyi /
translated: Even if it is like this, that which is the object of negation is capable of being negated,

original: cig shos kyi ngo bo sgrub pa la ni the tshom skyed pa yin no snyam na /
analyzed: cig shos kyi ngo bo sgrub pa la ni the tshom skyed pa yin no snyam na /
translated: but the other nature generates doubt in the proof.

original: dngos po'i chos zhes smos te /
analyzed: dngos po'i chos zhes smos te /
translated: It is said: “the property of an entity.”

original: mnyan par bya ba nyid ni dngos po'i chos yin la /
analyzed: mnyan par bya ba nyid ni dngos po'i chos yin la /
translated: Listenability is the property of an entity.

original: dngos po'i chos gang yin pa de yang dngos po thams cad la nges par ldog pa de lta na yang ldog pa'i yul nyid ma yin te /
analyzed: dngos po'i chos gang yin pa de yang dngos po thams cad la nges par ldog pa de lta na yang ldog pa'i yul nyid ma yin te /
translated: And that which is the property of an entity is necessarily negated in all entities. Even so, it is not the object of negation.

original: dngos po'i chos nyid ni de'i chos ma yin par 'gal ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: dngos po'i chos nyid ni de'i chos ma yin par 'gal ba'i phyir ro //
translated: Because it is contradictory that the property of an entity is not its property.

original: rtag pa dang mi rtag pa dag gis dngos po thams cad kyang phung po gnyis yin te /
analyzed: rtag pa dang mi rtag pa dag gis dngos po thams cad kyang phung po gnyis yin te /
translated: Permanence and impermanence are the two groups of all entities.

original: de'i phyir gcig las ldog na gnyis pa la nges par 'jug la /
analyzed: de'i phyir gcig las ldog na gnyis pa la nges par 'jug la /
translated: Therefore, if one is negated, the other is necessarily engaged.

original: zhugs na yang rang gi yul nye bar 'jog par byed pa yin no //
analyzed: zhugs na yang rang gi yul nye bar 'jog par byed pa yin no //
translated: and when it does engage, it does so by taking up its own object.

original: de'i phyir dngos po'i chos gcig las ldog na gzhan la nges par yod pas 'ga' la yang the tshom mi byed do //
