original: de lta ma yin na mig bzhin du gzung bar bya ba nyid du mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de lta ma yin na mig bzhin du gzung bar bya ba nyid du mi 'gyur ro //
translated: Otherwise, like the eye, it would not be the object to be apprehended.

original: rjes su dpag pa ni rjes su dpag par bya ba las dngos su ma skyes pa'i phyir de'i rnam pa yod pa ma yin no //
analyzed: rjes su dpag pa ni rjes su dpag par bya ba las dngos su ma skyes pa'i phyir de'i rnam pa yod pa ma yin no //
translated: Inference does not have the existence of the aspect of the object of inference, because it is not directly produced from that.

original: da ni don gang la mi dmigs pa tshad ma yin pa de bstan pa'i phyir bshad pa /
analyzed: da ni don gang la mi dmigs pa tshad ma yin pa de bstan pa'i phyir bshad pa /
translated: Now, in order to demonstrate the object in regard to which non-apprehension is valid knowledge, it is said:

original: med par nges pa ni med pa'i tha snyad de 'bras bu de nyid mi dmigs pa gang la yod pa'o //
analyzed: med par nges pa ni med pa'i tha snyad de 'bras bu de nyid mi dmigs pa gang la yod pa'o //
translated: The ascertainment of non-existence is the term “non-existence” which is present in the non-apprehension of that effect.

original: mi dmigs pa de ni de la mi 'khrul pa yin te /
analyzed: mi dmigs pa de ni de la mi 'khrul pa yin te /
translated: That non-apprehension is non-erroneous with regard to that.

original: med pa'i tha snyad @201a * //
analyzed: med pa'i tha snyad @201a * //
translated: The term “non-existence”

original: la mi 'khrul ba yin no //
analyzed: la mi 'khrul ba yin no //
translated: is non-erroneous with regard to the term “non-existence.”

original: gal te tha snyad ni 'bras bu yin la /
analyzed: gal te tha snyad ni 'bras bu yin la /
translated: If the term is the effect,

original: mi dmigs pa ni rgyu ma yin nam /
analyzed: mi dmigs pa ni rgyu ma yin nam /
translated: isn’t non-apprehension the cause?

original: rgyu ni 'bras bu la mi 'khrul par brjod mi nus so zhe na /
analyzed: rgyu ni 'bras bu la mi 'khrul par brjod mi nus so zhe na /
translated: It cannot be said that the cause is non-erroneous with regard to the effect.

original: bshad pa / sngon zhugs pa'i tha snyad grub pa la yul yod pa bdog pa la 'khrul pa med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: bshad pa / sngon zhugs pa'i tha snyad grub pa la yul yod pa bdog pa la 'khrul pa med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: In response, Āryadeva says: Because the term that is already produced is non-erroneous with regard to the existence of the object that is its basis.

original: 'di skad brjod pa yin te /
analyzed: 'di skad brjod pa yin te /
translated: This is what is being said:

original: gang du bskyed bya skyed byed kyi dngos pos rgyu mtshan dang rgyu mtshan gyi dngos po nyid yin pa der rgyu 'bras bu la 'khrul pa yin yang /
analyzed: gang du bskyed bya skyed byed kyi dngos pos rgyu mtshan dang rgyu mtshan gyi dngos po nyid yin pa der rgyu 'bras bu la 'khrul pa yin yang /
translated: If the cause is the basis of the effect that is produced, then the cause is erroneous with regard to the effect.

original: 'dir ni nges par sbyar ba'i rgyu mtshan dang rgyu mtshan can gyi dngos po yin no //
analyzed: 'dir ni nges par sbyar ba'i rgyu mtshan dang rgyu mtshan can gyi dngos po yin no //
translated: But here, the ascertainment is the basis of the term that is its effect.

original: 'di ltar shes pa dang shes bya'i bdag nyid snang ba mi dmigs pa'i yul la yul can med pa'i tha snyad rang 'dod kyis bcug pa yin zhing /
analyzed: 'di ltar shes pa dang shes bya'i bdag nyid snang ba mi dmigs pa'i yul la yul can med pa'i tha snyad rang 'dod kyis bcug pa yin zhing /
translated: Thus, the subject is posited by the desire of the person who sees the non-observation of the object that has the nature of the object of knowledge and the subject.

original: lan cig zhugs pa nyid las kyang 'brel pa shes pas yul de la rang gi 'dod pa tha snyad 'jug par bya ba yin no //
analyzed: lan cig zhugs pa nyid las kyang 'brel pa shes pas yul de la rang gi 'dod pa tha snyad 'jug par bya ba yin no //
translated: And, having entered into the relation, the conventional usage is applied to the object by the desire of the person.

original: de la gal te yul gzhan la de'i rgyu mtshan can gyi tha snyad zhugs par ma gyur na ni de 'dod ba dang 'brel pa yin yang 'dir mi 'jug par nus pa zhig na /
analyzed: de la gal te yul gzhan la de'i rgyu mtshan can gyi tha snyad zhugs par ma gyur na ni de 'dod ba dang 'brel pa yin yang 'dir mi 'jug par nus pa zhig na /
translated: If the conventional usage with that reason does not enter into another object, then, although it is related to the desire, it is not possible for it to enter here.

original: gang gi phyir gzhan dag tu de tsam gyi rgyu mtshan gyis rab tu zhugs pa de'i phyir 'dir yang de tsam la ltos nas 'jug par bya ba nyid do //
analyzed: gang gi phyir gzhan dag tu de tsam gyi rgyu mtshan gyis rab tu zhugs pa de'i phyir 'dir yang de tsam la ltos nas 'jug par bya ba nyid do //
translated: But because it does enter into another object with that reason, it is to be applied here also in dependence on that alone.

original: 'dod pas spyod pa las ma gtogs par ni gzhan dag tu de tsam la ltos nas 'jug pa yin la /
analyzed: 'dod pas spyod pa las ma gtogs par ni gzhan dag tu de tsam la ltos nas 'jug pa yin la /
translated: Except for the usage by desire, it enters into another object in dependence on that alone.

original: 'dir ni mi 'jug go zhes bya ba'i rgyu mtshan ni cung zad kyang yod pa ma yin no //
analyzed: 'dir ni mi 'jug go zhes bya ba'i rgyu mtshan ni cung zad kyang yod pa ma yin no //
translated: There is not the slightest reason to say that it does not apply here.

original: des na yul yod pa la de tsam gyi rgyu mtshan gyis tha snyad zhugs par sngar gtan la phebs pa nyid do //
analyzed: des na yul yod pa la de tsam gyi rgyu mtshan gyis tha snyad zhugs par sngar gtan la phebs pa nyid do //
translated: Therefore, it has already been established that the mere existence of the object is the reason for the application of the convention.

original: des na rgyu 'bras bu la mi 'khrul pa yin no //
analyzed: des na rgyu 'bras bu la mi 'khrul pa yin no //
translated: Thus, the cause is not in error with regard to the effect.

original: 'dir ni tha snyad ces bya ba'i 'bras bu nyid ni sgrub pa ma yin te /
analyzed: 'dir ni tha snyad ces bya ba'i 'bras bu nyid ni sgrub pa ma yin te /
translated: Here, the mere application of the convention is not the thesis.

original: de ni 'dod pa la rag las pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de ni 'dod pa la rag las pa'i phyir ro //
translated: That is because it depends on what is desired.

original: bsgrub par bya ba ni rung ba tsam yin no //
analyzed: bsgrub par bya ba ni rung ba tsam yin no //
translated: The thesis is merely the proper subject.

original: yang ci'i phyir mi dmigs pas dngos po med pa nyid mi bsgrub ce na /
analyzed: yang ci'i phyir mi dmigs pas dngos po med pa nyid mi bsgrub ce na /
translated: Why is the nonexistence of a thing not established by nonapprehension?

original: bshad pa / mi dmigs pa nyid ni rtags te /
analyzed: bshad pa / mi dmigs pa nyid ni rtags te /
translated: Nonapprehension is the reason.

original: des med pa bsgrub par bya ba yin na /
analyzed: des med pa bsgrub par bya ba yin na /
translated: If it establishes nonexistence,

original: ci ltar don med pa shes pa med pas bsgrub pa de bzhin du shes pa med pa yang shes pa gzhan med pas bsgrub par bya dgos so //
analyzed: ci ltar don med pa shes pa med pas bsgrub pa de bzhin du shes pa med pa yang shes pa gzhan med pas bsgrub par bya dgos so //
translated: then just as the nonexistence of the object is established by the nonapprehension of the object, so the nonapprehension of cognition would have to establish the nonexistence of cognition.

original: des na de'i dmigs pa med pa yang dmigs pa gzhan med pa'i mi dmigs pa gzhan gyis yin pas thug pa med par 'gyur te /
analyzed: des na de'i dmigs pa med pa yang dmigs pa gzhan med pa'i mi dmigs pa gzhan gyis yin pas thug pa med par 'gyur te /
translated: Therefore, the non-apprehension of the object of that is also the non-apprehension of another object, and so on, and so there is an infinite regress.

original: mi dmigs pa rnams kyi rang bzhin rtogs pa mthar thug pa med par 'gyur ba'i phyir ro zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: mi dmigs pa rnams kyi rang bzhin rtogs pa mthar thug pa med par 'gyur ba'i phyir ro zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning is that there is no final realization of the nature of non-apprehension.

original: thug pa @201b med pa de'i phyir ni gzhi ba'i don gyi dngos po mi rtog pa nyid du 'gyur ro //
analyzed: thug pa @201b med pa de'i phyir ni gzhi ba'i don gyi dngos po mi rtog pa nyid du 'gyur ro //
translated: And because of that infinite regress, the meaning of the basis is not ascertained.

original: ci ste pha rol gyi bsam pa ji ltar don ni gzhan la rag las nas bsal ba yin la /
analyzed: ci ste pha rol gyi bsam pa ji ltar don ni gzhan la rag las nas bsal ba yin la /
translated: But if the opponent thinks, “Just as the object is cleared away in dependence on another,

original: shes pa ni rang nyid gsal ba yin pa de bzhin du /
analyzed: shes pa ni rang nyid gsal ba yin pa de bzhin du /
translated: and consciousness is cleared in itself,

original: don med pa yang gzhan gyis gsal la /
analyzed: don med pa yang gzhan gyis gsal la /
translated: so too the non-object is cleared by another,

original: shes pa med pa ni rang nyid gsal la zhes bya ba yin no zhes smras pa ni ji ste dmigs pa med pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: shes pa med pa ni rang nyid gsal la zhes bya ba yin no zhes smras pa ni ji ste dmigs pa med pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
translated: and the non-consciousness is cleared in itself,” then Nāgārjuna addresses this point:

original: dmigs pa'i rang bzhin gyi shes pa ni don las tha dad pa'i phyir rang nyid gsal bar 'thad pa yin na /
analyzed: dmigs pa'i rang bzhin gyi shes pa ni don las tha dad pa'i phyir rang nyid gsal bar 'thad pa yin na /
translated: If consciousness that has the nature of an object is cleared in itself because it is different from the object,

original: med pa dag ni phan tshun khyad par med pa'i phyir gcig rang nyid gsal na gnyis pa la yang de'i rang bzhin ba zlog tu med do zhes bya ba'i bsam pa 'di smras pa ni /
analyzed: med pa dag ni phan tshun khyad par med pa'i phyir gcig rang nyid gsal na gnyis pa la yang de'i rang bzhin ba zlog tu med do zhes bya ba'i bsam pa 'di smras pa ni /
translated: The point of this argument is that if one of the two non-existent things is manifest, then the other one must also be manifest, because they are not different from each other.

original: de bzhin du yod pa med pa yang 'gyur bas mi dmigs pa dngos po med pa'i sgrub byed du nye bar gzhag pa don med do //
analyzed: de bzhin du yod pa med pa yang 'gyur bas mi dmigs pa dngos po med pa'i sgrub byed du nye bar gzhag pa don med do //
translated: But if they are existent, then non-apprehension is not a proof of non-existence.

original: ci ste yang de dag gzhan dmigs pas yul mi dmigs pa 'grub pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: ci ste yang de dag gzhan dmigs pas yul mi dmigs pa 'grub pa'i phyir ro //
translated: But if you say that the non-apprehension of an object is established by the apprehension of something else,

original: 'di skad brjod pa yin te /
analyzed: 'di skad brjod pa yin te /
translated: then you are saying this:

original: don gzhan gyi yul can gyi shes pa gang yin pa de nges pa'i rang bzhin nyid du grub na ni don gzhan dmigs pa med pa yang 'grub par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: don gzhan gyi yul can gyi shes pa gang yin pa de nges pa'i rang bzhin nyid du grub na ni don gzhan dmigs pa med pa yang 'grub par 'gyur ro //
translated: If it is established that a cognition which has a different object has a fixed nature, then the non-apprehension of a different object is also established.

original: de'i phyir mi dmigs pa ni mngon sum gyis grub pa yin gyi /
analyzed: de'i phyir mi dmigs pa ni mngon sum gyis grub pa yin gyi /
translated: Therefore, non-apprehension is established by perception,

original: mi dmigs pa la ltos pa ni ma yin no //
analyzed: mi dmigs pa la ltos pa ni ma yin no //
translated: and it is not dependent on non-apprehension.

original: de'i yul ni des grub pa yin no zhe na /
analyzed: de'i yul ni des grub pa yin no zhe na /
translated: And its object is established by it.

original: gal te de ltar na don gzhan yod par grub pas bum pa la sogs pa gzhan med pa ci ste mi 'grub /
analyzed: gal te de ltar na don gzhan yod par grub pas bum pa la sogs pa gzhan med pa ci ste mi 'grub /
translated: If that is so, since the existence of something else is established, why is the nonexistence of something else, such as a pot, not established?

original: ci ltar shes pa gzhan grub pas de ma yin pa'i shes pa med par grub pa de bzhin du /
analyzed: ci ltar shes pa gzhan grub pas de ma yin pa'i shes pa med par grub pa de bzhin du /
translated: Just as the existence of another consciousness is established, the nonexistence of a consciousness that is not that is established.

original: de las gzhan yod pas med pa grub pa'i phyir mi dmigs pa nye bar blangs pas ci zhig bya /
analyzed: de las gzhan yod pas med pa grub pa'i phyir mi dmigs pa nye bar blangs pas ci zhig bya /
translated: Since something else exists, nonexistence is established. What is the use of positing nonapprehension?

original: med pa ni mi dmigs pas grub pa yang ma yin no //
analyzed: med pa ni mi dmigs pas grub pa yang ma yin no //
translated: Nonexistence is not established by nonapprehension.

original: gal te med pa bsgrub par bya ba ma yin no //
analyzed: gal te med pa bsgrub par bya ba ma yin no //
translated: If nonexistence is not established,

original: 'o na ni de ma grub na med pa'i tha snyad kyang mi 'grub po //
analyzed: 'o na ni de ma grub na med pa'i tha snyad kyang mi 'grub po //
translated: then the convention of nonexistence is not established.

original: yul bsgrub par mi nus pa de bzhin du /
analyzed: yul bsgrub par mi nus pa de bzhin du /
translated: Just as the object cannot be established,

original: med pa'i tha snyad kyang mi dmigs pas rtogs par mi nus so zhe na /🔽gang gi tshe zhes smos so //
analyzed: med pa'i tha snyad kyang mi dmigs pas rtogs par mi nus so zhe na / gang gi tshe zhes smos so //
translated: so too the convention of nonexistence cannot be understood by nonapprehension.

original: gal te mi dmigs pa las med pa gzhan yin na ni /
analyzed: gal te mi dmigs pa las med pa gzhan yin na ni /
translated: If nonapprehension is different from nonexistence,

original: de'i tshe de ma grub na mi dmigs pas tha snyad rtogs par mi 'gyur ba zhig na /
analyzed: de'i tshe de ma grub na mi dmigs pas tha snyad rtogs par mi 'gyur ba zhig na /
translated: then when it is not established, the convention of nonexistence is not understood by nonapprehension.

original: gang gi tshe med pa mi dmigs pa las tha dad pa nyid ni yod pa ma yin gyi /🔽'on kyang rnam pa 'di lta bu zhes bya ba dmigs pa'i mtshan nyid kyir gyur pa'i mi dmigs pa nyid don med pa rnams kyi med pa yin gyi gzhan ni ma yin pa de'i tshe med pa'i mtshan nyid kyi yul @202a * //
analyzed: gang gi tshe med pa mi dmigs pa las tha dad pa nyid ni yod pa ma yin gyi / 'on kyang rnam pa 'di lta bu zhes bya ba dmigs pa'i mtshan nyid kyir gyur pa'i mi dmigs pa nyid don med pa rnams kyi med pa yin gyi gzhan ni ma yin pa de'i tshe med pa'i mtshan nyid kyi yul @202a * //
translated: When nonexistence is not different from nonapprehension,🔽nonapprehension is the characteristic of the object of the cognition that has the aspect “it does not exist,” and it is the sound “it does not exist,” and it is the engagement characterized by coming and going without hesitation.

original: grub pas yul can med do snyam pa'i rnam pa can gyi shes pa dang / med do zhes bya ba de lta bu'i sgra dang / dogs pa med par 'gro ba dang 'ong ba'i mtshan nyid kyi 'jug pa'i tha snyad de dag rang nyid rtogs pa 'am /🔽gzhan gyis sgrub par byed pa yin no //
analyzed: grub pas yul can med do snyam pa'i rnam pa can gyi shes pa dang / med do zhes bya ba de lta bu'i sgra dang / dogs pa med par 'gro ba dang 'ong ba'i mtshan nyid kyi 'jug pa'i tha snyad de dag rang nyid rtogs pa 'am / gzhan gyis sgrub par byed pa yin no //
translated: If you think that the object of the cognition that has the aspect “it does not exist” is not established, then the cognition that has the aspect “it does not exist” and the sound “it does not exist” and the engagement characterized by coming and going without hesitation would not be established.

original: gang gi phyir 'di tha snyad nyid la ma zhugs na gzhan gyis ji ltar sgrub par byed ce na /
analyzed: gang gi phyir 'di tha snyad nyid la ma zhugs na gzhan gyis ji ltar sgrub par byed ce na /
translated: If you think that the object of the cognition that has the aspect “it does not exist” is not established, then the cognition that has the aspect “it does not exist” and the sound “it does not exist” and the engagement characterized by coming and going without hesitation would not be established.🔽If you think that the object of the cognition that has the aspect “it does not exist” is not established, then the cognition that has the aspect “it does not exist” and the sound “it does not exist” and the engagement characterized by coming and going without hesitation would not be established.

original: bshad pa / yul te med pa'i tha snyad dang 'brel pa bum pas dben par dmigs pa'i phyogs rab tu bstan pas so //
analyzed: bshad pa / yul te med pa'i tha snyad dang 'brel pa bum pas dben par dmigs pa'i phyogs rab tu bstan pas so //
translated: Nāgārjuna responds: The basis is the place devoid of a pot, which is the domain of the term nonexistence.

original: bum pas dben pa'i sa phyogs de nyid ni med pa'i tha snyad kyi yul yin la /
analyzed: bum pas dben pa'i sa phyogs de nyid ni med pa'i tha snyad kyi yul yin la /
translated: That very place devoid of a pot is the domain of the term nonexistence.

original: de'i yul can gyi shes pa mi dmigs pa ni rgyu yin no //
analyzed: de'i yul can gyi shes pa mi dmigs pa ni rgyu yin no //
translated: The nonobservation of the consciousness that is its subject is the cause.

original: slob dpon ni la lar gyur tha snyad byed de /
analyzed: slob dpon ni la lar gyur tha snyad byed de /
translated: The master [Dignāga] sometimes uses the term basis.

original: rgyu mtshan gyis rgyu mtshan can rab tu bsgrub pa'i phyir ro zhes so //
analyzed: rgyu mtshan gyis rgyu mtshan can rab tu bsgrub pa'i phyir ro zhes so //
translated: This is because the basis is established by the reason.

original: la lar ni yul du ste dper na yul bstan pas yul can dran pa'i phyir ro zhes bstan pa lta bu'o //
analyzed: la lar ni yul du ste dper na yul bstan pas yul can dran pa'i phyir ro zhes bstan pa lta bu'o //
translated: Sometimes he uses the term domain, as in the statement, “Because the object is remembered by indicating the domain.”

original: brda ni nges pa ste /
analyzed: brda ni nges pa ste /
translated: A sign is a determination.

original: dngos po med pa'i brda la 'jug pa'i phyir ro ;
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i brda la 'jug pa'i phyir ro ;
translated: This is because a sign engages with the signifier of a nonexistent thing.

original: / su zhe na /
analyzed: / su zhe na /
translated: Who [uses these terms]?

original: rmongs pa'o // ci tha snyad rab tu zhugs pa'i yul rtogs kyang gang zhig yul can tha snyad ma rtogs ba 'ga' zhig yod dam zhe na yod do zhes bshad pa ni dper na 'di ni ba lang yin te /
analyzed: rmongs pa'o // ci tha snyad rab tu zhugs pa'i yul rtogs kyang gang zhig yul can tha snyad ma rtogs ba 'ga' zhig yod dam zhe na yod do zhes bshad pa ni dper na 'di ni ba lang yin te /
translated: There is, as explained in the following example: This is a cow.

original: 'dus pa 'di ni ba lang gi tha snyad du rung ba yin no //
analyzed: 'dus pa 'di ni ba lang gi tha snyad du rung ba yin no //
translated: This collection is suitable as the conventional usage “cow.”

original: lkog shal la sogs pa 'dus pa'i bdag nyid yin pa'i phyir te /
analyzed: lkog shal la sogs pa 'dus pa'i bdag nyid yin pa'i phyir te /
translated: Because it is the nature of a collection of dewlap and so on.

original: ba lang gi tha snyad kyi rgyu mtshan yin pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //🔽gang gi tshe blo gros blun po ba lang chung du la ba lang gi tha snyad zhugs kyang mi 'dra bar mthong nas ba lang chen po la tha snyad 'jug par mi byed pa de la rgyu mtshan rab tu bstan pas ba lang gi tha snyad la 'jug
analyzed: ba lang gi tha snyad kyi rgyu mtshan yin pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go // gang gi tshe blo gros blun po ba lang chung du la ba lang gi tha snyad zhugs kyang mi 'dra bar mthong nas ba lang chen po la tha snyad 'jug par mi byed pa de la rgyu mtshan rab tu bstan pas ba lang gi tha snyad la 'jug
translated: Because it is the reason for the conventional usage “cow.”

original: par byed de /
analyzed: par byed de /
translated: When a foolish person engages in the conventional usage “cow” with respect to a small cow but does not engage in the conventional usage with respect to a large cow because he sees a difference, he is taught the reason and engages in the conventional usage “cow.”

original: ba lang gi tha snyad ni lkog shal la sogs pa 'dus pa'i rgyu mtshan can yin gyi chung du'i rgyu mtshan can ni ma yin no //
analyzed: ba lang gi tha snyad ni lkog shal la sogs pa 'dus pa'i rgyu mtshan can yin gyi chung du'i rgyu mtshan can ni ma yin no //
translated: The convention “ox” is based on the collection of the dewlap and so on, but it is not based on the collection of the tail and so on.

original: des na 'di la yang rgyu mtshan yod pa'i phyir ci ltar na 'jug par mi byed /
analyzed: des na 'di la yang rgyu mtshan yod pa'i phyir ci ltar na 'jug par mi byed /
translated: Therefore, since there is a reason for this, why would you not engage in it?

original: de bzhin du mi dmigs pa la yang rgyu mtshan nyid rab tu bstan pas brda la 'jug pa yin te /
analyzed: de bzhin du mi dmigs pa la yang rgyu mtshan nyid rab tu bstan pas brda la 'jug pa yin te /
translated: In the same way, you engage in the convention of nonobservation through teaching the very reason for it.

original: 'di'i rgyu mtshan can gyis tha snyad 'di la khyod kyis sngar zhugs pa yin zhing /
analyzed: 'di'i rgyu mtshan can gyis tha snyad 'di la khyod kyis sngar zhugs pa yin zhing /
translated: “You previously engaged in this convention based on its reason,

original: 'di la yang rgyu mtshan yod pas 'jug bar bya'o zhes bya ba yin no //
analyzed: 'di la yang rgyu mtshan yod pas 'jug bar bya'o zhes bya ba yin no //
translated: and since there is a reason for this, you should engage in it.”

original: des na dpe ma grub par rgol ba khyab par byed pa'i dngos po 'gar yang rab tu grub pa med de /
analyzed: des na dpe ma grub par rgol ba khyab par byed pa'i dngos po 'gar yang rab tu grub pa med de /
translated: Therefore, the example is not established. The pervader is not established anywhere.🔽The proof of that is only nonobservation.

original: de'i sgrub par byed pa ni mi dmigs pa kho nar zad pa'i phyir ro zhes gang smras pa de yang @202b bsal ba yin te /
analyzed: de'i sgrub par byed pa ni mi dmigs pa kho nar zad pa'i phyir ro zhes gang smras pa de yang @202b bsal ba yin te /
translated: That is also refuted.

original: spangs pa yin par blta ste /
analyzed: spangs pa yin par blta ste /
translated: It should be seen as refuted.

original: rab tu zhugs pa'i tha snyad yin yang brda la 'jug par byed pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rab tu zhugs pa'i tha snyad yin yang brda la 'jug par byed pa'i phyir ro //
translated: although it is a convention of engagement, it is also a convention of engagement in the sense of engaging in the conventional.

original: de bzhin du shing gi khyad par shing sha pa chen po 'ga' zhig la shing gi tha snyad rab tu zhugs par gyur kyang /
analyzed: de bzhin du shing gi khyad par shing sha pa chen po 'ga' zhig la shing gi tha snyad rab tu zhugs par gyur kyang /
translated: Even though the term “tree” is applied to a particular kind of tree, a certain large śimśapā tree,

original: blo gros blun po shing sha pa chung du la rgyu mtshan med pas tha snyad mi rtogs pa la ;
analyzed: blo gros blun po shing sha pa chung du la rgyu mtshan med pas tha snyad mi rtogs pa la ;
translated: the foolish person does not understand the term because there is no reason for it.

original: 'di ni shing yin te sha pa yin pa'i phyir ro zhes 'jug par byed do //
analyzed: 'di ni shing yin te sha pa yin pa'i phyir ro zhes 'jug par byed do //
translated: He says, “This is a tree because it is a śimśapā.”

original: 'di lta bu la sogs pa mngon sum sngon du 'gro ba'i tha snyad ni thams cad du rjes su dpag pa kho na rtogs par byed pa ma yin gyi /🔽'on kyang gang gi tshe rgyu mtshan la rmongs ba de'i tshe rjes su dpag pas rtogs par byed do //
analyzed: 'di lta bu la sogs pa mngon sum sngon du 'gro ba'i tha snyad ni thams cad du rjes su dpag pa kho na rtogs par byed pa ma yin gyi / 'on kyang gang gi tshe rgyu mtshan la rmongs ba de'i tshe rjes su dpag pas rtogs par byed do //
translated: In all such cases, the application of a term that is preceded by perception is not understood by inference alone.🔽However, when one is confused about the reason, it is understood by inference.

original: rgyu mtshan la rmongs na ni mngon sum nyid las don rtogs par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: rgyu mtshan la rmongs na ni mngon sum nyid las don rtogs par 'gyur ro //
translated: If one is confused about the reason, then one understands the object from perception itself.

original: med pa'i tha snyad ni nam yang mngon sum las rtogs pa med de dngos po med pa'i yul la mngon sum med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: med pa'i tha snyad ni nam yang mngon sum las rtogs pa med de dngos po med pa'i yul la mngon sum med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: The convention of nonexistence is never understood from perception, because perception does not have a nonexistent object.

original: med pa'i tha snyad ni thams cad kyi tshe rtogs pa pos shes mod kyi 'on kyang med ba'i tha snyad kyi yul rigs sna tshogs kyi phyir /🔽gang gi tshe rgyu mtshan la rmongs pa de'i tshe rang bzhin gyi gtan tshigs kyi sgo nas rang nyid rtogs pa 'am /
analyzed: med pa'i tha snyad ni thams cad kyi tshe rtogs pa pos shes mod kyi 'on kyang med ba'i tha snyad kyi yul rigs sna tshogs kyi phyir / gang gi tshe rgyu mtshan la rmongs pa de'i tshe rang bzhin gyi gtan tshigs kyi sgo nas rang nyid rtogs pa 'am /
translated: The convention of nonexistence is understood by the cognizer at all times, but because the object of the convention of nonexistence is various reasons,

original: gzhan gyis rtogs par byed pa yin no //
analyzed: gzhan gyis rtogs par byed pa yin no //
translated: when one is confused about the reason, then one understands it by means of a natural reason, or one causes another to understand it.

original: ma rmongs pa ni thams cad du khyab byed mi dmigs pa kho nas rtogs pa yin la /
analyzed: ma rmongs pa ni thams cad du khyab byed mi dmigs pa kho nas rtogs pa yin la /
translated: When one is not confused, one always understands it by means of the nonapprehension of the pervader.

original: khyab par bya ba dang khyab bar byed pa'i dngos po la rmongs pa ni rang bzhin gyi gtan tshigs las yin no //
analyzed: khyab par bya ba dang khyab bar byed pa'i dngos po la rmongs pa ni rang bzhin gyi gtan tshigs las yin no //
translated: And one is confused about the relation of the pervaded and the pervader in the case of a natural reason.

original: 'di ni shin tu rgyas pa skyed par byed par brjod pa la pha nyid bzhin zhes bya ba der bstan zin to //
analyzed: 'di ni shin tu rgyas pa skyed par byed par brjod pa la pha nyid bzhin zhes bya ba der bstan zin to //
translated: This has been explained in the context of the statement “like the father” in the extensive explanation.

original: des na 'dir rgya mi skyed do //
analyzed: des na 'dir rgya mi skyed do //
translated: Therefore, here the Chinese do not increase.

original: gang gis na dpe ma grub par rgol ba bsal zhe na /
analyzed: gang gis na dpe ma grub par rgol ba bsal zhe na /
translated: If it is asked how the opponent’s refutation of the nonestablishment of the example is refuted,

original: bshad pa med pa'i tha snyad 'brel par 'gyur ba'i yul rtogs kyang gang dag gis yul can ma rtogs pa'i tha snyad byed pa po de dag snang ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: bshad pa med pa'i tha snyad 'brel par 'gyur ba'i yul rtogs kyang gang dag gis yul can ma rtogs pa'i tha snyad byed pa po de dag snang ba'i phyir ro //
translated: the explanation is that even though the object that is connected to the term is understood, those who use the term without understanding the subject are illuminated.

original: ji ltar rtogs par byed pas yul 'ga' la ba lang gi tha snyad zhugs su zin kyang /
analyzed: ji ltar rtogs par byed pas yul 'ga' la ba lang gi tha snyad zhugs su zin kyang /
translated: Even though the term “ox” is used for some objects by those who understand,

original: tha snyad kyi yul rtogs pa la yang tha snyad 'jug par mi nus te /
analyzed: tha snyad kyi yul rtogs pa la yang tha snyad 'jug par mi nus te /
translated: the object of the term cannot be engaged by those who do not understand.

original: 'di ltar des ba lang chen po la ba lang gi tha snyad zhugs par byas la /
analyzed: 'di ltar des ba lang chen po la ba lang gi tha snyad zhugs par byas la /
translated: In that case, the term “ox” is used for a large ox.

original: rang bzhin mi 'dra ba'i chung du la ni tha snyad kyi rgyu mtshan med par rtogs pas mi 'jug pa de rgyu mtshan bstan pas 'jug pa des na dpe yod pa de bzhin du med pa'i tha snyad la zhugs pa yin yang rgyu mtshan gtan la phebs pa
analyzed: rang bzhin mi 'dra ba'i chung du la ni tha snyad kyi rgyu mtshan med par rtogs pas mi 'jug pa de rgyu mtshan bstan pas 'jug pa des na dpe yod pa de bzhin du med pa'i tha snyad la zhugs pa yin yang rgyu mtshan gtan la phebs pa
translated: Since the term is not used for a small one that has a different nature, it is not engaged. When the reason is explained, it is engaged. Since the example exists, the term “nonexistent” is used in that way.

original: med pa'i phyir 'jug par mi byed pa la mi dmigs pa rgyu mtshan du nye bar bstan pas 'jug par byed de /🔽des @203a * //
analyzed: med pa'i phyir 'jug par mi byed pa la mi dmigs pa rgyu mtshan du nye bar bstan pas 'jug par byed de / des @203a * //
translated: Since it does not exist, it is not engaged. Since non-observation is taught to be the reason, it is engaged.

original: na dpe yod pa yin no //
analyzed: na dpe yod pa yin no //
translated: Therefore the example exists.

original: dngos po ldog pa bkag pa ni dngos po med pa yin la /
analyzed: dngos po ldog pa bkag pa ni dngos po med pa yin la /
translated: The negation of the cessation of a thing is a non-thing.

original: mi dmigs pa dmigs pa la sogs pa yin na zhes bya ba la ni gang phyir gyi don te /
analyzed: mi dmigs pa dmigs pa la sogs pa yin na zhes bya ba la ni gang phyir gyi don te /
translated: If non-observation is the observation of a non-thing, etc., then is the meaning of “because.”

original: de ni 'di skad brjod pa yin te /🔽gang gi phyir dngos po med pa ni dngos med yin la /
analyzed: de ni 'di skad brjod pa yin te / gang gi phyir dngos po med pa ni dngos med yin la /
translated: This is what is being said:

original: shes pa med pa ni mi dmigs pa yin pa de'i phyir mi dmigs pa de nyid ji ltar na bum pa la sogs pa'i dngos po med pa yin /
analyzed: shes pa med pa ni mi dmigs pa yin pa de'i phyir mi dmigs pa de nyid ji ltar na bum pa la sogs pa'i dngos po med pa yin /
translated: Since a non-thing is a non-thing and the non-existence of consciousness is non-observation, how could that non-observation be a non-thing such as a pot?

original: 'di gnyis spyi dang khyad par gyi dngos po yin pa'i phyir dmigs pa log pas don dngos po med par yang ci ltar 'gyur /
analyzed: 'di gnyis spyi dang khyad par gyi dngos po yin pa'i phyir dmigs pa log pas don dngos po med par yang ci ltar 'gyur /
translated: Since these two are the general and specific things, how could the object become a non-thing by the cessation of observation?

original: yang smos pa ni gnyis pa gzhan sdud pa'o //
analyzed: yang smos pa ni gnyis pa gzhan sdud pa'o //
translated: The repetition is for the purpose of including a second.

original: don las gzhan du gyur ba'i shes pa ni de'i 'bras bu yin la /
analyzed: don las gzhan du gyur ba'i shes pa ni de'i 'bras bu yin la /
translated: Consciousness that is different from the object is its effect.

original: 'bras bu ldog pas ni rgyu gdon mi za bar ldog pa yang ma yin no zhes gang smras pa ni 'bras bu log kyang zhes bya ba la sogs pa yin no //
analyzed: 'bras bu ldog pas ni rgyu gdon mi za bar ldog pa yang ma yin no zhes gang smras pa ni 'bras bu log kyang zhes bya ba la sogs pa yin no //
translated: But it is not that the cessation of the effect necessarily entails the cessation of the cause.🔽The response to that is “Even if the effect ceases . . . ”

original: yul de la tha ma'i gnas skabs su gyur pa'i 'bras bu med pa rgyu med pa yang ma yin te /
analyzed: yul de la tha ma'i gnas skabs su gyur pa'i 'bras bu med pa rgyu med pa yang ma yin te /
translated: The object is not without a cause, even though the effect is in its final state.

original: gnas skabs tha ma ma thob pa'i shes par nges pa med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gnas skabs tha ma ma thob pa'i shes par nges pa med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: This is because there is no certainty that the cognition has reached its final state.

original: re zhig mi dmigs pa yang don med pa nyid du ji ltar brjod par bya ba yin pa de ltar bstan pa'i phyir bshad pa /
analyzed: re zhig mi dmigs pa yang don med pa nyid du ji ltar brjod par bya ba yin pa de ltar bstan pa'i phyir bshad pa /
translated: The response to the question, “Why is nonapprehension meaningless?” is as follows.

original: yod par gzhag pa gang la rgyu mtshan dmigs pa yod pa'o //
analyzed: yod par gzhag pa gang la rgyu mtshan dmigs pa yod pa'o //
translated: The existence of something is posited on the basis of the perception of a reason for it.

original: de 'dra ba'i zhes bya ba ni snang du rung ba'i'o //
analyzed: de 'dra ba'i zhes bya ba ni snang du rung ba'i'o //
translated: “ Such” means “suitable to appear.”

original: gang gi phyir snang ba yod par rnam par gzhag pa'i rgyu mtshan ni mthong ba yin te /
analyzed: gang gi phyir snang ba yod par rnam par gzhag pa'i rgyu mtshan ni mthong ba yin te /
translated: The reason for positing the existence of light is that it is seen.

original: rnam pa de lta bu'i dngos po ni mthong ba med na yod par rnam par gzhag mi nus pa de'i phyir dmigs pa'i shes pa la don gyi yod par ston pa yin no //
analyzed: rnam pa de lta bu'i dngos po ni mthong ba med na yod par rnam par gzhag mi nus pa de'i phyir dmigs pa'i shes pa la don gyi yod par ston pa yin no //
translated: If such a thing is not seen, it cannot be posited as existent. Therefore, the existence of the object is indicated to the perceiving consciousness.

original: 'di skad ces snang du rung ba yod par rnam par 'jog pa'i rgyu mtshan mthong ba yin pa'i phyir de nyid nye bar btags nas yod par tha snyad byed pa yin no zhes brjod par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'di skad ces snang du rung ba yod par rnam par 'jog pa'i rgyu mtshan mthong ba yin pa'i phyir de nyid nye bar btags nas yod par tha snyad byed pa yin no zhes brjod par 'gyur ro //
translated: In this way, it is said that the reason for positing the existence of what is suitable to appear is seeing. Therefore, existence is designated in dependence on that alone, and verbal conventions are made.

original: nye bar 'dogs pa'i rgyu gnyis pa bstan pa'i phyir bshad pa /
analyzed: nye bar 'dogs pa'i rgyu gnyis pa bstan pa'i phyir bshad pa /
translated: In order to teach the second reason for designation, it is said:

original: rgyu gzhan tshang na ste /
analyzed: rgyu gzhan tshang na ste /
translated: When the other causes are complete.

original: dmigs pa'i rkyen gzhan tshad na snang ba gang la dmigs par rung ba'i rang bzhin de yod pa de ni shes pa de la mi 'khrul ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: dmigs pa'i rkyen gzhan tshad na snang ba gang la dmigs par rung ba'i rang bzhin de yod pa de ni shes pa de la mi 'khrul ba'i phyir ro //
translated: When the other conditions, such as the objective condition, are complete, the nature that is suitable to appear as the object exists. Because that is non-mistaken with respect to that consciousness.

original: 'di skad brjod pa yin te /
analyzed: 'di skad brjod pa yin te /
translated: This is what is said:

original: mthong ba'i rgyu gzhan tshang na snang ba'i dngos po yod pa tsam rgyu mtshan yin te /
analyzed: mthong ba'i rgyu gzhan tshang na snang ba'i dngos po yod pa tsam rgyu mtshan yin te /
translated: When the other causes of seeing are complete, the mere existence of the appearing thing is the reason.

original: gal te de yod kyang mi skye na ni nam yang skye bar mi 'gyur ro //🔽gtan tshigs des na don gyi yod pa gang yin pa de nyid la dmigs par brjod pa yin no //
analyzed: gal te de yod kyang mi skye na ni nam yang skye bar mi 'gyur ro // gtan tshigs des na don gyi yod pa gang yin pa de nyid la dmigs par brjod pa yin no //
translated: If it does not arise even when it exists, then it will never arise.🔽By this reason, it is said that the object of the cognition is that which exists.

original: de'i phyir de ltar nye bar btags nas shes pa nyid la snang ba'i don yod par brjod pa 'am /
analyzed: de'i phyir de ltar nye bar btags nas shes pa nyid la snang ba'i don yod par brjod pa 'am /
translated: Therefore, in this way, it is said that the object that appears in cognition itself exists, having been imputed.

original: nye bar @203b btags pa kho nas don yod pa la yang shes par brjod pa yin no //
analyzed: nye bar @203b btags pa kho nas don yod pa la yang shes par brjod pa yin no //
translated: Or, it is said that cognition exists, having been imputed to the object.

original: yod pa la dmigs pa yin par brjod pa 'am dmigs pa yang yod par brjod pa 'dis ni 'bras bu nyid yin yang dmigs pa de lta bu ni don gyi khyab byed du bstan pa yin te /
analyzed: yod pa la dmigs pa yin par brjod pa 'am dmigs pa yang yod par brjod pa 'dis ni 'bras bu nyid yin yang dmigs pa de lta bu ni don gyi khyab byed du bstan pa yin te /
translated: By this statement that the object of cognition exists, or that the object exists as the object of cognition, it is shown that such an object is the pervader of the existence of the cognition.

original: nus pa thogs pa med pa can gyi 'bras bu ni rang bzhin nyid do zhes 'chad par 'gyur ba bzhin no //
analyzed: nus pa thogs pa med pa can gyi 'bras bu ni rang bzhin nyid do zhes 'chad par 'gyur ba bzhin no //
translated: As will be explained, the effect is the nature of the object, which is unobstructed and potent.

original: don gyi rang bzhin snang du rung ba yang don yod pa'i khyab par byed pa yin te /
analyzed: don gyi rang bzhin snang du rung ba yang don yod pa'i khyab par byed pa yin te /
translated: The nature of the object, which is suitable to appear, is also the pervader of the existence of the object.

original: des na de lta bur gyur pa'i don gyi yod pa nyid ni dmigs pa'i yul gyi rang bzhin snang du rung ba nyid kyis khyab pa yin no //
analyzed: des na de lta bur gyur pa'i don gyi yod pa nyid ni dmigs pa'i yul gyi rang bzhin snang du rung ba nyid kyis khyab pa yin no //
translated: Therefore, such an existent object is necessarily the nature of an object of perception, which is suitable to appear.

original: rgyu thams cad yod pa na dngos po yod pa yin yang tshogs pa yongs su 'gyur ba la ltos pa'i phyir shes pa mi skye ste /
analyzed: rgyu thams cad yod pa na dngos po yod pa yin yang tshogs pa yongs su 'gyur ba la ltos pa'i phyir shes pa mi skye ste /
translated: Even when all the causes are present, the thing exists, but the consciousness does not arise because it depends on the transformation of the assembly.

original: dper na sa bon la sogs pa'i tshogs pa yod kyang yongs su gyur ba la ltos pa'i phyir myu gu mi skye bas na 'khrul pa srid pa bzhin te /
analyzed: dper na sa bon la sogs pa'i tshogs pa yod kyang yongs su gyur ba la ltos pa'i phyir myu gu mi skye bas na 'khrul pa srid pa bzhin te /
translated: For example, even though the assembly of seed and so on exists, the sprout does not arise because it depends on transformation. Therefore, error is possible.

original: des na de lta bur gyur pa'i dngos po ni ma mthong bas med pa'i tha snyad du bya ba ma yin no zhe na /
analyzed: des na de lta bur gyur pa'i dngos po ni ma mthong bas med pa'i tha snyad du bya ba ma yin no zhe na /
translated: Therefore, since such a thing is not seen, it is not to be conventionally designated as nonexistent.

original: ma yin te zhes smos te /
analyzed: ma yin te zhes smos te /
translated: The response to that is “No!”

original: snang ba'i don de'i 'bras bu'i dus shes pa skyed pa'i dus na med par rtogs pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: snang ba'i don de'i 'bras bu'i dus shes pa skyed pa'i dus na med par rtogs pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because the object of appearance is realized to be nonexistent at the time of the result, the time of the arising of consciousness.

original: 'di skad brjod pa yin te /
analyzed: 'di skad brjod pa yin te /
translated: This is what is being said.

original: gang gis 'khrul par dogs pa yongs su 'gyur ba la ltos pa'i dus su ni dngos po med par rtogs pa ma yin te /
analyzed: gang gis 'khrul par dogs pa yongs su 'gyur ba la ltos pa'i dus su ni dngos po med par rtogs pa ma yin te /
translated: When there is dependence on the transformation of the doubt about error, there is no realization of nonexistence.

original: 'on kyang 'bras bu'i dus su yin no //
analyzed: 'on kyang 'bras bu'i dus su yin no //
translated: But it is at the time of the effect.

original: 'bras bu'i skye ba'i dus de'i tshe ni 'khrul par dogs pa yod pa ma yin no //
analyzed: 'bras bu'i skye ba'i dus de'i tshe ni 'khrul par dogs pa yod pa ma yin no //
translated: At the time of the arising of the effect, there is no doubt about error.

original: des na gang gi dngos po med pa mi dmigs par brjod pa dngos po ci 'dra ba zhig 'bras bu dus su nye bar gnas pa'i yod pa dmigs par brjod pa de ni shes pa la 'khrul pa med pa nyid do //
analyzed: des na gang gi dngos po med pa mi dmigs par brjod pa dngos po ci 'dra ba zhig 'bras bu dus su nye bar gnas pa'i yod pa dmigs par brjod pa de ni shes pa la 'khrul pa med pa nyid do //
translated: Therefore, the nonexistence that is said to be nonapprehension is like an existent that is said to be apprehended at the time of the effect. There is no error in the cognition.

original: ci ltar de'i 'bras bu'i dus yin par des par nus she na /
analyzed: ci ltar de'i 'bras bu'i dus yin par des par nus she na /
translated: How is it possible that it is the time of the effect?

original: gzhan dmigs pa na zhes smos te /
analyzed: gzhan dmigs pa na zhes smos te /
translated: It is said, “When the other is apprehended.”

original: shes pa gcig la 'du ba gzhan dmigs pa'i dus na de mi dmigs par 'grub pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: shes pa gcig la 'du ba gzhan dmigs pa'i dus na de mi dmigs par 'grub pa'i phyir ro //
translated: When the other is apprehended at the time of the cognition, it is established that it is not apprehended.

original: 'di skad brjod pa yin te /
analyzed: 'di skad brjod pa yin te /
translated: This is what is said.

original: shes pa gcig la 'du ba dmigs par gyur pa na cig shos kyi yul can gyi shes pa bskyed par nus pa'i tshogs pa yod par rtogs pa des na de'i 'bras bu'i dus yin par nges pa yin no //
analyzed: shes pa gcig la 'du ba dmigs par gyur pa na cig shos kyi yul can gyi shes pa bskyed par nus pa'i tshogs pa yod par rtogs pa des na de'i 'bras bu'i dus yin par nges pa yin no //
translated: When the cognition of the composite is perceived in a single cognition, then the existence of the assemblage that is capable of producing the cognition of the other object is ascertained, and thus the time of the effect is ascertained.

original: gal te mthu dang ldan pa'i rnal 'byor pas sam /
analyzed: gal te mthu dang ldan pa'i rnal 'byor pas sam /
translated: If a powerful yogi,

original: sha za la sogs pas byin gyis brlabs te /
analyzed: sha za la sogs pas byin gyis brlabs te /
translated: or a piśāca, etc., blesses the object,

original: lhag par mos pa'i phyir shes pa gcig la 'dre ba sa phyogs la sogs pa dmigs pa'i 'bras bu'i dus su yang bum pa yod par mi dmigs par 'gyur ro zhe na /
analyzed: lhag par mos pa'i phyir shes pa gcig la 'dre ba sa phyogs la sogs pa dmigs pa'i 'bras bu'i dus su yang bum pa yod par mi dmigs par 'gyur ro zhe na /
translated: then the object is perceived as something else, and even at the time of the effect, the cognition of the composite, the pot is not perceived.

original: ma yin te zhes smos so //
analyzed: ma yin te zhes smos so //
translated: No, it is said.

original: @204a * // yul dang dbang po dag las gang yang rung ba zhig gzhan du gyur ba nyid med par te 'dus byas pa ma bsgrubs par ni byin gyis brlabs pa nyid lhag par bsgrub pa nyid mi 'thad pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: @204a * // yul dang dbang po dag las gang yang rung ba zhig gzhan du gyur ba nyid med par te 'dus byas pa ma bsgrubs par ni byin gyis brlabs pa nyid lhag par bsgrub pa nyid mi 'thad pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because it is not tenable that the blessing of the object is established without the transformation of either the object or the sense faculty, without the establishment of the composite.

original: 'di skad brjod pa yin te /
analyzed: 'di skad brjod pa yin te /
translated: This is what is being said.

original: dbang po 'am yul byin gyis brlabs bas ni yul nyid byin gyis brlabs pa yin te /
analyzed: dbang po 'am yul byin gyis brlabs bas ni yul nyid byin gyis brlabs pa yin te /
translated: By blessing the sense faculty or the object, the object itself is blessed.

original: dbang po yul can ma yin par byas pas kyang yul byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur ba yin no //
analyzed: dbang po yul can ma yin par byas pas kyang yul byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur ba yin no //
translated: And by making the sense faculty non-existent, the object is also blessed.

original: des na bshad pa /
analyzed: des na bshad pa /
translated: Therefore, it is said:

original: dbang po dang yul de dag gcig gam gnyis 'dus byas na ni mi dmigs par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: dbang po dang yul de dag gcig gam gnyis 'dus byas na ni mi dmigs par 'gyur ro //
translated: If the sense faculty and the object are either one or two combined, they are not perceived.

original: 'di nyid 'khrul pa'i yul yin no snyam na bshad pa /
analyzed: 'di nyid 'khrul pa'i yul yin no snyam na bshad pa /
translated: If you think this is the object of error, it is said:

original: de'i tshe yang 'khrul pa med do zhes bya ba la ltos par bya'o //
analyzed: de'i tshe yang 'khrul pa med do zhes bya ba la ltos par bya'o //
translated: At that time, there is no error.

original: gang gi phyir rnam pa de lta bu'i dbang pos gzung bar bya ba'i bum pa gang yin pa'i med ba ni don yod pa nyid do //
analyzed: gang gi phyir rnam pa de lta bu'i dbang pos gzung bar bya ba'i bum pa gang yin pa'i med ba ni don yod pa nyid do //
translated: Because the non-existence of a pot that is to be apprehended by a sense faculty of that kind is a real object.

original: de ltar na yang gtan tshigs kyi don ni sa phyogs 'di dang shes pa gcig la 'du ba'i bum pa ni 'di na med la /
analyzed: de ltar na yang gtan tshigs kyi don ni sa phyogs 'di dang shes pa gcig la 'du ba'i bum pa ni 'di na med la /
translated: Even so, the meaning of the reason is that a pot that is combined with this place and a single cognition does not exist here.

original: mthus gzhan du bsgyur ba de ni mi dgag go //
analyzed: mthus gzhan du bsgyur ba de ni mi dgag go //
translated: The transformation of another by power is not negated.

original: gang gi tshe dbang po de lta bur gyur pa'i don 'dzin par mi nus par byas pa de'i tshe yang mthong ba'i sa phyogs dang shes pa gcig la 'du ba med pa ni yod pa nyid do //
analyzed: gang gi tshe dbang po de lta bur gyur pa'i don 'dzin par mi nus par byas pa de'i tshe yang mthong ba'i sa phyogs dang shes pa gcig la 'du ba med pa ni yod pa nyid do //
translated: When the object that is the object of such a sense faculty is unable to be apprehended, at that time, the non-existence of the object’s presence in the place that is seen and in the cognition is indeed existent.

original: des na 'khrul pa med pa'i phyir shes pa nyid la don yod pa yin par btags pa de'i phyir shes pa der rung ba nyid kyi don gang yin pa de ni dngos su yod pa yin la /
analyzed: des na 'khrul pa med pa'i phyir shes pa nyid la don yod pa yin par btags pa de'i phyir shes pa der rung ba nyid kyi don gang yin pa de ni dngos su yod pa yin la /
translated: Therefore, because there is no error, the object is imputed to exist in the cognition itself. Thus, the object that is suitable as that cognition is actually existent.

original: nye bar btags nas ni shes pa la yang der brjod pa yin no //
analyzed: nye bar btags nas ni shes pa la yang der brjod pa yin no //
translated: But the cognition is nominally called that.

original: de'i phyir yod pa'i bdag nyid kyi shes pa ldog pa dang / shes pa'i bdag nyid kyi shes bya med pa mi dmigs pa dang don gyi med par yang brjod pa yin no //🔽'di ni ma yin par dgag pa 'jug pas shes pa gcig la 'du ba'i don snang ba 'am /
analyzed: de'i phyir yod pa'i bdag nyid kyi shes pa ldog pa dang / shes pa'i bdag nyid kyi shes bya med pa mi dmigs pa dang don gyi med par yang brjod pa yin no // 'di ni ma yin par dgag pa 'jug pas shes pa gcig la 'du ba'i don snang ba 'am /
translated: Therefore, the cessation of the cognition that has the nature of existence and the non-existence of the object that has the nature of cognition are described as non-apprehension.

original: de'i shes pa la mi dmigs pa dang med par brjod pa yin no //
analyzed: de'i shes pa la mi dmigs pa dang med par brjod pa yin no //
translated: This is not a negation that engages, so the object that appears in the presence of a single cognition or the non-apprehension of its cognition is described as non-existence.

original: ldog pa tsam ni ma yin no //
analyzed: ldog pa tsam ni ma yin no //
translated: but not merely as a negation.

original: shes pa gcig la 'du ba'i don nam de'i shes pa las snang ba'i rang bzhin dang / shes pa med par nges pa yin gyi ldog pa tsam las ni ma yin no zhes mang du bshad zin to //
analyzed: shes pa gcig la 'du ba'i don nam de'i shes pa las snang ba'i rang bzhin dang / shes pa med par nges pa yin gyi ldog pa tsam las ni ma yin no zhes mang du bshad zin to //
translated: We have explained many times that the meaning of “unification” is that the object is the nature that appears in that cognition, and that it is ascertained as not being separate from the cognition, but not merely as a negation.

original: des kyang de lta bur gyur pa med pa'i yul can gyi med pa'i tha snyad sgrub par byed do //
analyzed: des kyang de lta bur gyur pa med pa'i yul can gyi med pa'i tha snyad sgrub par byed do //
translated: That also establishes the expression of nonexistence, which has as its object something that does not exist in that way.

original: shes bya yod pa shes pa la mi 'khrul par bstan pa 'di ni rgyu 'bras bu la 'khrul pa des na 'bras bu med pas rgyu med pa ma yin no zhes gang brjod pa de yang gsal ba yin no //
analyzed: shes bya yod pa shes pa la mi 'khrul par bstan pa 'di ni rgyu 'bras bu la 'khrul pa des na 'bras bu med pas rgyu med pa ma yin no zhes gang brjod pa de yang gsal ba yin no //
translated: This demonstration that the cognition of an existent object is nonerroneous also clarifies the point that the cause is not without effect, since the effect is not erroneous with respect to the cause.

original: gang gis gdon mi za bar bya ba'i 'bras bu de la @204b ni 'khrul pa med do //
analyzed: gang gis gdon mi za bar bya ba'i 'bras bu de la @204b ni 'khrul pa med do //
translated: The effect is not erroneous with respect to the cause, since it is not the case that the effect is not produced when the cause is present.

original: de ltar gyur pa'i don gyis ni shes pa gdon mi za bar bya ba yin no //
analyzed: de ltar gyur pa'i don gyis ni shes pa gdon mi za bar bya ba yin no //
translated: The object that is the cause of the cognition is not erroneous with respect to the cognition.

original: de nyid kyi phyir de la snang ba nyid ni yod pa'i khyad par byed pa yin te /
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir de la snang ba nyid ni yod pa'i khyad par byed pa yin te /
translated: Therefore, the appearance in that cognition is the cause of the existence of the object.

original: des na 'di la 'bras bu med pas rgyu med par nges pa yin no //
analyzed: des na 'di la 'bras bu med pas rgyu med par nges pa yin no //
translated: Therefore, since there is no effect in this case, it is certain that there is no cause.

original: de la yang zhes bya ba ni rgyu med pa la mi 'khrul pa'i 'bras bu med pa la yang 'bras bu med pas rgyu med pa nyid ni bsgrub par bya ba ma yin te /
analyzed: de la yang zhes bya ba ni rgyu med pa la mi 'khrul pa'i 'bras bu med pa la yang 'bras bu med pas rgyu med pa nyid ni bsgrub par bya ba ma yin te /
translated: And in that case, since there is no effect in the absence of a cause, the absence of a cause is not to be established.

original: de ni mngon sum gyi stobs kyis nges pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de ni mngon sum gyi stobs kyis nges pa'i phyir ro //
translated: For it is ascertained by the power of perception.

original: 'on kyang tha snyad bsgrub par bya ba yin la /
analyzed: 'on kyang tha snyad bsgrub par bya ba yin la /
translated: However, the conventional is to be established.

original: de la yang mi dmigs pa'i rgyu mtshan can yin par grub pa nyid do //
analyzed: de la yang mi dmigs pa'i rgyu mtshan can yin par grub pa nyid do //
translated: And in that case, it is established that the reason is non-apprehension.

original: med pa'i tha snyad mi byed pa'i tha snyad du byed ba po gang yin pa de ni 'jig rten 'ga' yang med la /
analyzed: med pa'i tha snyad mi byed pa'i tha snyad du byed ba po gang yin pa de ni 'jig rten 'ga' yang med la /
translated: There is no one in the world at all who makes the conventional without making the conventional of non-existence.

original: med pa'i tha snyad de yang thams cad du mi dmigs pa'i rgyu mtshan can kho na yin no //
analyzed: med pa'i tha snyad de yang thams cad du mi dmigs pa'i rgyu mtshan can kho na yin no //
translated: And that conventional of non-existence has only non-apprehension as its reason in every case.

original: 'on kyang med pa'i tha snyad kyi yul mi 'dra bas gang gi tshe rgyu mtshan la zhes rmongs pa de'i tshe /
analyzed: 'on kyang med pa'i tha snyad kyi yul mi 'dra bas gang gi tshe rgyu mtshan la zhes rmongs pa de'i tshe /
translated: However, when one is confused about the reason, as in the case of the conventional of non-existence,

original: sngar med pa'i tha snyad du zhugs pa'i yul dang chos mthun pa'i sgo nas mi dmigs pa rgyu mtshan du byas te /
analyzed: sngar med pa'i tha snyad du zhugs pa'i yul dang chos mthun pa'i sgo nas mi dmigs pa rgyu mtshan du byas te /
translated: The non-observation of something that did not exist before is the reason for the convention of non-existence.

original: rang nyid rtogs par 'gyur ba 'am gzhan gyis rtogs par byed pa yin no //
analyzed: rang nyid rtogs par 'gyur ba 'am gzhan gyis rtogs par byed pa yin no //
translated: It causes one to understand oneself or it causes another to understand.

original: de nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs pas bsgrub bar bya ba gang yin pa de ni rgyu yod pa'i sgo nas rab tu grub pa'i tha snyad nyid bsgrub par bya ba yin te /
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs pas bsgrub bar bya ba gang yin pa de ni rgyu yod pa'i sgo nas rab tu grub pa'i tha snyad nyid bsgrub par bya ba yin te /
translated: Therefore, whatever is established by non-observation is established by the convention of the existence of a cause.

original: rgyu mtshan can gzhan bzhin no //
analyzed: rgyu mtshan can gzhan bzhin no //
translated: It is like another reason.

original: dper na ba lang chen po dang chung du dag gam ring po dang thung ngu'i shing dag gi khyad par mthong nas brda'i dus su mthong ba ba lang dang shing nyid kyi snyad kyi rgyu mtshan nges pa la rmongs pa rang nyid mthong ba dang chos mthun pa'i
analyzed: dper na ba lang chen po dang chung du dag gam ring po dang thung ngu'i shing dag gi khyad par mthong nas brda'i dus su mthong ba ba lang dang shing nyid kyi snyad kyi rgyu mtshan nges pa la rmongs pa rang nyid mthong ba dang chos mthun pa'i
translated: For example, having seen the difference between a large and a small cow or between a tall and a short tree, at the time of the convention, one is confused about the reason for the convention of cow and tree.

original: sgo nas rtogs par 'gyur ba'am gzhan gyis rtogs par byed pa de bzhin du 'di la yang yin no //
analyzed: sgo nas rtogs par 'gyur ba'am gzhan gyis rtogs par byed pa de bzhin du 'di la yang yin no //
translated: One understands oneself or one causes another to understand by the method of similarity to what one has seen. It is the same here.

original: gal te mi dmigs pa nyid ma grub par ni med pa'i tha snyad sgrub par byed pa ma yin pa des na re zhig de sgrub par byed pa'i tshad ma brjod dgos so zhe na /
analyzed: gal te mi dmigs pa nyid ma grub par ni med pa'i tha snyad sgrub par byed pa ma yin pa des na re zhig de sgrub par byed pa'i tshad ma brjod dgos so zhe na /
translated: If non-apprehension itself is not established, it does not establish the term non-existent. Therefore, first of all, you must state the valid cognition that establishes it.

original: bshad pa / 'di ni 'og tu de'i phyir mi dmigs pa 'di ni mngon sum nyid kyis grub pa yin zhes 'chad par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: bshad pa / 'di ni 'og tu de'i phyir mi dmigs pa 'di ni mngon sum nyid kyis grub pa yin zhes 'chad par 'gyur ro //
translated: In response, Aryadeva says: This will be explained later: “This non-apprehension is established by perception itself.”

original: bshad ma thag pa'i mtshan nyid kyi mi dmigs pa de la yang ngo //
analyzed: bshad ma thag pa'i mtshan nyid kyi mi dmigs pa de la yang ngo //
translated: This refers to non-apprehension that has the characteristics just explained.

original: 'jug pa ni sgra'i byed pa ste /
analyzed: 'jug pa ni sgra'i byed pa ste /
translated: “Engagement” is the function of a word.

original: de'i bye rab gis rnam pa bzhi gang la yod pa'o //
analyzed: de'i bye rab gis rnam pa bzhi gang la yod pa'o //
translated: The four types are distinguished by that function.

original: sbyor ba'i bye brag gis zhes gang 'chad par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: sbyor ba'i bye brag gis zhes gang 'chad par 'gyur ro //
translated: “By the distinction of application” will be explained.

original: yang na 'jug pa ni mi dmigs pa nyid byed pa yin pas de'i bye brag yin te /
analyzed: yang na 'jug pa ni mi dmigs pa nyid byed pa yin pas de'i bye brag yin te /
translated: Alternatively, “engagement” is the function of non-apprehension itself. Therefore, it is distinguished by that.

original: sbyor ba'i bye brag kyang de nyid la brjod pa yin no //
analyzed: sbyor ba'i bye brag kyang de nyid la brjod pa yin no //
translated: The distinction of application is also described in terms of that.

original: mi dmigs ba de yang @205a * //
analyzed: mi dmigs ba de yang @205a * //
translated: This non-apprehension

original: la lar ni don gzhan sgrub pa'i sgo nas dngos po med pa bsgrub par sbyor ba yin /
analyzed: la lar ni don gzhan sgrub pa'i sgo nas dngos po med pa bsgrub par sbyor ba yin /
translated: In some cases, the non-existence of something is established by way of establishing something else.

original: la lar ni gzhan 'gog pa'i sgo nas yin /
analyzed: la lar ni gzhan 'gog pa'i sgo nas yin /
translated: In some cases, it is by way of refuting something else.

original: sbyar bar bya zhing rab tu 'jug par bya ba de'i byed pa tha dad pa ni 'jug pa'i bye brag go //
analyzed: sbyar bar bya zhing rab tu 'jug par bya ba de'i byed pa tha dad pa ni 'jug pa'i bye brag go //
translated: The different ways of applying and engaging in this are the different types of engagement.

original: gang du 'gal ba sgrub pas gzhan 'gog pa der 'gal ba'i don sgrubs pa nyid zlog par byed pa yin gyi /
analyzed: gang du 'gal ba sgrub pas gzhan 'gog pa der 'gal ba'i don sgrubs pa nyid zlog par byed pa yin gyi /
translated: Where something else is refuted by establishing a contradiction, the meaning of the contradiction is established, and that itself is reversed.

original: mi dmigs pa ni ma yin na de ci ltar sbyor ba'i bye brag gis mi dmigs pa rnam pa bzhir brjod ce na /
analyzed: mi dmigs pa ni ma yin na de ci ltar sbyor ba'i bye brag gis mi dmigs pa rnam pa bzhir brjod ce na /
translated: Since it is not non-observation, how can it be said that there are four types of non-observation by way of the different types of application?

original: dgag pa gang ji snyed pa zhes smos so //
analyzed: dgag pa gang ji snyed pa zhes smos so //
translated: The phrase “whatever negations there are” is stated.

original: 'di ni khyab pa brjod pa yin te /
analyzed: 'di ni khyab pa brjod pa yin te /
translated: This is the pervasion.

original: des na mi dmigs pa med par bya bar nus pa med pa'i tha snyad de ni 'ga' yang med do //
analyzed: des na mi dmigs pa med par bya bar nus pa med pa'i tha snyad de ni 'ga' yang med do //
translated: Therefore, there is no convention of the absence of capacity without non-observation.

original: dgag pa gang ji snyed pa de thams cad mi dmigs pa las ji ltar yin pa de ltar ni le'u dang bor bshad zin to //
analyzed: dgag pa gang ji snyed pa de thams cad mi dmigs pa las ji ltar yin pa de ltar ni le'u dang bor bshad zin to //
translated: Whatever negations there are, all of them are like this. How this is so has already been explained in the first chapter.

original: khyad pa de nyid ston pa ni 'di ltar zhes bya ba yin no //
analyzed: khyad pa de nyid ston pa ni 'di ltar zhes bya ba yin no //
translated: The phrase “in this way” indicates that very distinction.

original: dgag pa de ni rnam pa gnyis kyis byed cing tha snyad 'dogs te /
analyzed: dgag pa de ni rnam pa gnyis kyis byed cing tha snyad 'dogs te /
translated: That negation is done and designated in two ways:

original: don gzhan sgrub pa dang dgag pas so //
analyzed: don gzhan sgrub pa dang dgag pas so //
translated: by establishing another object and by negating.

original: de la gang gi tshe 'ga' zhig bsgrub pas dgag pa byed pa'i don gzhan bsgrubs pa de mi 'ga' ba yin na ni /
analyzed: de la gang gi tshe 'ga' zhig bsgrub pas dgag pa byed pa'i don gzhan bsgrubs pa de mi 'ga' ba yin na ni /
translated: In that regard, when one does a negation by establishing something else,

original: de'i tshe yul gcig na gnas pa la 'gal ba med pa'i phyir te /
analyzed: de'i tshe yul gcig na gnas pa la 'gal ba med pa'i phyir te /
translated: then at that time, there is no contradiction in the object being established and the object of negation being negated, because there is no contradiction in the two being in the same place.

original: gang zhig brjod pa'i don de yang yod la dgag par bya de yang yod pas 'ga' ba med pa'i phyir dgag par bya ba 'ga' yang med par nges pa ma yin te /
analyzed: gang zhig brjod pa'i don de yang yod la dgag par bya de yang yod pas 'ga' ba med pa'i phyir dgag par bya ba 'ga' yang med par nges pa ma yin te /
translated: If the object expressed exists and the object of negation also exists, then because there is something, it is not certain that there is nothing to be negated.

original: gal te rgyu ma zad par ni 'bras par 'gyur ba yin no //
analyzed: gal te rgyu ma zad par ni 'bras par 'gyur ba yin no //
translated: If the cause is not exhausted, the effect will arise.

original: de bzhin du gzhan du yang rgyu med pa zhan 'gog par 'gyur na /
analyzed: de bzhin du gzhan du yang rgyu med pa zhan 'gog par 'gyur na /
translated: In the same way, if the negation of something else is done without a cause,

original: de lta mod kyi 'gal ba de yang mi dmigs pa med pa'i phyir 'gal bar mi nges kyi /
analyzed: de lta mod kyi 'gal ba de yang mi dmigs pa med pa'i phyir 'gal bar mi nges kyi /
translated: then in that case, the negation is not certain because the contradiction is not ascertained.

original: 'on kyang mi dmigs pa sngon du 'gro ba can nyid do //
analyzed: 'on kyang mi dmigs pa sngon du 'gro ba can nyid do //
translated: However, it is preceded by non-observation.

original: de bstan pa'i phyir 'di ltar zhes smos so //
analyzed: de bstan pa'i phyir 'di ltar zhes smos so //
translated: In order to demonstrate that, he says, “in this way.”

original: gang la rgyu ma gtugs shing ma zad pa yod ba'o //
analyzed: gang la rgyu ma gtugs shing ma zad pa yod ba'o //
translated: It is that in which the cause is not exhausted and not destroyed.

original: 'dis ni 'di skad ston pa yin te /
analyzed: 'dis ni 'di skad ston pa yin te /
translated: This is what he demonstrates.

original: gal te rgyu ma zad par ni 'bras bu mi ldog la /
analyzed: gal te rgyu ma zad par ni 'bras bu mi ldog la /
translated: If the cause is not exhausted, the effect does not cease.

original: rgyu zad na yang de nyid kyis 'bras bu ldog pa'i phyir gang zhig gzhan dang lhan cig 'gal bar nges par 'gyur ba zlog par byed pa zhes bya ba 'ga' yang yod pa ma yin mod kyi /
analyzed: rgyu zad na yang de nyid kyis 'bras bu ldog pa'i phyir gang zhig gzhan dang lhan cig 'gal bar nges par 'gyur ba zlog par byed pa zhes bya ba 'ga' yang yod pa ma yin mod kyi /
translated: And if the cause is exhausted, the effect ceases by itself. Therefore, there is nothing at all that is called “the cessation of that which is definitely incompatible with another.”

original: 'on kyang gang gi tshe rgyu gegs med pa can nye bar gyur la /
analyzed: 'on kyang gang gi tshe rgyu gegs med pa can nye bar gyur la /
translated: However, when the cause is unobstructed and present,

original: de dag gi gegs gzhan yang ma mthong ba der dngos po gang zhig nye bar gyur na gang gi rgyu mthar thug par 'gyur ba'i dngos po gzhan de ni rgyu zad par byed pa'i sgo nas dngos po de'i zlog par byed pa yin gyi /
analyzed: de dag gi gegs gzhan yang ma mthong ba der dngos po gang zhig nye bar gyur na gang gi rgyu mthar thug par 'gyur ba'i dngos po gzhan de ni rgyu zad par byed pa'i sgo nas dngos po de'i zlog par byed pa yin gyi /
translated: and if another obstruction of it is not seen, then that thing which is present is the cessation of that thing, by way of the exhaustion of its cause.

original: rgyu bzlog pa med par ni 'ga' zhig kyang 'ga'i yang zlog par byed pa zhes bya bar mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: rgyu bzlog pa med par ni 'ga' zhig kyang 'ga'i yang zlog par byed pa zhes bya bar mi 'gyur ro //
translated: But it is not possible for something to be the counteragent of something else without itself being stopped.

original: des na gang zhig gang gis zlog par byed pa yin pa de ni de ltar myur na skad cig ma gsum pa la de zlog par byed @205b do ;
analyzed: des na gang zhig gang gis zlog par byed pa yin pa de ni de ltar myur na skad cig ma gsum pa la de zlog par byed @205b do ;
translated: Therefore, if something is the counteragent of something else, it is stopped in the third moment, if it is quick.

original: / skad cig dang po la ni re zhig rgyu tshogs pa ma tshang ba med pa yin no //
analyzed: / skad cig dang po la ni re zhig rgyu tshogs pa ma tshang ba med pa yin no //
translated: In the first moment, the collection of causes is not incomplete.

original: skad cig gnyis pa la ni sngar gyi tshogs pa dang lhan cig byed pa snang ba de la mun pa gzhan skyed par nus pa dang bral ba'i tshogs bskyed par byed de /
analyzed: skad cig gnyis pa la ni sngar gyi tshogs pa dang lhan cig byed pa snang ba de la mun pa gzhan skyed par nus pa dang bral ba'i tshogs bskyed par byed de /
translated: In the second moment, the collection of causes that produces the light together with the previous collection of causes produces the collection of causes that is devoid of the capacity to produce another darkness.

original: des na skad cig ma gsum pa la mun ba la ldog pa yin no //
analyzed: des na skad cig ma gsum pa la mun ba la ldog pa yin no //
translated: Therefore, in the third moment, the darkness is stopped.

original: snang ba dang mun pa'i skad cig ma gnyis lhan cig gnas par thal lo zhe na /
analyzed: snang ba dang mun pa'i skad cig ma gnyis lhan cig gnas par thal lo zhe na /
translated: It follows, absurdly, that the two moments of light and darkness would coexist.

original: rdul phra rab thams cad rang gi yul du gzhan skye ba'i gags byed pa'i phyir lhan cig gnas pa ma yin no //
analyzed: rdul phra rab thams cad rang gi yul du gzhan skye ba'i gags byed pa'i phyir lhan cig gnas pa ma yin no //
translated: This is not the case because all the subtle particles of light block the arising of other particles in their own place. They do not coexist.

original: 'on te nye ba na gnas par 'dod na de ni kho bo cag kyang 'dod pa nyid do //
analyzed: 'on te nye ba na gnas par 'dod na de ni kho bo cag kyang 'dod pa nyid do //
translated: But if you maintain that the light is close to the place where it is, we agree.

original: 'di ltar mun khang gi phyogs su zhugs ba sgo na gnas ba'i mar me'i 'od ni phyogs gcig na gnas pa'i mun pa dang shin tu nye bar gnas pa'i phyir 'dod pa nyid do //
analyzed: 'di ltar mun khang gi phyogs su zhugs ba sgo na gnas ba'i mar me'i 'od ni phyogs gcig na gnas pa'i mun pa dang shin tu nye bar gnas pa'i phyir 'dod pa nyid do //
translated: In the same way, the light of a lamp at the door of a dark house is close to the darkness in one place, and so is perceived.

original: gal te snang ba dang mun pa'i rdul phra rab dag 'dren mar skad cig gnyis gnas par thal lo zhe na /
analyzed: gal te snang ba dang mun pa'i rdul phra rab dag 'dren mar skad cig gnyis gnas par thal lo zhe na /
translated: If you say that it follows, absurdly, that the atoms of light and darkness would abide for two moments,

original: ma yin te /
analyzed: ma yin te /
translated: we do not accept that.

original: rim pa dang ldan pa'i sgron ma'i 'od kyis rim gyis mun pa bzlog pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rim pa dang ldan pa'i sgron ma'i 'od kyis rim gyis mun pa bzlog pa'i phyir ro //
translated: This is because the light of a lamp with a regular flame gradually dispels the darkness.

original: rdul phra rab 'pho ba'i dus ni skad cig gi tshad du brjod de /
analyzed: rdul phra rab 'pho ba'i dus ni skad cig gi tshad du brjod de /
translated: The time it takes for an atom to move is said to be the measure of an instant.

original: des na rim gyis nye bar 'gro ba'i sgron ma'i 'od ni cig car mun khang khyab pa ma yin no //
analyzed: des na rim gyis nye bar 'gro ba'i sgron ma'i 'od ni cig car mun khang khyab pa ma yin no //
translated: Thus the light of a lamp that gradually approaches does not instantly pervade the dark house.

original: de'i phyir snang ba'i cha gang gis mun pa'i cha shas bzlog pa'i snang ba'i cha de ni nye bar 'gro ba nyid kyis mun pa skyed pa'i tshogs pa'i gegs yin no //
analyzed: de'i phyir snang ba'i cha gang gis mun pa'i cha shas bzlog pa'i snang ba'i cha de ni nye bar 'gro ba nyid kyis mun pa skyed pa'i tshogs pa'i gegs yin no //
translated: Therefore, the part of light that removes the part of darkness is the obstruction of the collection that produces darkness by its mere presence.

original: des na mi 'jug ba'i mun pa'i yul du ni des tshogs pa nus pa med par mi bskyed do //
analyzed: des na mi 'jug ba'i mun pa'i yul du ni des tshogs pa nus pa med par mi bskyed do //
translated: Therefore, in the place of darkness that is not penetrated, it does not produce the collection without capacity.

original: de ci'i phyir skad cig gsum pa la mun pa ma skyes pa dang yul der snang ba skyes pa yin no //
analyzed: de ci'i phyir skad cig gsum pa la mun pa ma skyes pa dang yul der snang ba skyes pa yin no //
translated: Therefore, in the third moment, darkness is not produced and light is produced in that place.

original: de ltar rim gyis snang ba'i cha thag ring por gnas pa dag gis tshogs pa de la gnod par byas pas skad cig gsum pa la mun pa log pa la yul der gnod par 'gyur ba yin no //
analyzed: de ltar rim gyis snang ba'i cha thag ring por gnas pa dag gis tshogs pa de la gnod par byas pas skad cig gsum pa la mun pa log pa la yul der gnod par 'gyur ba yin no //
translated: In that way, by the parts of light that are situated far away, that collection is harmed, and in the third moment, darkness is removed and light is produced in that place.

original: de bzhin du gzhan du yang rgyu med par byed pa'i rgyu mtshan nyid 'gal ba yin par blta bar bya'o //
analyzed: de bzhin du gzhan du yang rgyu med par byed pa'i rgyu mtshan nyid 'gal ba yin par blta bar bya'o //
translated: In that way, one should see that the reason for the absence of a cause is the contradiction in another case as well.

original: de nyid kyis na 'gal ba skad cig ma'i yul can ni ma yin gyi /
analyzed: de nyid kyis na 'gal ba skad cig ma'i yul can ni ma yin gyi /
translated: Therefore, the contradiction is not in the object of the moment,

original: 'on kyang rgyun gyi yul can yin te /
analyzed: 'on kyang rgyun gyi yul can yin te /
translated: but rather, it is in the object of the continuum.

original: rgyu dang 'bras bu sngon du 'gro ba can yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rgyu dang 'bras bu sngon du 'gro ba can yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because it is preceded by cause and effect.

original: de nyid bstan pa'i phyir 'byung la zhes smos te /
analyzed: de nyid bstan pa'i phyir 'byung la zhes smos te /
translated: In order to demonstrate just this, he says, “in regard to arising,”

original: rgyun gyis 'jug pa 'gal bar rtogs pa yin no //🔽rgyun yang rgyun can dag las tha dad pa gcig pa nyid ni dgag pa yin gyi /
analyzed: rgyun gyis 'jug pa 'gal bar rtogs pa yin no // rgyun yang rgyun can dag las tha dad pa gcig pa nyid ni dgag pa yin gyi /
translated: because it is understood that the engagement of a continuum is contradictory.

original: skad cig du ma'i bdag nyid du 'gyur ba'i rgyun ni dgag par nus pa ma yin no //
analyzed: skad cig du ma'i bdag nyid du 'gyur ba'i rgyun ni dgag par nus pa ma yin no //
translated: Moreover, the negation of a single entity that is separate from the members of the continuum is not the negation of a continuum that is the nature of many moments.

original: du ma gang ji snyed pa @206a * //
analyzed: du ma gang ji snyed pa @206a * //
translated: How many are the many?

original: mtha' dag med pa ni ma yin te /
analyzed: mtha' dag med pa ni ma yin te /
translated: Not all of them are nonexistent.

original: des na rgyun gyi yul can gyi 'gal ba gang yin pa de ni yul can gyi don gyi yul can yin gyi /
analyzed: des na rgyun gyi yul can gyi 'gal ba gang yin pa de ni yul can gyi don gyi yul can yin gyi /
translated: Therefore, that which is contradictory in regard to the object of a continuum is the object of a cognition that has an object,

original: dngos po med pa'i yul can ni ma yin te /
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i yul can ni ma yin te /
translated: but not the object of a cognition that has a nonexistent object,

original: rgyu can rnams dngos po yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rgyu can rnams dngos po yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because those that have a cause are entities.

original: snga ma dang phyi ma'i skad cig ma rgyu dang 'bras bu'i dngos por gyur pa gang yin pa de dag nyid ni 'gal ba ma yin gyi /
analyzed: snga ma dang phyi ma'i skad cig ma rgyu dang 'bras bu'i dngos por gyur pa gang yin pa de dag nyid ni 'gal ba ma yin gyi /
translated: Those that are the prior and subsequent moments that are in the relation of cause and effect are not contradictory.

original: 'on kyang rgyu dang 'bras bu sngon du 'gro ba can skad cig phyi ma'i skad cig gzhan dang mtshams sbyor mi nus pa zhes bya ba snang bas byas pa gang yin pa de nyid 'gal ba yin te /
analyzed: 'on kyang rgyu dang 'bras bu sngon du 'gro ba can skad cig phyi ma'i skad cig gzhan dang mtshams sbyor mi nus pa zhes bya ba snang bas byas pa gang yin pa de nyid 'gal ba yin te /
translated: However, the appearance of the statement “that which is preceded by a cause and effect is unable to connect to another moment in the subsequent moment” is contradictory.

original: de nyid kyis mun pa de rgyun chad pa yin no //
analyzed: de nyid kyis mun pa de rgyun chad pa yin no //
translated: That itself is the interruption of darkness.

original: des na 'gal ba ni dngos po'i yul can kho na'o //
analyzed: des na 'gal ba ni dngos po'i yul can kho na'o //
translated: Therefore contradiction is only in relation to an existent object.

original: rgyu dang 'bras bu yang skad cig gcig la ni nges par nus pa ma yin te 'on kyang rgyu nyid la yin na /
analyzed: rgyu dang 'bras bu yang skad cig gcig la ni nges par nus pa ma yin te 'on kyang rgyu nyid la yin na /
translated: Also, cause and effect are not necessarily able to exist in a single moment, but rather they exist in a cause.

original: ci de tsam gyis de yang dngos po med pa'i yul can nyid yin nam /
analyzed: ci de tsam gyis de yang dngos po med pa'i yul can nyid yin nam /
translated: If that is so, is it also the case that it is an object of nonexistence?

original: de bzhin du skad cig phyi ma la nus pa med pa zhes bya ba snang bas byas pa gang yin pa de nyid 'gal ba yin la /
analyzed: de bzhin du skad cig phyi ma la nus pa med pa zhes bya ba snang bas byas pa gang yin pa de nyid 'gal ba yin la /
translated: Similarly, the appearance of the statement “that which is unable to exist in the subsequent moment is contradictory” is contradictory.

original: de yang rgyun la shes kyi skad cig gcig la ma yin pa de tsam gyis ci dngos po med pa'i yul can du 'gyur ram /
analyzed: de yang rgyun la shes kyi skad cig gcig la ma yin pa de tsam gyis ci dngos po med pa'i yul can du 'gyur ram /
translated: If that is so, is it also the case that it is an object of nonexistence?

original: des na de ltar rgyu'i gags byed pa'i sgo nas 'gal bar nges pa /
analyzed: des na de ltar rgyu'i gags byed pa'i sgo nas 'gal bar nges pa /
translated: Therefore, the ascertainment of contradiction by way of the obstruction of the cause

original: de yang dngos po med pa'i yul can ni ma yin no //
analyzed: de yang dngos po med pa'i yul can ni ma yin no //
translated: is not a subject that has a non-existent object.

original: 'gal ba'i rgyu mtshan don gzhan med pa de yang mi dmigs pa las yin te ;
analyzed: 'gal ba'i rgyu mtshan don gzhan med pa de yang mi dmigs pa las yin te ;
translated: The reason for contradiction is the non-existence of another object, and that is from non-apprehension.

original: mi dmigs pa tha snyad du byed do //
analyzed: mi dmigs pa tha snyad du byed do //
translated: Non-apprehension is conventionally designated.

original: 'gal ba gnyis pa yang phan tshun spangs pa ni ldog pa'o //
analyzed: 'gal ba gnyis pa yang phan tshun spangs pa ni ldog pa'o //
translated: The second contradiction is the negation of mutual exclusion.

original: ldog pa des gnas pa'i mtshan nyid de ngo bo nyid gang yin pa de dag ni phan tshun spangs te gnas pa'i mtshan nyid kho na las 'gal ba yin no //
analyzed: ldog pa des gnas pa'i mtshan nyid de ngo bo nyid gang yin pa de dag ni phan tshun spangs te gnas pa'i mtshan nyid kho na las 'gal ba yin no //
