analyzed: no ; /'di snyam du de dag ni rjes su dpag par rtogs so snyam na gang gis zhes smos so //
translated: If you think that they are understood through inference, then the root text states, “By what?”

original: de dag gi 'bras bu gdon mi za bar dmigs pa yang ma yin no //
analyzed: de dag gi 'bras bu gdon mi za bar dmigs pa yang ma yin no //
translated: Nor is it certain that the effect is perceived when they exist.

original: 'di skad brjod pa yin te /
analyzed: 'di skad brjod pa yin te /
translated: This is what is being said:

original: rang gi rgyun las tha dad pa'i 'bras bu'i rgyu ni gor ma chag par bskyed par bya ba ma yin te /
analyzed: rang gi rgyun las tha dad pa'i 'bras bu'i rgyu ni gor ma chag par bskyed par bya ba ma yin te /
translated: It is not certain that a cause of an effect that is different from its own continuum generates it,

original: dper na mes du ba'i rgyun bzhin no //
analyzed: dper na mes du ba'i rgyun bzhin no //
translated: like fire, for example, is not the cause of the continuum of smoke.

original: brtsams pa'i 'bras bu gdon mi za bar dmigs pa yang ma yin la /
analyzed: brtsams pa'i 'bras bu gdon mi za bar dmigs pa yang ma yin la /
translated: Nor is it certain that the effect of an action is perceived,

original: dmigs kyang de'i 'bras bu nyid du gdon mi za bar ngo shes pa yang ma yin te /
analyzed: dmigs kyang de'i 'bras bu nyid du gdon mi za bar ngo shes pa yang ma yin te /
translated: nor is it certain that when it is perceived, it is recognized as its effect.

original: rgyu dang 'bras bu'i dngos po ni mngon sum dang / mi dmigs par bsgrub par bya ba yin na /
analyzed: rgyu dang 'bras bu'i dngos po ni mngon sum dang / mi dmigs par bsgrub par bya ba yin na /
translated: The relation of cause and effect is established by perception and non-perception,

original: de ni bskal ba dag la mi srid do //
analyzed: de ni bskal ba dag la mi srid do //
translated: but that is not possible in the case of eons.

original: lkog tu gyur pa'i dngos po la yang snang ba'i don gyis dngos po gzhan du mi 'thad pas yod par rjes su dpog pa yin te /
analyzed: lkog tu gyur pa'i dngos po la yang snang ba'i don gyis dngos po gzhan du mi 'thad pas yod par rjes su dpog pa yin te /
translated: And in the case of imperceptible things, it is not tenable that another thing is the object of perception, so existence is inferred from the appearance.

original: dper na mig bzhin no //
analyzed: dper na mig bzhin no //
translated: For example, like the eye.

original: de'i don du gdon mi za bar zhes smos te /
analyzed: de'i don du gdon mi za bar zhes smos te /
translated: In order to show that, he says, “without a doubt. ”

original: de lta ma yin na 'bras bu mi dmigs pa kho na'o zhes brjod par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de lta ma yin na 'bras bu mi dmigs pa kho na'o zhes brjod par 'gyur ro //
translated: Otherwise, it would be said that the effect is not perceived at all.

original: des na rjes su dpag par mi nus so //
analyzed: des na rjes su dpag par mi nus so //
translated: Therefore, it cannot be inferred.

original: de dag ni mngon sum dang rjes su dpag pa dang lung log tu zin kyang med do zhes nges par nus pa ma yin no //🔽gang yang shes bar byed pa go bar byed pa med pa'i phyir dbang po las 'das ba dbang po'i spyod yul ma yin ba'i don nam /
analyzed: de dag ni mngon sum dang rjes su dpag pa dang lung log tu zin kyang med do zhes nges par nus pa ma yin no // gang yang shes bar byed pa go bar byed pa med pa'i phyir dbang po las 'das ba dbang po'i spyod yul ma yin ba'i don nam /
translated: Even if direct perception, inference, and scriptural authority are mistaken, it is not possible to ascertain that they do not exist.

original: snang ba'i don gyi rang bzhin gyi khyad par spong bar byed pa ston par byed pa de phyin ci log pa yin no zhes bya ba'i de'i sgra 'di dang 'brel te /
analyzed: snang ba'i don gyi rang bzhin gyi khyad par spong bar byed pa ston par byed pa de phyin ci log pa yin no zhes bya ba'i de'i sgra 'di dang 'brel te /
translated: Also, the word that is connected with the statement: That which is beyond the senses, the object that is not within the range of the senses, or the object that is obscured, the one who rejects or teaches the distinction in the nature of that is mistaken.

original: gang yang zhes pa gang gi sgra yod pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gang yang zhes pa gang gi sgra yod pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because of the word that, which is present in also.

original: dbang po las 'das pa gang yin zhing /
analyzed: dbang po las 'das pa gang yin zhing /
translated: What is beyond the senses?

original: rang bzhin gyi khyad par yang gang zhig yin zhe na /
analyzed: rang bzhin gyi khyad par yang gang zhig yin zhe na /
translated: And what is the distinction in nature?

original: dper na zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos so //
analyzed: dper na zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos so //
translated: For example, and so on is stated.

original: sems 'dod chags dang bral ba dang lha'i khyad par ni dbang po las 'das par 'gyur ba yin la /
analyzed: sems 'dod chags dang bral ba dang lha'i khyad par ni dbang po las 'das par 'gyur ba yin la /
translated: The mind free from attachment and the special deity are beyond the sense faculties.

original: rdzas gtong ba'i sbyin pa dang 'tshe ba la sogs pa spong ba de dag don du gnyer ba'i sems pa de dag ni mngon par mtho ba'i rgyu ma yin no zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: rdzas gtong ba'i sbyin pa dang 'tshe ba la sogs pa spong ba de dag don du gnyer ba'i sems pa de dag ni mngon par mtho ba'i rgyu ma yin no zhes bya ba la /
translated: The intention to seek the generosity of giving material things and the intention to seek the abandonment of harm and so on are not causes of higher rebirth.

original: 'di la sbyin pa la sogs pa'i sems pa mngon sum pa dag la yang mtho ris la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid kyi mngon par mtho ba'i rgyu nyid kyi rang bzhin de spong ba ni rang bzhin gyi khyad par spong ba yin gyi /
analyzed: 'di la sbyin pa la sogs pa'i sems pa mngon sum pa dag la yang mtho ris la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid kyi mngon par mtho ba'i rgyu nyid kyi rang bzhin de spong ba ni rang bzhin gyi khyad par spong ba yin gyi /
translated: Here, the nature of the manifest intention to give and so on is the cause of higher rebirth characterized by rebirth in the higher realms and so on. Abandoning that is abandoning a specific nature.

original: sbyin pa'i sems pa'i mtshan nyid kyi don thams cad du spong ba ni ma yin no //
analyzed: sbyin pa'i sems pa'i mtshan nyid kyi don thams cad du spong ba ni ma yin no //
translated: But it is not abandoning the nature of the intention to give in all its aspects.🔽It is not a cause.

original: rgyu ma yin no zhes bya ba lta bu'o zhes bya ba la zhes bya ba ni 'dis 'di ltar gyi don te /
analyzed: rgyu ma yin no zhes bya ba lta bu'o zhes bya ba la zhes bya ba ni 'dis 'di ltar gyi don te /
translated: This is the meaning of “like that.”

original: gang yang 'di ltar dbang po las 'das pa'i don nam rang bzhin gyi khyad par spong ba de @217b ni phyin ci log yin te /
analyzed: gang yang 'di ltar dbang po las 'das pa'i don nam rang bzhin gyi khyad par spong ba de @217b ni phyin ci log yin te /
translated: Moreover, the denial of a transcendent object or a specific intrinsic nature is a mistake.

original: spong ba'i don de las spong ba de phyin ci log yin no //
analyzed: spong ba'i don de las spong ba de phyin ci log yin no //
translated: The denial of the object of denial is a mistake.

original: de la shes par byed pa med pa khyad par med par phyin ci log gi rgyu brjod nas /
analyzed: de la shes par byed pa med pa khyad par med par phyin ci log gi rgyu brjod nas /
translated: Having stated the cause of mistake without distinction in the absence of a knower,

original: rang bzhin gyi khyad par la phyin ci log gi rgyu byed brag tu mngon sum gyis zhes bya ba la sogs pa 'chad do //
analyzed: rang bzhin gyi khyad par la phyin ci log gi rgyu byed brag tu mngon sum gyis zhes bya ba la sogs pa 'chad do //
translated: he explains the cause of mistake in regard to a specific intrinsic nature, “by direct perception, etc.”

original: 'bras bu de zhes bya ba ni mngon par mtho ba'o ;
analyzed: 'bras bu de zhes bya ba ni mngon par mtho ba'o ;
translated: “That result” is high status.

original: /'bras bu de dang ldan pa ma yin pa ni de med pa ste /
analyzed: /'bras bu de dang ldan pa ma yin pa ni de med pa ste /
translated: “Not having that result” is not having that, i.e., not having another result.

original: 'bras bu gzhan dang ldan pa gang yin pa'o //
analyzed: 'bras bu gzhan dang ldan pa gang yin pa'o //
translated: “Having a result” is having a result.

original: 'bras bu dang ldan pa ma yin pa de dang chos mtshungs pas na ste 'dra ba na'o //
analyzed: 'bras bu dang ldan pa ma yin pa de dang chos mtshungs pas na ste 'dra ba na'o //
translated: “Having a result” is similar to “not having a result” because it is like it.

original: ji ltar myu gu la sogs pa'i 'bras bu sa bon la sogs pa 'bras bu de ma thag pa can yin pa de bzhin du sbyin ba la sogs pa'i sems pa mngon par mtho ba'i 'bras bu can yin na ni /
analyzed: ji ltar myu gu la sogs pa'i 'bras bu sa bon la sogs pa 'bras bu de ma thag pa can yin pa de bzhin du sbyin ba la sogs pa'i sems pa mngon par mtho ba'i 'bras bu can yin na ni /
translated: Just as the result of a sprout and so on is the seed and so forth, which is the immediate result of that result, so too, if the intention to give and so on has the result of high rebirth, then it must be the immediate result of that result.

original: 'bras bu de ma thag tu 'gyur dgos zhes 'dra bar sgro 'dogs pas 'dra ba des na phyin ci log pa yin no //
analyzed: 'bras bu de ma thag tu 'gyur dgos zhes 'dra bar sgro 'dogs pas 'dra ba des na phyin ci log pa yin no //
translated: Since it is imputed to be similar in that way, it is mistaken because it is similar.

original: mngon par mtho ba 'di ni sbyin pa la sogs pa'i sems pa'i 'bras bu can ma yin te /
analyzed: mngon par mtho ba 'di ni sbyin pa la sogs pa'i sems pa'i 'bras bu can ma yin te /
translated: High rebirth is not the result of the intention to give and so on.

original: gal te yin na ni gzhan dang 'dra bar 'gyur na /
analyzed: gal te yin na ni gzhan dang 'dra bar 'gyur na /
translated: If it were, it would be similar to other results.
